63b2(mdo): bya 'og/ 'ug pa rnams// dben par dong na sa chel dang // phan tshun 'thung bar 'gyur ba dang // de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// pa la sha'i lo ma rnams// rin cen sku gsum gdugs gyurd te// char 'bab skyabs su nam
63b3(mdo): 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che// 'phrul 'khor dpon g.yor mor bcas/ zang la byung ste 'gro ba na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bya mi 'ug pa'as// ri bo spos
63b4(mdo): kyi ngad sdang ba// margyal thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba// de tshe ri bsrel yod par 'gyur// slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u din n+yas tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ 'jig rten tham/
63b5(mdo): cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag slar smra/ sa pa// legs so legs so gzhon nu mchog/ rgyal ba na sras po cheg po che// dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa/
63b6(mdo): lung bstan pa ni dpa pa thob// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid// bsam gyis mya khyab go rims bzhin// gzhon nus bdag la mnyan par gyis
63b7(mdo): sangs rgyas yul ni bsam gyi khyab// de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa myed// sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu zhi// sangs rgyas thams cad kha dog mtshungs// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin// bachab ldan 'ad
63b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'di ni bcos ma myin// de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te// rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i sku// sprul pa'i sku ni stond par mdzad// drang srong chen po'i rang bsrel ni// yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba myed/
63b9(mdo): sku la rus pa khrag myed na// ring bsrel yod par ga la 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thabs kyis ring bsrel bzhag pa mdzad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de bzhin gshegs pa
64a1(mdo): chos kyi dbyings// chos stond mdzad pa ci 'dral// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de 'dra// bdag gis 'di thos zhes nas ni// bdag gis dam pa gsol 'a byas// de nyid kho na lung bstan daphyir// gtam
64a2(mdo): gleng ba ni bdag gis byas// de nas lha'i bu sum zhi nyis stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstand pa zab mo de lta bu de dag thos nas/ thams cad kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ses
64a3(mdo): bskyed de/ de dag yid kyi kun tu rtog pa rab tu dga' nas/ skra dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas mya ngan yod myi 'da'// chos kyang nub par myi 'gyur te// sems can yongs su smind
64a4(mdo): mdzad phyir// yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston// sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam myi khyab// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// dkon pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston// de nas
64a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las bcom ldan 'das shig kya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstand pa thos nas/
64a6(mdo): tshim zhing mgu' la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid/ bde ba skyes nas dga' ba dang mgul ba chen pos khyab par byerd to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa
64a7(mdo): 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang kyi snang bar gyur to// gser 'od dpa pa mdo sde 'i phrang ba mi rgyal las
64a8(mdo): denas byang chub sems pa la mangs pa'i rtogs nyid kyis sog pa /
64a9(mdo): gser go kun tu snang ba 'di lta ste men nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba zhig mthong 'o// phyogs thams cad ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs byed dpag tu myed pa das rin mo la'i shing drung na/ rin po them
64b1(mdo): dUr+ya'i khri rnams la bzhugs shing 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos stond pa mthong ngo // de na yang skyes bu bram ze'i gzugs lta bu zhig rnga rdung ba mthong ste/ rnga sgra de las brtan
64b2(mdo): pa'i tshigs su bcad la 'bras gudag byung ba thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog sad mu thag tu bstand pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag rjes su dran no// rjes su dran nas kyang de'i mtshan mo zad par
64b3(mdo): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri ka la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyinang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la go
64b4(mdo): 'os phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dang
64b5(mdo): mdzes pa'i tog gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal/ mo sbyar ba btud nas/ rmyi lam na bstan po'i tshigs su baHda pa thos pa de dag gsold to// // gser 'od dam
64b6(mdo): pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgya lam mthong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o// / nub cig g.yel ba myed par yang // bdag gi rmyi lam
64b7(mdo): gyur pa ni// mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong ba ste// thams cad du ni gser gyi 'od// ji ltar nyi ma bzhin du 'bar// kun tu rnam par lhang nge ste// phyogs bcu rnams su snang bar gyur da// kun tu rin cen/
64b8(mdo): shing drung na// / rin cen bye dUr+ya dag gi// khril sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te// brgya stong phrag ni du ma'i// 'khor dbus mdun gyis bltas pa mthong // bram ze'i gzugs ni 'dra ba zhig/ rnga chen rab
64b9(mdo): tu rung bar mthong // de las de la brdungs pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung // gser 'od dam pa'i rnga chen pa sa ni// stong gsum 'jig rten gsum 'di na// ngan sa ng+ge sdug bsngal gAzhi
64b10(mdo): rje'i sdug bsngal dang // dbul ba'i sdug bsngal sdug bsngal zhi bar shog/ rnga bo che'i sgra skad 'di yis ni// 'jog rten rmongs pa thams cad zhi gyurd cig/ ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs myed 'jigs zhi ltar
65a1(mdo): sems can 'jigs myed 'jigs dang bral bar shog/ ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po// 'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar// skye dgu'i ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag gi// yon tan ldan zhi
65a2(mdo): yon tan rgya mtshor gyur da// rnga bo che'i sgra skad 'di yis mi// sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan gyur da// sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa mchog reg zhog/ chos kyi 'khor lo dge bskor gyurd cig/ bskal
65a3(mdo): pa bsam gyis myi khyab bzhugs par shog/ 'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyurd cig/ nyon mongs 'jom gyur sdug bsngal sel 'ashog/ 'dod chags zhe sda gti mug zhi gyur da cig/ sems can gang dag ngan
65a4(mdo): song sar gnas te// rus pa'i lus la mye lce rab 'bar ba// de dag rnga chen bsgrags pa zos kyur da cig/ sangs rgyas bya ga 'tshal lo zhes tshig zos shing // sems can kun gyi skye ba brgyad
65a5(mdo): ngag dang // skye ba stong phrag bye ba skye dran shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag du dran kyar da cing // de dag gi ni rgya chen gsung thos shog// rnga bo che'i rnga skad 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu
65a6(mdo): 'grogs rnyed gyur // sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog/ bya ba dge ba rnams ni pyod gyur da cig/ myi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyi// / de dag bsam dang smon pa gang yin/
65a7(mdo): pa// rnga bo tsha'i sgra skud 'di yis ni// de dag rnams kyi de kun rdzogs gyur da cig/ sems can gang dag sems dmyal myi bzang skyes// lus la me lce kun tu rab tu 'bar// skyabs myed mya ngan bcas shing
65a8(mdo): yongs 'byam pa// mye rnams de dag rab tu zhi bar shog/ sems dmyal yi dgas mye'i 'jig rten na// sems can sdug bsngal myi bzad drag po gang // rnga bo che'i sgra skad 'ad yis ni// de dag rnams kyi
65a9(mdo): sdug bsngal kun zhi shog/ rten myed dbun nyen myed pa dang // skyabs myed par yang gyur pa dag/ de rnams la ni skyob pa dang // dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur da cig/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dam pa da//
65b1(mdo): thugs pa che zhugs rje ldan pa'i thugs// gang ngas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// bzhugs pa 'das la dgongs su gsolang // bdag gis sngon chad ldog pa'i las/ shin tu myi 'azad gang 'byis pa// stobs dran
65b2(mdo): 'i spyan mnga' bdag mchis te// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// pha ma rag tu myi 'dzind dang // sangs rgyas rnams su myi 'dzind dang // dge ba dag tu myi 'dzind pas// sdig pa bdag gis ka 'phyis da
65b3(mdo): byug pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang // rigs dang longs 'apyod rgyags pa dang // bzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa'i sa// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // nyes bsams nyes par smras pa dang // nyes pa
65b4(mdo): bgyis pa'i las rnams dang // nyes pa'i dmyigs su ma bltas pas// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // byis pa'i blo'o/ 'jug pa dang // myi shes mun pa'i sems dang na// sdig pa'i grogs
65b5(mdo): bor dbang gyur da dang // nyon mongs rnam par 'khrug sems da nga// rtsed mo dka' ba'i dbang nyid dang // mya ngan dang ni nad da bang dang // nor gyis myi chog nyes pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa
65b6(mdo): gang bgyis dang // 'phags myin skye bo 'dre ba dang // phrag dog se ra sA'i rgyu dang ni// g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis// bad ka gis sdig pa gang bkyes dang // phongs pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi cha
65b7(mdo): 'dod pa rnams kyi 'jigs rgyu dang // phyug po ma yin gyur da pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // g.yo ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang // 'dod dang 'gro ba'i dbang dag dang // bkres dang rkom gyis nyen pa yis/
65b8(mdo): bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // 'ja' 'dag dang btung ba dang // bud byed mya dang gos kyi phyir// nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang 'gyis dang // sus dang sa dang yid kyi las
65b9(mdo): nyes par spyad pa nas gsum pasacags// 'di 'dra'i tshul gis yang 'gyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang // de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang // kum pa
66a1(mdo): ma lags gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// gang yang dang sangs rgyas rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams/
66a2(mdo): de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// dam chos smra ba rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags bgyis pa dang // chos la'ang gus par ma bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// bdag gis rtag tu
66a3(mdo): shes pas// dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang // pha ma rnams la kus gang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// blun pa dang ni byis pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal dregs pas bsgribs
66a4(mdo): bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// 'dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// stobs bcu rnams la mchod pa rabagyi// bdag gis phyogs bcur sems can rnams// sduka
66a5(mdo): bsngal kun las gdon par bgyi// sems can bsam gos myi khyab kun// sa bcu la ni dgod par bgyi// sa brtul ni gnas nas kyang // thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur da cig/
66a6(mdo): ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las// de kun thar dab ky-i nus srid du// sems can re re'i phyir yang ni// bskal pa bye bar s+yad par bgyi// gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba// las rnams thos
66a7(mdo): cad byang bgyid pa// zab mo dag ni stond pa 'di// sems can de dag bstand par bgyi// kang kas bskal pa stong rnams su// sdig pa shin tu myi bzang bgyis// lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis// des
66a8(mdo): thams cad byang bar 'gyur// gang gis las kyi sgril pa rnams// / myur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba// gser 'od dam pa dge ba'i/ bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni// rin ces 'byung gnas mchog bcu po//
66a9(mdo): sa bcu la ni gnas par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan snang bar bgyi// srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang // yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo de// sangs rgyas yon tan bsam yas
66b1(mdo): kyis// thams cad mkhyend du rdzogs par bgyi// ting 'dzind brgya phrag stong rnams dang // gzungs rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dang // dbang stobs byang chub yan lag gis// stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar bgyi// dgongs
66b2(mdo): pa'i thugs kyi sangs rgyal rnams// 'dag la rnam par gzigs su ga sos// thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni// nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol// bdag gis bskal pa brgya rnams su// sngon cad sdig pa gang bgyis pa
66b3(mdo): de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sems// phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs pas gzir da// sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyid// yid ni rtag tu dman par gyur da// gang dang gang tu pyod 'gyid pa// bdag ni gang tu'ang dga' ma
66b4(mdo): mchis// sangs rgyas thams cad thugs rje ldam// 'gro ba kun kyi 'jigs sesad pas// nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol// 'jigs pa dag las bdag thar da mdzod// bdag gi nyon mongs
66b5(mdo): las rnams kyi// dri ma de bzhin gshegs pas sho la // sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la ni// snying rje nu'is pa/ kru bar gsol// sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi/
66b6(mdo): sngon cad bdag gis gang bgyis dang // da ltar bdag sdig pa gang // de dag thams cad 'dag 'chags so// no sa pa bgyis pa'i las rnams kun// slan cad myi bgyid bsdam
66b7(mdo): par bgyi// bdag gis nongs par babyis pa gang // sdika de bca' par myi 'gyi'o// lus kyi las ni nam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi ngas dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams// de ngas
66b8(mdo): thams cad bdag 'chags so// lus kyis bgyis rang ngag gi las// yid kyis rnam par bsams pa dang // las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dang// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// myi dge
66b9(mdo): las 'du spangs nas su// rig pa bcu po 'i snyen da la khyis te// sa brtul ni 'dag gnas 'gyi// stobs 'acu chog tu 'gyur ba mam gyi// bdag gi sdig pa'i las gang ngas// kyi 'dod 'bras bu thom
67a1(mdo): bgyid pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gang dag dang // 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu// gang rnams dge ba'i las
67a2(mdo): bgyid pa// de dag kun la yi rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa// bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chub mchog la reg par 'gyi// srid 'gro nyam ngar byas
67a3(mdo): pa'i blo yis ni// shin tu myi bzad sdig pa gang 'gyis pa// stobs bcu myi mnyam spyan sngar mchis nas na// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// skye ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang // 'jig rten
67a4(mdo): nyam nga g.yo sems nyam nga bar// lus kyi 'gyod pa nyam nga sna tsho gas kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bsachags de 'chags so// byis pa brun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang // sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad
67a5(mdo): panyam nga dang // srid pa nyam pa 'dod chags nyam pa dang // zhe / sdang gti mug mun pa nyam nga dang // dal ba'i nyam du dus kyi nyam/ nga dang // bsod nams bsgrubs pa nyam pa bdag gis kyang // rgyal
67a6(mdo): ba myi mnyam mngon sum mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par 'bye// sangs rgyas gser mdog ri snang ri bo'adra// yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba de dag
67a7(mdo): rnams la skyabs su mtsho// rgyal ba de dag kun la mgos phyag 'tshal// gser mdog gser ni dri ma myed pa'i gser gi 'od// dri myed rnam dag bye dUr+ya'i yan lag s+yan// sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi grags
67a8(mdo): 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas// thugs rje'i ljorje dag gis mun pa'i mun nag bsal// yan lag rab tu dI myed rab bzang rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri myed gser 'dras khyab// nyon mongs myes
67a9(mdo): gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i mye bdA la// thub pa zla ba'i 'odi gzer dra bas tshim par mdzad// mtshan mchog sum bcu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzes// dpe' byad bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes// dpal
67b1(mdo): gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs/ 'od gzer tra ba yis// 'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs// rI myed rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs bye du r+ya// skya reng dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin yan lag dmar// 'od ga /
67b2(mdo): rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pas// thu' chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du de'i sa mdzes// mya ngan 'khrugs pa 'chi chu rga ba'i dpa' rlabs can// 'khor ba'i klung chen phongs pa'i chu bor ltung ba la// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho
67b3(mdo): mchog tu rtsub cing shugs drag pa// bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od gzer mang po rnams kyis skams// yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang // ye shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mar+tha
67b4(mdo): kyis yas la ka rde pa smras pa/ sangs rgyal gser sku 'bar sa phyag 'tshal so// 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag myed dang / ji ltar la la sa rdul mtha' yas dang // ji ltar ri rab rdo mtha'
67b5(mdo): mtshungs byed dang // ji skar nam mkha'i mtha' ma mtha' yas pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// sem/ sa can kun gyis shes par myi nus so// bskalang pa du mar gzhas
67b6(mdo): cing bsams kyang ni// yon tan mtha' mgos par myi nus so// tsu ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang // rdor bcas ring bcas rgya mtsho bcas par ni// bskal par bgrangs na shes par rung yang srid
67b7(mdo): sangs rgyas yon tan pa mtha' zhes myi nus// yon tan kha dog snyan dang grags pa dang // dge ba'i mtshan kyis brgyan po'i sku lus dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyad pa yis// sems can thams cad de 'dra
67b8(mdo): myurang por shog/ bdag gis dge ba'i lam rnams 'od dag gis// 'jig rten gyi ring sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi// 'grol phan phyir chos kyang bstan par 'gyi// sems can sdug bsngal yang gzi da thar dpar
67b9(mdo): lus tsho so sa / sa 'a pa tshu ma sems cad kyim
68a1(mdo): sngon gi rgyal po'i rdzogs pa ltar// pha rol phyi nad drug bla myed rdzogs par bgyi// nyon mongs gzhom zhing sdug bsngal bsaHlad par bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi bar bgyi// skye ba brgya
68a2(mdo): dang skye ba bye ba stong // bdag ni rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyi// thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran par bgyi// de'i gsung ni rgya chen thos par bgyi// bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs
68a3(mdo): pa rnyed par bgyi// sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spang bar bgyi// dge ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams khyad par bgyi// zhing rnams kun na srog chags thams cad kyang // 'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhi gyur nga
68a4(mdo): sems can dbang po ma tshang yan lag nyams// de kun dag ming nga nga po tshang bar gog/ gang dag nad btab nyam chung lus nyams dang // phyogs brdungs na skyabs myed gyu da pa rnams// de kun myur tu nan
68a5(mdo): las thar gyur da cig/ nad myed stobs dang dbang po rnyed par/ shog/ gang dag rgyal po chom rkun spre'u bsdig pa bsad thug dang // sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yis phongs gyur da pa
68a6(mdo): sems can nyam thag gyur da cing sdug bsngal de dag kun// 'dzag sa mchog myi bzod brgya po de las thar gyur da cig/ gang dag brdegs shing bcing bas bcings gzi rad pa// phongs pa sna tshogs
68a7(mdo): dag na gnas gyur da cing // nyon mongs stong phrag du mas dkrugs nas kyang // 'jigs pa myi bzad mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed// de dag thams cad bcings las krol gyu rad cig/ brdegs pa dag ni 'jigs las thard
68a8(mdo): par shog/ gsad pa rnams kyang srog dang snyan par shog/ phongs gyur thams cad 'jigs pa myed par shog/ sems can gang dag bkres sred skos kyis gzi dang // de dag zas skom sna tshogs rnyed
68a9(mdo): par shog/ long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyurd cig/ 'on pas yid 'ong skra rnams thos par shog/ gcer bu rnams kyis sna tshogs kos rnyed gyur da// sems can dbul pos gter//
68b1(mdo): rnams rnyed par shog// nor bu rin cen sna tshogs mang po'is// sems can thams cad bde dang ldan par shog/ gang yang sdug bsngal tshor bas gnod ma 'gyur// sems can thams cad blta na stug pa dang // gzugs
68b2(mdo): bzang mdzes shing tshul du shes par shog/ rtag tu bde' ba du ma gsol gyurd cig/ yid kyi zas skom rab 'byor de bsod nams dag/ bsams ma thag tu de dag grub gyurd cig// rdza rnga cang te'u pi 'ang sgra snyan
68b3(mdo): dang // chu myig mtshe'u dang rdzing bu lteng ka dag/ gser gyi pad ma ud dpal pad ma can// zas skom gos nor mu ta~Mg nor bu dbyig/ rgyan gser rin cen sna tshogs bye dur+ya// de dag bsams ma thag tu grub gyur
68b4(mdo): cig// 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung // sems can gcig kyang myi 'phrod mthong ma 'gyur// de dag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang // phan tshun du ni 'od byed gyur da par shog/
68b5(mdo): myi'i 'jig rten phun sum tshogs kang yod// de dag bsams par skye bu de dag gyur// bsam pa thams cad bsams ma zag tu yang // bsod nams 'bras bus yongs su rdzogs pa/
68b6(mdo): shog// spos dang 'phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang // gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dag/ ljon shing dag las dus gsum 'byung bar shog// sems can de dag le nad cing dgar gyur da cis/
68b7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa las ma lus thams cad dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang // rdul bral dri snyed brtan pa'i chos la yang // phyogs bcu 'ams su mchod pa byed pa rkon/
68b8(mdo): dpal ba mtha' dgra spong gyur dwa cig/ gyi lom brgyad po dag las 'das par gos// dal pa'i rgyal po dbu pa thob gyur da cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyal 'grogs pa thob par non// rtag tu mthon po'i rigs su
68b9(mdo): skye bar shog/ nor dang 'bru'i mdzod rnams 'byor da gyur da cig/ snyand dang grags dang gzugs dpakha dog gis// bskal da pa du mar legs par brgya nad par shog/ bud myed thams cad rtag tu phor gyur te/
69a1(mdo): dpa' zhing rtul phod mkhas shing gsal bar shog// de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir gyod gyurang// pha rol phyind pa drug la spyod par shog/ phyogs bcu dag na rin cen shing dbang drung // sangs rgyas bde gshegs/
69a2(mdo): rin cen bye dUr+ya'i// waM la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur da cig/ chos bstand pa yang de dag zos par shog/ bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa naM// srid pa nya dang sngon cad gang bsgrubs pa// sdig las gang
69a3(mdo): dag myi 'dod 'bras thob pa// de dag thams cad ma lus zad gyur da cig/ sems can gang dag srid par bcings gnas kun// 'khor ba'i zhags pa'i theg pas dam bcings pa// shes rab lag gis bcings pa
69a4(mdo): bkrol bar shog/ sdug bsngal rnams las thar gyur da thub gyur da cig/ sems can gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang // kang ngag 'jig rten ni gzhan rnams na// bsod nams sna tshogs zab
69a5(mdo): mo rnams byed pa// de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsgrubs pa'i// bdag gi rjes su yi ra// nga bsod nams des// bdag gi smon grub 'bras bu yod par
69a6(mdo): gog/ mas rgyas rdul bras zla myed thob gyurd cig/ gang dang / rtag dang dri ma bral ba dang // dr-i myed yid kyis phyag 'tshal 'asgo/ da pa dang // yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni// bskal
69a7(mdo): pa drug cur ngan song spong bar 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis// skyes pa bud myed bram ze rgyal rigs las// thal sbyar du 'dug te rgyal ba gang stod pa// tshe rabs kun tu skye bar dran par
69a8(mdo): 'gyur// yan lag dbang po kun kyis yan lag brgyand// bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// myi dbang rgyal pos tag tu mchod de// de dang de dag tun de 'drar 'gyur// gang dag na 'a le'u
69a9(mdo): kar bshags pa 'di ni grag 'gyur ba// de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gnas nas dge ba byas ma yin// gnyisas la ma yin bzhi la ma yin lnga byin brtul myon// de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gan nas dge ba
69b1(mdo): byas pa yin// / gser 'od dam pa mdo' sngo'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// bshags pa 'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi sa
69b2(mdo): mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' sa yang to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po gser ki lag pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la stod pa
69b3(mdo): pad mal 'byung gnas 'dis/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par stod do// rgyal ba gang dag sngar gyur da gang byung dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig
69b4(mdo): rten dag nag pa 'tsho ba// rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag brgya'o// rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod// thub dbang zhi zhing rab zhi rnam par dag/ sku ni gser gi mdog tu rab tu gda'/
69b5(mdo): dbyangs rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas gsung snyan te// tshangs/ nyepa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa'i gsung // bung ba rma bya sud dpal sngon po'i ngabu// mthon zing lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'a
69b6(mdo): zha la dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems// rtag tu gser ltarad+hamakhar mdzes par gda'// spyan ni ring zhing mthon ti po traM ma byed// ud dpal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra// ljags ni ring zhi
69b7(mdo): legs pa pad ma'i mdog// pad ma 'drar gnas pad pa'i ze ba 'dra// zhal gyi mdzod spu pad ha dung // bye dUr+ya'i mdog 'dre g.yas su 'khyil// thub pa'i zla ba phra zhing zla ba zad pa 'dra// sku'i ste ba
69b8(mdo): bung ba gsal ba bzhin// zhal la mtho ba'i gangs ni rtag tu lhag ge ste// 'jam zhing sa ya la ki ser ltar kha dog bzang // rtag par rgyun tu rgyal ba thams cad kyi// ro mchog 'jam zhing dam pa mchog rab
69b9(mdo): 'phags// spu'i bu ga nas ni rer skyes// spu rnams skyes pa g.yas su 'khyil dpa ste// mthon zing 'dra bar 'tsher zhing lung lo can// rma bya'i mgron sdug 'dra bar sngo la mdzes// bltas ma thag tu sku'i sa
70a1(mdo): snang bar bgyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag ni thams cad kang // 'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhe// bde la kun gyis sems can rnams kyang tshim// sems can 'gro dang dud 'gro'i
70a2(mdo): 'gro ba dang // yi dgas lha gnas myi'i 'gro rnams su// sems can de dag thams cad bde bas tshim// ngan song 'gro ba rnams ni thams cad zhi// kha dog mdog bzang gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od// gtso ma'i gser
70a3(mdo): ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku// bde gshegs zla ba rab tu dr-i myed zhal// 'dzum zhing rnam mdzes shi nad tu dI myed zhal// gzho nu btsar 'dras sku lus yan lag 'jam// seng ge 'dra bar phal gyis gnon pa'i mchog/ phyag ring
70a4(mdo): phyag ni rab tu ring ba ste// sa la'i yug ma rlung gis bskyod pa bzhi na// 'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od gzer rab tu gtong // nyi ma stong ltar rab tu lhag ke'o// thub pa'i dbang po'i sku mchog dr-i ma myed//
70a5(mdo): zhing rnams mtha' yas thams cad rob tu snang // sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par lha de bas// zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yang // mtshan byed zla ba nya ma mang po dag/
70a6(mdo): de dag thams cad 'od ni myed par gyur da// sangs rgyas nyi ma 'jig rten sgron ma ste// sangs rgyas brgya phrag nyi ma stongarnams ni// zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag brgya dag na
70a7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma sems can mthong // bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku// yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyand pa'i sku// grang chen dbang po'i sde 'dra rgyal ba'i phyag/ phyag dang zhags
70a8(mdo): 'od rab mdzes dri mra byed// so'i steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra snyed// pra la'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed dbyung ba dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed bzhugs pa dang //
70a9(mdo): rgyal ba de dag la na rab dang ba'i// ngag yid lus kyis me tog dbul ba dang // spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dag dang // dge ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag
70b1(mdo): dge gyur pa// snying po mchog la sna tshogs du ma ste// bdag gis bskal ba stong du sde brgya yis// sangs rgyas yon tan brjod par myi nus so// rgyal ba gcig gi yon tan tan rnams kyang ni// sre stong
70b2(mdo): gis kyang cung zad brjod myi nus// bdag gis rgyal ba dag ni thams cad kyi// yon tan gcig rgyas brjod par ga la nus// lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad mtshor gyur da te// srid pa'i rtse mo thams cad chus
70b3(mdo): gdab// sgra'i tshe mos dpag par nus srid kyi// bde gshegs rnams kyi yon tan gcig la myin// lus dang ngag yid rab tu dang ba'i sa// rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas// / bdag gis bsod nams
70b4(mdo): 'bras bu mchog bsugs gang // des ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyurd cig// de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams bstod nas/ rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni// ma 'ongs bska yang
70b5(mdo): pa mtha' yas rnams su yang // gang dang gang tu bdag ni skye ba/ na// rmyi lam du ni 'di 'dra'i brda blta zhing // der ni bshag/ sa pa 'di 'dra mnyan par 'akye// rgyas bstod pad ma 'byung rgyal
70b6(mdo): 'di 'dra ba// skye ba de dang der ni rnyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs byed dang // gang yang bskal pa stong du rnyed dka' la// de dag rmyi lam du'ang mnyan par bgyi// nyin 'gyur
70b7(mdo): tshe yang de dag bshad par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las tha rad par bgyi// pha rol phyind pa drug po rdzogs par bgyi// phyi nas bla myed byang chub thob par bgyi// bdag gi zhing ni lhod pa myed gyur da cig/
70b8(mdo): rnga phul rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang // rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus// shag kya thub dbang mngon tu blta bar bgyi// der ni bdag gis lung bstan thob gyur da cig/ gser gyi lag pa'i
70b9(mdo): rang dang gser gyi 'od// bdag gi khye'u mi gang yin 'di'is kyang // de ni bu po de dag sa nyig dang // byang chub na myed sung bas nga thos par nyon// sems can gang dag gnas byed rtsen byed cing / zu
71a1(mdo): dang bral nas phongs par gyur pa dag/ de dag la yang ma 'ongs dus rnams na/ skyob dang dpung nyen skyabs dang rten gyurd cig/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par byed gyur da cig/ bde ba kun
71a2(mdo): kyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog/ sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid pa// ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi// gser 'od dam pa'i ni bshags pa'i sa// bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho skam par
71a3(mdo): gos// bdag gi las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyurd cig/ bdag gi nyon mongs rgya mtsho chad par shog/ bdag gi bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs kyur da cig/ ye shes dri myed snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi ye shes
71a4(mdo): rgya mtsho rnam dag shog/ yon tan kun kyi rgya mtshor gyur da par shoka/ byang chub yon tan yon tan rin cen rdzogs// gser 'od dam pa'i ba shags pa'i stobs kyis ni// bdag gi bsod nams ral tu snang ba
71a5(mdo): shog/ bdag gi byang chub snang ba nam dag gyur // ye shes dri/ myed snang ba dam pa'i sa// bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni snang bar/ shog/ bsod nams snang ba lha der bya ba'i phyir// 'jig rten
71a6(mdo): gsum na khyad par 'phags gyurd cig/ bsod nams s+ho bas dang rtag tu ldan par shog/ sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang // bde' ba kun kye rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sa// ma 'ongs
71a7(mdo): bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi// 'jig rten sngon mthar ji snyed gshegs// de dag zhing ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba// yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyis
71a8(mdo): bdag gi zhing // ma 'ongs dus na de 'drar 'gyur bar shog// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa/ me tog pad ma'i 'byung
71a9(mdo): gnas shes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// bsam kis myi khyab mdo' rnams gzhan dag tu// stong pa'i
71a10(mdo): chos rnams rab tu brgyas bshad de// de lta bas na mdol mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo' tsam bshad pa yin// sems can blo chung rnam par myi shes pas/ chos rnams thams cad shes par gyi nus te// de lta bas na mdo mchog dpal 'dir/ stong
71b1(mdo): chos rnams mdo tsam bshad pa yin// sems can kun kyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang // sems can 'byung bya phyir ni snying rje'i dbang // thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni// mdo mchog dam pa'i
71b2(mdo): dbang po 'di bshad do// sus 'di grong khyer khyim stong ji bzhin te// dbang po rnams ni dmag dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag thams cad grong gcig gnas mod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam par myi shes so// myig
71b3(mdo): gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug// na ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par dpyod// sna'i dbang po sna tshogs dr-i rnams 'phrog/ lce'i dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyuka/ lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyu ka/
71b4(mdo): yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par dpyod// dbang po drug po/ 'di dag phan tshun du// rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug parabyed// sems ni sgyu ma lta bu g.yol ba yin/ dbang
71b5(mdo): drug ni yul la rnam dpyod de// ji ltar myi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang // dmaka dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin// dza star sems ni yul drug gnas bcas shang // dbang po
71b6(mdo): spyad yul dag kyang rabashes pa// de ltar sems ni yul drug kan na te// dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab tu shes// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya de bzhin myod
71b7(mdo): yul chos// sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la// dbang por zhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo' bar gyur // dbang po kang dang gang tu gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes pa bdag nyid byed/
71b8(mdo): sus ni g.yo ba myed cing byed pa byed// snying po myed cing rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung // grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas// sa dang kye dang /
71b9(mdo): chu dang rlung rnams ni// krong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs gnas pa// dper na sbrul kadug gnas gcig dzaM bzhin te// rtag tu phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sbrul rnams
72a1(mdo): bzhi po de dag kyang // gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni zur 'gro// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te// khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// so'i
72a2(mdo): sbrul dang chu'i sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// mye'i sbrul dang rlung sa/ 'di gnyis steng gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin// ji ltar sngon cad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sems
72a3(mdo): dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong // lha dang myi dang ngan song gsum dag tu// ji stir byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye// bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa zad gyur da na// lus shi gcin dang ngan spyugs nas
72a4(mdo): kyis gang // mngon par myi dga' srim 'bu'i phung por gyur da// dur khrod dag na 'thor da pa shing bzhin ku radra// lha mo khyod da ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can de bzhi
72a5(mdo): gang zag dang // chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa'i rkyend las byung ba yin// 'byung / chen po 'di dag che 'byung myi ni// ma byung ba las byung zhing myi
72a6(mdo): 'byung ste// kang kau phyir ni 'byung ba myi 'byung la// de phyira'abyung ba che zhes ngas brjod do// ma rig pas ni gzhar yang yod myin la// ma rig pa'i rkyend las 'byung ba yin// ma rig
72a7(mdo): 'din yod pa ma yin te// de bsangs ni ma rig 'di bshad do// 'du byed rnam shes mying dang gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang // sred dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang // skye dang
72a8(mdo): rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gis myi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnga ltar gnas pa dang // ma byung ba las byung dang myi 'byung dang // tshul bzhini ma yin sems
72a9(mdo): kyis rnam dpyad dang // bdag gi lta bar gyur pa gcad par gyis// ye shes ral gyis nyon mongs rgya mo dro lang // phung po'i gnas la stong par gyur par ltos// byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par
72b1(mdo): gis// ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer sgo yang phye// bdud mi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstadang // nga ni 'dud ci'i grong khyer gnas pa der 'jug/ nga ni bdud kyi zhu bas bdag tshim bya// ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen
72b2(mdo): dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dubakyi mchod kya zhus/ ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi cha rad pa dam pa pa'/ ngas ni nyon mongs dgra bcom rnams las rgyal// ngas ni
72b3(mdo): chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng // srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni ngan song gsum kyi lam rnams bkag// sems can nyon mongs mye'i sa gdungs gyur da pa// rten myed gyurd cing
72b4(mdo): dpung nyen myed pa dag// srog chags nyon mongs myes gdungs zhi byas nas// bdud rtsi khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas/ gang phyir bskald pa du mar sngon cad ngas/ 'dren pa bsam gyis
72b5(mdo): myi khyab mchod pa byas// chos kyi sku de yongs su tshol ba na// / brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa da// nga ni myig dang rkang pa dang // yan lag mchog dang bu stug pu
72b6(mdo): mo dang // nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser// bye du r+ya dang ra ni cen sna tshogs btang // stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang // pra dang phra rnams thams cad dang // nags tshal dag
72b7(mdo): dpas las ni// 'khrung ba thams cad bcad gtubs te// de dag thams cad byed blags nas// rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ci tsas par// phye ma'i phung po srungs nas na//
72b8(mdo): 'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus// sas rdul ni yod pa rnams// stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam kris myi khyab pa// sems can kun gyi shes pa gang // de ni sems can gcig kir gyur //
72b9(mdo): shes pa de'i sa rdul rnams kyi// phye mar bgrang bar byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// ye shes rab ldan myi rnams kyis// thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen la myi nus so//
73a1(mdo): thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang // skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang // bskald pa bye ba du mar ni// gang tu'ang 'grang bar myi nus so// / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
73a2(mdo): dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/ drug pa'o// / de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang // rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes
73a3(mdo): po dang // rgyal po chen po myig myi bzang stan las yangs te/ kos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar da pa 'ad
73a4(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/
73a5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin ka/ shegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba// lha'i chog
73a6(mdo): thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags
73a7(mdo): te/ brjod nas rab tu bkur pa/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba rab tu sbyin par 'gyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /
73a8(mdo): gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/ pha rold kyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu bzlog pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyid
73a9(mdo): rad kyi dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza' thams cad sel pa/ mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu
73b1(mdo): zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa brgya stong rab tu 'jom par bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad na/ chos
73b2(mdo): mnyan pa chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang bcas pa bzhi'i lha'i lus 'di gzi chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang / stobs dang mthu
73b3(mdo): yang bskyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang bdag cag gi lus la 'jug par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhin chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra la/ chos
73b4(mdo): kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyi sa lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis rgyal po
73b5(mdo): bgyi'o// 'byung po'i tshogs myi bzad pa/ snying rje ma mchis pa// gzhan ki mdangs 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par 'gyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi
73b6(mdo): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun tu lha'i myig rnam pa ra dag pa myi'i las 'das pas 'dzam bu gling thams cad blta ba
73b7(mdo): dkyil/ bsrung bar bgyi// yongs su bskyang bar 'gyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong zhes mying du chags so// btsum pa bcom ldan 'dra/
73b8(mdo): gang su dag 'dzam bu klang 'dir pha rold kyi dmag tshogs yul 'jom par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i dgon pa'am/ nad kyi dgon pa'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong dang / gnod
73b9(mdo): pa brgya phrag stong dag gis gtses par 'gyur ba na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyas po 'di 'dzind pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de
74a1(mdo): dag la bskul bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis rdzu 'phrul dang byin kyi rlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag bskul pa na/ yul gang dang
74a2(mdo): gang du mchi bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dang de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par stond par 'gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa sA
74a3(mdo): tshogs stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mya'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mche bar 'gyur ba'i yul
74a4(mdo): de dag du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'odi yang bste/ nad par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mya'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te thos
74a5(mdo): nas/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzind pa'i dge slong de dag phyir ro// la ba de dag thams cad las kun tu srung bar bgyid/ yongs su/ bskyab pa dang / yongs su 'dzind pa dang / yongs su skyong bar brgya
74a6(mdo): na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis myi'i rgyal po de yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnas kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
74a7(mdo): bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das myi'i rgyal pos nam dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang
74a8(mdo): po 'dzind pa la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mya'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnaMl dzen pa cwams kyis bde ba da/ yo byad mas
74a9(mdo): kyis phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam myi'i rgyal pos/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma' mdo' sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzind pa la sti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyis
74b1(mdo): rim mgror bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ myi 'i rgyal po de la rgyal po thams cad pas ches ste sting du bgyi/ ches bla mar bgyi/ ches rim 'gror bgyi/ ches mchod par
74b2(mdo): bgyi ste/ yul thams cad du yang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba byin da te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so lags so// rgyal po chen po khyod yang
74b3(mdo): legs so legs so// 'di lta ste/ khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams skyed pa// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos dang ldan pa/
74b4(mdo): chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos kyis lha dang myi rnams kyi rgyalapo byed pa'o// 'di lta ste khyod ni yun ring por sems can tham sa cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sas
74b5(mdo): dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar dang bya mas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan// ba dang / bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ myi ba
74b6(mdo): pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub par bton pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis myi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
74b7(mdo): la mchod pa dang / rim mgro byed par 'phen pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba kyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba gyis shig
74b8(mdo): des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu bsrungs
74b9(mdo): par 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyangs pa dang / yongs su gzung bar yang 'gyur ro// des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis lha dang / lha ma yin du
75a1(mdo): g.yul 'gyed pa ma rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rold kyi dpag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa/ 'di'i
75a2(mdo): phyir dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba kyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba
75a3(mdo): dang bde legs su 'gyur ba gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po gnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po myig myi bzang stan las langs te/ blakos
75a4(mdo): phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha pas la btsu gas te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbya rad pa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso yad to// btsun
75a5(mdo): ba bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs po'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo/ sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di krong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor tam/ pho brang 'khor gang du spyod
75a6(mdo): par 'gyur ba dang / myi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du 'apyod par 'gyu ra ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi'i rgyal por gyurd pa gang la la zhig/ lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po chen po'i bstan bcwo
75a7(mdo): 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing rtag par rgyu nad tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyand tam/ rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo
75a8(mdo): sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa de dag la yang sti stang bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim 'gror bgyid cing mchod de/ rtag par rgyu nad tu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan ma/ chos nyan pa'i chu bo'i chu chos bdud pa'i zhu ba
75a9(mdo): 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i sa lha'i lus 'di dag gzi chen po rnam par 'phyel bar 'gyur/ bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang stobs
75b1(mdo): chen por yang bgyid lags so// bdag cag gi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya/
75b2(mdo): stong phrag du ma dang / lus bltar mye gda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ngam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na gser 'od dam pa'i mdo' sde'i dbang po'i rgyal lo
75b3(mdo): 'di khyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi'o// myi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyand pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag kum la bsrung bar 'gyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang
75b4(mdo): yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs
75b5(mdo): su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang // chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba'ir bgyi'o// // yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams
75b6(mdo): ca las yongs su tha rad par 'phyo'o// pha royod kyi dpag tshogs rnams kyang slar bzlog par 'gyi'o// phyi'i rgyal po gapal la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyand pa dang / rim mgror
75b7(mdo): bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra a dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nas dgra bla mda' nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpupa ga tshogs yam lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der
75b8(mdo): song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus/ dgra zla mang ba nye ba'i rgyal po/
75b9(mdo): po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyind na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa myi bzad pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du
76a1(mdo): gza' dang rang kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel pa sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur mo// bzus pa bcom ldan 'das rnam dgra bla yangs nye ba'i rgyal po re rang gi yul du phyi nang ma gnod pa sna tshogs 'a
76a2(mdo): dang / bresad pa sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi'i dpag 'asogs te/ pha rol kyi dmag tshogs su mche ba'i slad du/ rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung
76a3(mdo): gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / ldan gcig tu yul der mtsho 'tshal ba dang / gang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig 'tshas par gyur dam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdas
76a4(mdo): ga rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya skyong du ma dang lhan cig tu lus myi gda' bar bgyis te/ der mche bar ba kyi'o// pha rol kyi dmag tshogs de shul tu zhugs pa las kyang de
76a5(mdo): nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// brel pa sna tshogs brgya dag kyang / nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// 'gyegs kyang 'gyi'o// 'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol kyi dmag tshogs de mchi ba yang myi nus na/ yu
76a6(mdo): gzhig par 'gyid par lta ka la 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'ad kyis rgyal mo bzhi po da/ la chen lo nA rtsa byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs te/ khyed bskal pa grangs myed pa bye
76a7(mdo): ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ myi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim mgro byed pa dang / mchod
76a8(mdo): pa de dag la kun tu 'asrung ba byas shig// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba kyis shika// rgyal po'i pho bra 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang
76a9(mdo): yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba gyis shig yul
76b1(mdo): dedag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thadad par gyis shig/ pha ros kyi dpag sogs rnams kyang thog shis// 'dzam bu'i slong thams can ma gnas pa'i phyi'i rgyas po ngas
76b2(mdo): byi 'thab pa dang / mtshang myi 'dru ba dang / myi cod pa dang / myi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar kaus shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi'i 'dzam bu'i grong 'dir nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi
76b3(mdo): stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dka' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par myi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam
76b4(mdo): par 'tshe ba myi skyed pa dang / rang gis dzaM lha ldo gi ga sag rgyal po mo gi lam las gdas pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dag/ 'a ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par myi byed pa dang / yul
76b5(mdo): gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol myi gnon pa dang / nam 'dzam bu'i gleng 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi/ stong de dag phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i
76b6(mdo): sems dang phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du myi 'thab 'tshang myi 'dru/ myi chod myi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas la khyed bzhi'i 'dzam
76b7(mdo): bu'i gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur// lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dka' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang po dang / kyis kang bar 'gyur/ sa yang mdangs can du 'gyur// dus dang zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo khyud kor
76b8(mdo): thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ cha rad pa'i rgyun kyang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling
76b9(mdo): thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor da par 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba dang / ser sna myed par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/
77a1(mdo): 'gyur// phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lA'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag gapas la zhig kyi'i rgyal por gyur pa
77a2(mdo): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid nyand par 'gyur te/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo'i sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa de dag la yang sti
77a3(mdo): snang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri kror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dpa g.yog du bcas pa/ gnod sbyin phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ rtag par rgyu nad tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
77a4(mdo): blo rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu'i klung chu'i bdud rtsi'i zhu ba 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro// khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi chen po yang rnam par 'phel lo// khyed
77a5(mdo): kyi brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs kyang skyed do// khyed kyi ga zi brjid dang dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phal lo// myi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
77a6(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kyi thub pa nga la yang / mtsho da pa bsam kas myi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro// myi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
77a7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma la yang / yo byad bsam gis myi khyab pa/ rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod par byas par 'gyur ro// des na myi'i rgyal po de la 'asrung ba chen po byas par
77a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// des na myi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro//
77a9(mdo): des rabya'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dam/ yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyad ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang /
77b1(mdo): btsun mo ngas pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / btsun mo la 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen pos byas par 'gyur/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su
77b2(mdo): bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang ches gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang
77b3(mdo): yid bde ba bsam gis myi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur/ yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur/ gnod pa myed
77b4(mdo): par 'gyur/ dgra myed par 'gyur/ pha rold kyi dpag tshogs thams cad kyis myi rdzi ba dang / gnod pa myed pa dang / 'khrug pa myed par 'gyu ro// de skad ces bka' saHlad pa dang / bcom ldan
77b5(mdo): 'das la/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pa de// rgyal po chen po myig myi bzang dang / de dag gis 'di skad ces
77b6(mdo): gsol de to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das myi'i rgyal/ ga pal la zhig/ gse 'od dam pa mdo'i sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di panyan 'tshal bar gyur pa/ bdag nyid la yang bsrung ba chen po 'chi
77b7(mdo): 'chald pam gyurd/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gi tshogs rnams la yang 'byung 'chen po 'apyid 'chal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho thang 'khom
77b8(mdo): dag thams cad la mthon pa dang yidi legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsas gis kyi sgrub pa ma chogs byang par du 'phags pa tha dbyed pa bgyid 'dus par gyu / 'dis 'dag gi rgyas srid kyi dbang mun chen po tham sanas
77b9(mdo): kyi rgyal pa na se lam 'phel par 'gyid 'tshal bar gyur nga/ rgyal po nyid 'asam shes kyi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzi pa 'tshal bar gyur / bdag gi yum
78a1(mdo): thams cad kyang kun tu 'asrub 'tshal bar gyur pa/ yongs su skyong 'tshal bar gyur pa/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol kyi dmag tshogs kyis kyi rdzib dang / nad 'gro ba
78a2(mdo): ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur da na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das myi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / ri mo dang bcas pas gser 'od
78a3(mdo): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di sti stang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ myi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par
78a4(mdo): mchir gyi'o// der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tsho kas kyis chag chag gdab cang me tog sil ma sna tshogs dgram par bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der
78a5(mdo): chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyand pa ba/ sham par bgyi'o// phyogs der gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgya nad par bgyi'o/
78a6(mdo): myi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o// kos dri rab tu gdal ba kos sar pa mdzes pa bgos nas/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgya nad par brgya'o// bdag gi stan rab tu dpa' ba ka ding bar 'argya
78a7(mdo): ste/ stan de la mchis nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par myi bgyi'o// der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par myi bkye'o// rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis kas
78a8(mdo): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la yang stond par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// myi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang /
78a9(mdo): rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor kye tshogs rnams sa sdug pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o// btsun ma
78b1(mdo): 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la yang tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o// chos mnyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor nu saHsad par 'gyi'o// dka' la bsam shes myi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag
78b2(mdo): tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gis myi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o// bdag dka' ba chen pos dga' bar 'gyi'o// rab tu dga'
78b3(mdo): ba chen po bskyed nas chos smra ba bsu bar 'gyu'o// de skad ces gso lang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' la yad to// rgyal po chen po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na
78b4(mdo): myi'i rgyal po des/ gos thams cad dkar po'i srir pa mas pa 'go bar bya'o// spud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis 'a ka legs par brgyan par bya'o// gdugs dkar po yang gzung
78b5(mdo): bar bya'o// rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i bkod pa// chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal bo'i pho brang de nas byung la chos smras pa bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro
78b6(mdo): bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong gi 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los sgyur
78b7(mdo): ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur// der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed du tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gis myi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba khrag
78b8(mdo): khrig brgya stong du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba lha'i gzhal myed khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ myi rnams kyi rgyal rigs lha'i rgya che zhing rgya che ba/ brgya stong phrag du ma khroza par 'gyur/
78b9(mdo): skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung ba 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brje rnam
79a1(mdo): shi nad tu rgya che bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang myi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur
79a2(mdo): chen po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang bstan sdug pa dang / mdog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur
79a3(mdo): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu myed pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong nas/ myi'i rgyal po de dag dpag
79a4(mdo): tshad tsam du chos smra ba 'asu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang dpag tshad stong du rakra bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes skyed par bya'o// 'di snyam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
79a5(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa deng bad/ ga gau rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro// ded de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
79a6(mdo): sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'tsho sa gsol bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAg kya
79a7(mdo): thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang myi mthun pa mnyan par bya'o// deng bdag chos nyan pa 'dis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par bya'o// deng bdag gis de
79a8(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa
79a9(mdo): chen po bsam gis kyi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshi ni rje'i 'jig rten gi sdug bsngal thams cad shind tu rgyas
79b1(mdo): bcad par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khras khrig brgya stong du ma 'thob pa dag gis dge ba'i ma kha'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng 'dag gis brgya byin nyid kyi yus
79b2(mdo): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thob pa dag kau dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par
79b3(mdo): par bya'o// deng bskal pa bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongs su thard par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu myed pa bla na myed pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gis myi khyab pa
79b4(mdo): yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis btsun mo'o 'khor kyi tshogs thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur/
79b5(mdo): ba bsam gyis kyi khyab pa mchog du khyad par du 'phags pa/ za na/ myed pa byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis yul 'di tham sa cad kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyangs pa dang /
79b6(mdo): gnod pa myed pa dang / ngag myed pa dang / pha rosad kyi dmag tshogs tham sa cad kyis myi rdzib dang / nad 'gro ba myed pa dang / 'khrug pa myed par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen
79b7(mdo): po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa dag la myi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa 'di lta bus sti ltung byed/ bla mar
79b8(mdo): byed/ rim gro byed/ mchod pa byed cing rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / spu'i tshogs de dag dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dag lags kyi dam pa byin na myi'i rgyal po de/ bsod nams mngon
79b9(mdo): bar 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gis myi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gis
80a1(mdo): myi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa dang gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol la thams cad dang / dgra thams cad chos dang 'thun pas shi nang tu tshar gcod par
80a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' aHlad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsold to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig myi'i rgyal por gyur da la/ de chos la gus pa
80a3(mdo): de lta bus gser 'od dam pa mdo'i sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa de dag la yang ste stang du 'byid/ bu ma 'byed/ gro
80a4(mdo): dpa paspyod cing // rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du rgyal po 'i pho brang de shi nad tu dag par phyag dnga'agyid/ spos chab sna chog sa kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag cag rgyal po
80a5(mdo): chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos mnyan pa de nyan cing / bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du dge bo'i rtsa ba'i shas cung/ zad cig sbyin pa bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong
80a6(mdo): chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu myi'i rgyal po des pa dag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser
80a7(mdo): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du/ bdug pas bdugs ma thag tu/ spos sna tshogs nas 5/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar gyur da te/ de dag skad
80a8(mdo): cig zad cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'dre shi dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam pa 'gyur/
80a9(mdo): gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sdang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang sdang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang gdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag skad cig
80b1(mdo): cig yud tsam de la myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gi sde dpon po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin no/
80b2(mdo): sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / klu'i
80b3(mdo): rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag ki rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/ spos dang gdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur spos dri sna tshog
80b4(mdo): rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du kaser du sdang la 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des gnas thams cadasnang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// de skad ce/ so led pa dang / bcom ldan
80b5(mdo): 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' saHla to// rgyal po chen po dag rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang gi 'ang ba na mas kyi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'dri
80b6(mdo): shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag myo'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i de la mchod pa'i phyir spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdug
80b7(mdo): thag tu/ lag mtho sto cig thogs pa de las spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gau stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di thos
80b8(mdo): cad na/ gang na zla bA bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po re reb bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang /
80b9(mdo): gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal tshan bzhi'i ros kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin du nye bar song ba'i bar
81a1(mdo): ki lA bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
81a2(mdo): dri za dang sgra ma yin dang / nam ka lding dang / mye 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyi rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas
81a3(mdo): par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i 'bapa rnams su gser ki kha dog lta bu'i sdang la yang 'byung bar 'byung zhing / snang ba des kyang lga'i kha pa rnams snang ba byas par 'gyur ro//
81a4(mdo): rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'ji ga rten gi khams na/ lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang 'dug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su
81a5(mdo): gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo'i sde'i dbang po// 'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ myi'i rgyal po des spos// sna tshogs de dag gis 'dugs ma thag tu/ gser 'od dam pa
81a6(mdo): mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus/ spos dang 'dug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i
81a7(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams du ma kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong rnams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag zhig brgya stong phrag du ma gang ga'i klung
81a8(mdo): ki bye ma snyed dag gi bar snang la/ spos dang 'dug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing ki gdugs su gnas par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs
81a9(mdo): rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gau kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyur
81b1(mdo): rgyal po chen po dag cho 'phrul chen 'i sre ga byung ma zag tu de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa legs so/ legs so//
81b2(mdo): skyes bu das pa khyed gser 'od das pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshul 'di lta bu/ zab mor snang la 'di lta bu/ yon tan bsam gos myi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa khyed
81b3(mdo): yang legs so// legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i cha la ngan ngon dang ldan par myi 'gyur na// gang dag badzind pa
81b4(mdo): dang / 'chang ba dang / 'chad pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dmapa gser 'od dang
81b5(mdo): pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di sdom ma thag tu byung chub sem/ sa dpa' bye la khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bla na myed pa ya/ bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur
81b6(mdo): phyir ro// de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye la khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi
81b7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshig gcig dang ngag gcig dang / sgra skad gcig gis dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' saHsad to// skyes
81b8(mdo): bu dab pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams
81b9(mdo): cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang ngag thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs dka' ba pyod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag
82a1(mdo): stond par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po legs par brgyand par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum kau stong chen po 'jig rten gi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa 'gyur
82a2(mdo): skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud kyi sde bsam gis kyi khyab pa gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ myi sdug pa ston pa/ gzugs kyi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal ba
82a3(mdo): 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpa' myed pa/ rab tu zhi ba rtul dang bral ba zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
82a4(mdo): 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa mchog tu zab pa/ bla na myed pa rnam pa bcu gnyis rab
82a5(mdo): skor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na/ myed pa rdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyed chos kyi drung tha ma myed pa 'bud par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal
82a6(mdo): mtshan chen po sbreng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dpapa khyod chos kyi rlom ma tha ma khyod la 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu ngas pa khyod chos kyi cha thar byed pa 'dzinas par 'gyur/ skyes bu dab pa khyod
82a7(mdo): sngon mongs pa'i dgra stong phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dpa 'khyod yongs can bye 'a khrag zhis brgya stong zag du ma gnad tu 'jigs su rung ba/ 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya mo smos pa sgrol par 'gyur
82a8(mdo): skyes bu dam pa khyod sems cas bye ba zhag zhig 'argya gro du ma dag 'khor la'i 'khor lo las yongs su tha dad par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sangs rgyas kye bzhis khrig brgya phreng mas du med/
82a9(mdo): mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' saHlad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsolang to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das myi'i rgyal po gser
82b1(mdo): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po yon tan tshe 'di dang ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta bu dag mthob la sangs rgyas ste phran brgya la dge ba'i mamal bskyed pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs
82b2(mdo): su 'dzirid par mthong nas snying brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyir brgya stong phrag du ma rang gi khang pa na mchis pa dang
82b3(mdo): bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma thag tu lus myi gda' bar bgyis te/ myi'i rgyal po de'i khang pa 'phags pa phyag dam ma mchis pa/ legs par phyag dar bgyis pa/ spos chab sna tshog
82b4(mdo): kyis chag chag legs par btab pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgya na legs par brgyand po'i rgyal po'i pho brang ka la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mtshol bar bgyi'o// myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs
82b5(mdo): pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dpya/ ngas can dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang /
82b6(mdo): gnod sbyin kau sde dpon chen po nyi shu nya brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gi sded dpon chen po laka na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin ke sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i
82b7(mdo): 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / lus myi gda' bar bgyis te/ myi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de ka la ba dang
82b8(mdo): chos spru 'do'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan lnga tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa me tog 'akram pa'i la la bshams par 'gyur ba gas pa der chos mnyan pa'i srad du mchi bar 'gyur ro// btsun 'a bcom ldan 'das bdag can
82b9(mdo): rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad 'thun par bgyis te/ myi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa/ dge ba 'thob par bgyid pa/ bla na myed pa
83a1(mdo): chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la/ chos 'dud ci'i zhu ma 'dis tshim par gyur da ma thag tu mya'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung bar 'gyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang
83a2(mdo): zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de yang kun tu 'asrung bar 'gyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs
83a3(mdo): su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// chad pa spang bar yang bgyi'o// yul de yang 'jigs pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su tha dad par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig myi'i rgyal por gyur da te/ myi'i
83a4(mdo): rgyal po de'i yul du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po di byung la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mya'i rgyal po de dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa
83a5(mdo): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la ste steng mi 'gyod su mi byed/ ma gyi byi ra tu byed 'atung brjo ba dang gad kyi kye khrag kyi rbag dum rjo pa du rtso sa ru 'dis chu kyang / 'o kyi y-i bum da na na pa me gyu gyi 'i dod kyar
83a6(mdo): rdzos kya kyi byed/ bdag cag go sus la gzi brjid dang / da pal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar myi 'gyid do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po 'an dpung dang
83a7(mdo): g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod spyir bye ba zhag zhis brgya gong zag tu ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar 'byo'o// btsun 'a bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul mganas tsam gA'i tshogs 'i
83a8(mdo): cad kyis kyang yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro// btsun la bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa myi bzad pa
83a9(mdo): ngag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul ma gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang / mtshang 'dru ba skye ba dang / rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dgongs pa dang 'gyed par 'gyur la dang / gza' dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul du
83b1(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun myi 'thun par gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung sla 'char ba na nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang nyi ma'i gza'
83b2(mdo): byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa yang rtag par rgyun tu sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su nam mkha' la 'ja'i kha dog lta bu 'khyim par 'gyur/ sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur
83b3(mdo): sa la gnas pa'i khron pa yang sgra 'byind pa yang grag par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char drag po 'bab par 'gyur/ yul du mu ge'i dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rold kyi dmag tshogs kyis yul
83b4(mdo): 'joms par 'gyur/ yul de phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams myi dka' bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po
83b5(mdo): bzhi dpung dpa g.yog tu bcas pa dang gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / yul na gnas po'i lha dang / klu rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul de de lta bu'i gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod
83b6(mdo): pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mA btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig myi'i rgyal por gyur da la/ de bdag nyid la kun tu bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur da/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs
83b7(mdo): yun ring por myong bar 'tshal bar gyur da/ bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid 'gyid 'tshal bar gyur da/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad 'deb bgyid 'tshal bar gyurapa/ pha rol
83b8(mdo): dpag tshogs thams cad pham khar 'gyid 'tshal bar gyurd/ yul thams cad yun ring du yongs su skyong 'tshal bar gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur da/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang
83b9(mdo): gnod pa dang / rad 'go ba dang / 'jug pa thams cad las yongs su tha rad par 'gyid 'jal bar gyur dan/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi'i rgyal po des gdon gyi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang nim/
84a1(mdo): rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ mdo'i sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa de dag la yang sti stang bgyi/ bra mar bgyi/ rim gro 'akye/ mchod
84a2(mdo): par bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i tsha ba bsachags pa 'di dang / chos bdud ci'i zhu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi'o// bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi karba
84a3(mdo): chen po yang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das myi'i rgyal po des gnon myi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bkyi ste/ btsun pa
84a4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang / gu rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed stan la ngag da 'i kyi yo yon gsu gesas
84a5(mdo): dag kau me sems can dag gi don slad du/ 'jig rten pa dpa'// jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa ji skad bstan pa/ pa dag pas ches mchog tu 'phags pa/ gser 'od dam pa mdol
84a6(mdo): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tsha ngas po'i dbang po brgya phrag stong de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba
84a7(mdo): khrag khrig brgya stong thams cad pas ches mchog ces byud par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can nams kyi don gyi slad du s+ya che ba yang dag par 'ashad la sags so// ji ltar 'jam bu'i klong thams gangan/
