186a7(mdo): kyim so// deg gi 'khod mas kyi phu pa de snyom lam po nga gis sku thams pa sa khye ngas nyid du mayos shA / pachogs po nga su 'a bdas byed pa rna pa
186a8(mdo): sa mas kyi sa sa ba na sa 'du nis s+ho /
186a9(mdo): bzhi na thamams car yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ dengs sams cad ma gyung ba'i byad bamings sa chom ma rim pa pa'i du sa par 'byung // dba'ang byor kyang chus sem papa'i yin pas sus
186b1(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi pha rolapa tu phyin pa 'thob par 'dod pa dang / dge 'a'i wa la rnam par dag pa 'jos par 'dod pas
186b2(mdo): phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba/ dam pa'i chos rnam par 'dzag pa'i dus der ting nge 'dzin 'di bri ba dang / lung mnod pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bsgrags par
186b3(mdo): bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes ni/ bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus so// sangs rgyas rjes su dram pa la
186b4(mdo): mkhas pa sgrub pas/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i rang ban du rtogs pa 'di ni langs rgyas rjes mya ngam 'i ste/ de la gnas pa'i chub sems dpa' rnams dmyigs pa thams cad sangs rgyas
186b5(mdo): dmyigs tha mos so// dmyigs pa thams cad de bzhin gegs pa'i mthar 'jug par byed do// mang ba'i dbang bldan/ pas dmyigs pa'i dngos po thams cad rab tu shes so// dngas
186b6(mdo): deshA ji ska de bzhis gshegs pa rnams dmyigs par byed pa dang / yid la byed 'a de ste de sa yong dag de bzhin gshegs pa bsod ba rnam pa ngan pa ste/ des nus marnas pa re sa mi phyogs gang tu yang
186b7(mdo): gshegs pa mngo nadu gyi 'gyur bskyed de/ rings mi phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa gsong ba rnas par myong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa gsong sa rnas par gan/ rims chung dus 'dzi na
186b8(mdo): sa 'di nyid du dbyis sa la byas na/ 'di nyid du de bzhin gshems pa de das mngon sum du mthong ba 'gyur ro// tshad byed pas de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong la yongs su ngas par 'gyur //
186b9(mdo): gshegs pa chad byeng pa rnam ma der phyis las du ldang bar 'gyur ro// dmyigs pa thams pa'i kyi rang bzhin ni gzu ba gyed pa'i phyir dgyigs pa gcig gis kyigs pa khams cad 'dzi nga ma yang ma yin/ dmyis pa'i
187a1(mdo): thams cad kyis dmyigs pa gcig 'dzind pa yang ma yin no// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nye bar brtags na shi nang tu nye bar zhi ba'i phyir dngos po myed pa nyid du grub pa'o// bzang skyong de lta bu la gnas pa de dag na/
187a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba rnam par nges par 'gyur la// rnam par dag nas kyang rlom sems su myi byed spros par myi byed de/ de dag ni bltar gi sangs rgyas mngon tu bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa'i di bsgos//
187a3(mdo): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// de bzhin
187a4(mdo): gshegs pas gang dag gsungs pa ni// ji lta bzhin du ye shes 'drug pa yin// de mi 'jig rten gtso bo stond pa'i sras// ting pe 'dzind 'di la ni yid kyang bcon// gang zhig sangs rgyas
187a5(mdo): dmyigs pa rjes dran pa// dmyigs pa'i don ni de ma mthong bar// 'gyur// de la ting 'jim zhi ba blta dkal 'di// phyi ma'i du// sa na mngon sum du yang 'gyur// mkhas pa gang zhig chos
187a6(mdo): kun gyi rten cing // sems can dag la phan phyi ma yid brtson pa// de dag phyi dus 'jigs pa chemapo'i che// ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni sbyor bar 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan zhing gzung
187a7(mdo): ba'i phyir// gang zhig rtag tu blta dka' chos 'odadi la// dran pa brtan par 'jog cing 'artson byed pa// de'i lag tu ting 'dzind 'di 'grol 'gyur// gang zhig dran dang blo gros rtogs pa dag/ sangs rgyas dmyig
187a8(mdo): par rtag tu 'jog byed cing // gzhan drin myi 'jog rnal 'byor brtson pa de// ting 'dzin chen po 'di la gnas par 'gyur// rjes su gzung phyir blta dka' tshig la gnas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni yid skyo zhi
187a9(mdo): mkhas pa srid pa thams cad kyi 'dod pa// de dag ting 'dzin pa che mapo 'dil 'acom// byang chul 'dod cing phan phyir snying 'che gang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku la rtos// zhi bo'i chos la smon lam 'debs
187b1(mdo): byed pa// de dag ting 'dzin pa 'di la brtan par 'artson// 'thab pa byed cing cod pa myed la zhe// bde 'am gshegs pas bstod pa'i chos tshol zhing // sadus rgyas dmyigs pa la mi rtag gnas pa// de dag ting 'dzin/
187b2(mdo): 'di la rtag brtson yin// gang dag phyi ma sdig pa'i dus de ma// ting nge 'dzind 'di la ni brtson byed pa// spyod pa'i yon tan mtha' yas la gnas pa// de'i yon tan 'jig rten mgon pos mkhyen pa// gang dag zag/
187b3(mdo): pa myed pa'i chos shes shing // shin tu tshul bzhin zag pa rnams kyang shes// rtog pa myed spyod mnyam po nyid gnas pa// de dag ting 'dzin 'di la rtag batshon yin// gang dag bde gshegs chos ni tshad myed la
187b4(mdo): shes bzhin du yang kun tu spom 'debs shing // kun mkhyen ye ge/ sa la ni brtan gnas pa// de la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bstan to// mtshan nyid myed cing mtshan nyid las kyang 'das// nyon mongs pa dang /
187b5(mdo): rnam dag gang yang myed// rang bzhin stong pa'i chos rnams ka/ de shes pa// de dag bde' bar gshegs pa tshad myed mthong // gang zhig dmyigs pa mtha' myed 'artson byed kyang // dmyigs
187b6(mdo): pa thams cad stong pa nyid du shes// blta bar dka' dag mthong na/ sa rlom sems myed/ des ni bde bar gshegs pa tshad myed mtho // gang zhig don mthong yid kyang rnam par dag/
187b7(mdo): nyon mongs myed cing zhi bo'i go 'phang gnas// rdul dang bral zhing mnyan don chos stond pa// de la ting 'dzind zhi ba 'di bshad do// bde gshegs sras po zug rngu phyung ba gang // bden pa ma nyams the tsom rnams dang bral
187b8(mdo): srog chags phan phyir byams pa bsgom byed pa// de dag la ni don mchog 'di bshad do// gang zhig rang bzhin gis ni ma ri ga bral// rig pas ma rig gnas pa'i sel byed cing // don mchog 'di la bcon par sbyor byed pa/
187b9(mdo): de la ting 'dzin du zhi ba 'di bshad do// rnam dag gnas shing kun nas nyon mongs myed// ye shes mtha' yas mngon par 'dod byed cing // des don 'di la mchog tu dag 'thob pa// de la rnam thar pa zhi ba 'di bshad do// /
188a1(mdo): gang zhig kun tu sbyor ba kun las grol// brtan zhing srog chags kun la snying ba che zhing // gnod sems myed cing zhi lam dga' bstan pa// de la ting 'dzin 'di ni yang dag bsgrags// / le'u nyi shu gnyis
188a2(mdo): pa'o// // bzang skyong chos 'di bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin pa 'di 'thob par 'gyur ba'o// bzhi gang zhe ma 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas la gus pa dang / myi byed
188a3(mdo): dang / yid la byed pa dang / chos la gus shing nyan 'dod pa dang / chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa ste/ bzang skyong chos de bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzind 'od 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzang /
188a4(mdo): skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ da la phyin ci log myed par sangs rgyas la dmyigs pa'i sems pa
188a5(mdo): dang chos la the tsom myed pas dmyigs pa'i ngo bo nyid rang bzhin/ gis dge ba la rtog pa dang / dngos po la mkhas pa la rtog pa sa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa rang bzhin gis stong pa shi nad du stong 'an
188a6(mdo): chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol pa dang / 'du shes rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa/ yongs su gcod pa shes pa la chog sa pas dngos po dab tsamarnam par 'jig pa ste/ 'thang sgo
188a7(mdo): chos de bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin pa 'di 'thob par 'gyur ba'o// bzang skyong gzham yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzi dang 'odi 'thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi'o// bzhig
188a8(mdo): e ma 'dri lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su 'azung ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzind pa la mkhas la dam pa'i chos sru zhing sbed pa dang / sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyor zhing sems can thams
188a9(mdo): ca la snyil pache ba'i sems dang / sems can gi 'du shes rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa ste/ 'bang skyong chos de bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ti pe 'dzin 'o 'jos par 'gyub 'a'o// 'a'ang skyo
188b1(mdo): de lta bas na phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos cher 'jug pa'i tshe der byang chub sems dpas lus dang srog kyang yongs su btang ba la gnas te ting nge 'dzin pa 'di gzung bar bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// bcang /
188b2(mdo): bar bya'o// bzang skyong chos thams cad gzung ba la mkhas pa la bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bsgrubs pa'i chos rin po che'i mdzod 'di
188b3(mdo): yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'jog par 'gyur// chos 'di lta bu 'di dag yang dag par bstand pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / yang dag par bsgrags par bya bar yang nus par 'gyur ro// bzang skyong byang chub
188b4(mdo): sems dpa' rnams la brtson 'grus kyis gnas 'di dag ni yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams pa nyon 'grus kyi byin gi rlabs kyi sa sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i mab yongs su sbyind par bya
188b5(mdo): ba'i phyir smon lam la 'jug par 'gyur ro// bzang skyong gang / zhig phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus der chos 'di dag 'jog par byed// yang dag par 'dzind par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig+sa
188b6(mdo): kyi bu mo de dag ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mazub ba dang / sems can thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
188b7(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'dug kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhug
188b8(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// de ni chos 'dod pa dang / chos don tu gnyer ba dang / chos sgrub pa'i phyir phyi mo'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na ting nge 'dzind 'di'i phyir bcon par 'gyu'o// /
188b9(mdo): gang dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus mchos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di 'dzind par 'gyur ba de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i nor rnams kyis yang dag par bzung bar 'gyur ro//
189a1(mdo): gang dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na chos 'di lta bu 'di dag yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur gde dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa 'azhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
189a2(mdo): 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang myu rab tu 'dzind par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang zhig brtan pa chos sems pas
189a3(mdo): phyi ma'i dus su gyur da pa ma// dam chos bzung phyir gnas 'gyur la// de dag la ni gzungs 'di bshad// gang dag dam chos rin cen phyir// 'jigs pa myed pa brtson byed cing // snying yang sel snying rje can/
189a4(mdo): de dag chos kyang 'dzind par gnas// brtan zhing bag yod dga' ba dang // thub pa chos kyi mdzod 'dzind pa// de dag don tu ting nge 'dzin nga// sangs rgyas bsngags pa bstand pa yin// gang zhig
189a5(mdo): sangs rgyas chos rgyal skyo pa yis// gang dag byin gis brlabs 'gyur la// de dag phyi dus 'jigs bcas tshe// chos nyid 'di ni 'dzind par 'gyur// shi nad tu ngobo nyid
189a6(mdo): kyis ni// chos rnams stong zhing spros myed par// dran dang lda na bag gis shes// de dag chos kyang 'dzind par 'gyur// mas cad chos kyi ngo bo nyid// 'dri las bsam yas tshigs
189a7(mdo): su bcad// nges pa nyid du shes 'gyur ba// de dag chos kyang 'dzind par 'gyur// zad pa shes las gnas gyurd cing // myi skye ba la'ang rab gnas la// sems ni dul zhing ngo tsha ldan// de dag chos
189a8(mdo): kyang 'dzind par 'gyur// bde ba'i lam ni bla na myed// cang shes lam la zhugs gyur pa// brtson 'grus byin kas rlabs dang ldan// de dag chos 'dzin gnas pa yin// de bzhin nyid dang myi rtog don//
189a9(mdo): gang gis chos nyid rab tu shes// de la smos pa ci yang myed de dag chos kyang 'dzind par 'gyur// thams cad chos ni byed myed par// nges pa gang gis shes pa de// mi yang myed cing len myed po'i// chos nyid de ni/
189b1(mdo): sgrogs par 'gyur// 'dzin pa myed cing 'dzin dang bral// chos kum sngon nas yong dag par// gang gis zhes pa de dag nI// chos kyi khyod yul gnas pa yin// chos kun po'i byed par ni// pre skar choms ga ng+ga/
189b2(mdo): shes// de ngas chos nyid 'di sto 'gyur// ro mi 'jug pa yin par bshang // gyi byed myeng dang bral gyur cing // spros pagyed cing myi skye bar// gang gis chos nyid rab shes par// de dag stong pa nyid kyang spogs// gnas
189b3(mdo): pamyed cing 'gro ba myed// nam mkha'i gnas bzhi mngag par mi// g.yogs chos 'di shes gyur dal// se la ting 'dzin skye bar 'gyur// gang rtag 'du shes rom rnam bral// ngo mo nyid du ma skyes shing // dngos po'i 'dra
189b4(mdo): sa thal gyur pa// dedag chos nyid smon pa par 'gyur/ gang pa de'i chu byed // dgongs pa'i tshig tu gsum la yi/ na shes gyur ba// de dag chos khyong 'di 'dzim 'gyur//
189b5(mdo): le'u gyi shu ma gsum pa'o// / rab myong de sgrubs ma rigs kyi chu lam/ rigs kyi bu mo ldan na/ la las songs sur blangs te/ chos 'di dag yang dag pa su
189b6(mdo): bya'o// 'di'i sen yom la yang myur bar bya'o// rgyal bzhi dang yang ldan par bya'o// tshus bzhin sa yin na yongs su mang bar byas/ des pa mchos thab mo bsku bar pa/ 'ar/ rtogs par bsa'i sa
189b7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skye bar byed pa/ rang 'byung rnams kyi ye shes dang / sogs pagyed pa'i ye shes 'thob par byed pa 'di rnyed par gyi dgal bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis che dang ldan pakumangs la
189b8(mdo): bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'azang skyong dang / is byim na nu cer 'byung gnas dang / phyis 'dag deb dpon me 'bang dang / nga dpo ka 'u phus 'as dang/
189b9(mdo): bram ze 'das zhum byin dang / byang chul sems dpa' dbang pos khyi ma dang / khyim bdag chu lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / 'khor bzhi po las mi snyed cig 'dus pa de dag thams cad dngas dang /
190a1(mdo): myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams la bka' yaHla dab/ rigs kyi bu rnams ngas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong du bsgrubs pa/ bla na myed pa'i chos rin po che'i mdzod dang / 'jig rten thes/
190a2(mdo): cad yid ches par myi 'gyur ba/ zab mo don zab pa rnam par thard pa gsum gi sgo'i tshul bshad pa zab mo// byang bar blta bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ mazhes shing shes pas rig pa/ rgya che ba/ gya nom pa/ don phun
190a3(mdo): sum tshogs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di yang khyed la gtang ngo // gang dag bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi nyen du 'gyur ba de dag kyang / khyed la nyis 'gyur du rjes su gtad kyis/ khyed kyis kyang ci nas kyang bri ra/
190a4(mdo): bya'o// mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// cang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// ginang tu rgyas pa dang / rgya cher bya ba'i phyir sazhamangs la yang skye cher 'ashad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o//
190a5(mdo): yang dag par bsgrags par bya'o// sems can thams cad rjes// su gzung ba'i phyir/ bsgom po'i sbyor la la bcon par bya'o// dzin/ da bstan pa bzhin du chos dang rjes su 'thun pa'i chos bsgrub par
190a6(mdo): bya ste/ do ce nas kyang skyes bu tha ma par ma gyur par bya'o// bzang skyong rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ka pa la ma zh-i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos la/ thos nas kyang lung mnod par byed/ kha thon du byed
190a7(mdo): kun chub par byed na/ des lhag pa'i bsam pas gus par bya ste/ mnyan par bya'o// lung nod par bya'o/ bshad par bya'o// gang dag gzhan dag la ston tam/ klog tu 'jug ma des kyang lhag pa'i bsam
190a8(mdo): pas rgya che bar bya ba'i phyir/ ci nas kyang ting nge 'dzin pa 'di yun ring du gnas pa dang / shi nad tu rgyas pa dang / shind tu rgya che bar gzhan dag la bstan par bya/ klog tu gzhug par bya ste/ 'di ni khyed la rjes
190a9(mdo): su bstadang pa yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can grangs myed tshad myed pa dag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge bo'i ma pa bskyed do// byang chub sems dpal
190b1(mdo): gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa nas 'dus pa'i gang ko'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis ting nge 'dzin pa 'di nyid thob ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur to// stong gsum gi spong /
190b2(mdo): chen po'i 'jig rten ki khams 'oda'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// lha rnams kyis kyang bar sA pa la me tog gi char phab bo// rnga ngag kyang ma brdungs par sgra byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlad pa da
190b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas po'i 'jig rten rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus
190b4(mdo): pa la yi rangs ste mngon par raga'o// da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon tu bzhugs po'o ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol// rdzogs s+ho// /
190b5(mdo): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ta thA ga ta gnya' na mu dran
190b6(mdo): ma sa dri ma hA yA na su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo'/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
190b7(mdo): thams cad lo phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po la zhab ma 'od ma'i tshal/ bya ka lan ta ka'i gnas na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
190b8(mdo): chen po dang/ byang chub sems da'a'abye ba phrag sum bcu thams cuk+sha gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzim thol pa/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin pa la gnas pa mtshan ma byed pa'i khyod su
190b9(mdo): smon lam bcos ma ma yin pa smon pa myed pa la gnas pa/ spyod lam bcos pa myed pa/ sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa/ mnyam pa nyid du bzod pa thob pa/ mnyam pa nyid thol pa/ thogs pa myod
191a1(mdo): gzungs zol ba// sems can thams cad gi dbang po'i mchog dang / mchog pa yin pa shes pa dang / bsam pa nga gyod pa'i tshul zhi nang tu zhes pa sa sug dang thabs gcig tu 'azhugs te/ de nas de'i tshe bcom sngam 'ang
191a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyi rlabs/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la/ 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gzugs myed pa/ bstan du myed pa/ gzung ba myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa/ snang ba myed pa/ rnam par rig pa myed pa/ nam/
191a3(mdo): par rig par bya ba ma yin pa/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ ma ba myed pa/ rten myed pa/ dmyigs su myed pa/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ mnyam pa myed pa/ zla myed pa/ nga'i ba myed pa
191a4(mdo): yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa/ myi bya ba/ ma byas pa/ ma song ba ma 'ongs pa/ 'gro ba myed pa/ myi gnas pa/ rgyun chad pa mye da pa/ gnas myed pa/ mtshan ma myed pa/ mtshan ma thams
191a5(mdo): ca dang bral lnga/ blang ba myed pa/ ror 'gyed nga / 'dus ma byas pa/ mngon par 'du myi byed pa 'du ba byed la/ bral ba skye dpa/ sems byed pa sems dang bras pa/ kun tu 'byung ba byed
191a6(mdo): 'thor pa myed pa/ yongs su grub pa byed pa/ ma byung kyi na tu ma byung ba/ rab tu tu bgyod pa/ yangangs par chub byed pa/ shin tu stong pa 'du babyed pa/ chos thams cams sgra btags pa byed pa
191a7(mdo): byed pa 'dis ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'dug pa'i gzungs kyi blo/ de ba'i na gshegs pa'i le shes kyi phyag mya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzir sa snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge dzing nge la sto
191a8(mdo): par zhugs ma phyag tu bcom ston 'das kyi sa kyi snang / rtswa'i mtshan ma yo kyi snang / sems dang / sems kyis so ma yod kyi ltung / na bka' dang / da 'azhi'i mtshan ma yang kyi 'ang / bdan dpa
191a9(mdo): mtsham ma yang kyi snang / gzims pa dpa ga sems pa'i mtshan sa yang gyi snang / 'chag pa dang 'chag pa'i mtshamam yang kyi ldang ba zhengs pa dang / 'azhengs pa'i mtshan ma yang gyi 'ang/ gams pa dang / ga rtso
191b1(mdo): mtshan ma yang myi snang / grib ma'i dbyings dang grib ma'i dbyings kyi mtshan ma yang myi snang / bzhugs pa dang bzhugs pa'i mtshan ma yang kyi snang zhing / sgra dang / sgra'i mtshan ma yang mya grag go// de nas ting nge 'dzin du de'i mthu/
191b2(mdo): dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gi 'arlabs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams 'od sngapa' chen pos khyab par gyur nas/ 'di lta bu'i 'od kyis snang bar byas te/ 'od des stong gsum me stong chen po'i 'dzag
191b3(mdo): rtem gi khams 'di na zla bo'i 'od kyis myi snga / nyi ma dang / skar dang / mye dang / nor bu dang / klog mi 'od rnams kyang kyi sdang / dri za rnams dang / myi'am ci rnams dang / 'dod pa ma dpyod pa dang / gzugs ma
191b4(mdo): spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / skar ma rnams dang / lha'i gzhal myed 'ang gi 'od kyang kyi sdang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'dzi/ rten skyong ba rnams kyi 'od kyang myi snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi byin/
191b5(mdo): kyi rlabs dang / ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus gang lha kha cig tu/ balha'i dri myo tshor te/ stong gsum yi stong chen po'i 'jig / nog khams 'di thams cad lho'i dri las shi nang tu 'das
191b6(mdo): po'i dris dri rab tu zhim par byas so// 'jig rten gi bar tham sa cad kyang sdang bar gyur du/ khor yug gau ro dang / zho ba yunakau ra chen po yang snang bar byas/ ri rab dang de ma yimapo'o/
191b7(mdo): ri gzhan dag dang / r-i nag po dag kyang snang bar gyur te/ phyis ni sems can gang ga myo ke go dbang po la yang snang bar ma gyur to// stong gsum go stong chen po'o 'jig rten ki khams 'odadi thams cad
191b8(mdo): kyang rin po che'i dra bas kun nas bskor bar gyur pa to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'od thams cad du yang dar gyi lnga lnga bris shing / pos snod nas spos kyis bdugs la me tog sna tshogs bkram par gyur/
191b9(mdo): to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka' gnas kyang bya rgod phung po'i raM dang / bcas te de dag thams cad lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyu rad cing / shide rta'i pha lo tsam ki rin po che swa
192a1(mdo): tshogs kyi pang ma chen po 'dab ma brgya stopa yod pa/ dri rab tu zhim zhing yid su 'ong bas kun gang bar gyur to// steng gi ser sA pa las kyang rim po che ledra ba'i gdugs kyis g.yogs shing brgya dang to//
192a2(mdo): yul ma ka da thams cad kyang gos ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar gyurd to// de nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang da/
192a3(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa tshad myed grangs myed/ dpag tu myed pa brgya stong rnams kyang so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang bskul te/ rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten ga
192a4(mdo): khams myi mjed du de bshi ga/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shika kya thub pazhes bya ba ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
192a5(mdo): chos kyang ston pa de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs po'i ye shes kyi bya/ ga rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
192a6(mdo): rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin de'i mying thos pa tsam gis kyang / byang chul sems dpa' rnams kyi ke ces spras byed par 'gyur te/ thabs ma khas pa myed par bskal pa brgya stong du pha rol tu phyind pa
192a7(mdo): dus la khyang ba ni de lta ma yin gis ting nge 'dzind de nyam bya re shis// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag so so'o de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lham mnyam nas/ bcom ldan
192a8(mdo): 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal te/ skad cig zang cig yud tsam gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ rang rang gi mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs ci skyed pas mi mjed kyi zhig te
192a9(mdo): ni khams 'di ga la ba dang / dbus kyi glib bzhi pa ga la ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling sa a la dang / rgyal po 'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ka la Sha dang / 'od mo'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka'i kan sa ma la ba dang / bcom
192b1(mdo): spyan 'das me bzhim mashegs pa ma cos la yang sa pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gas kyang thum pa mas 'ad 'ongs te lhags napa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa dag par/
192b2(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shug+sa kya bub pa'i zhabs la mumo khros phyag+sa 'chas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ la su gsum bsgom sa rgyas rasu phyogs gcig tu 'khong ngo // bcom ldam 'das kyis kAn
192b3(mdo): nas de dag thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad ma chen po la skyil mo krung bcas te 'khong ngo // de bzhin du sbyar te/ sgo phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyo/
192b4(mdo): rang / de bzhin du phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs pa tshams dang nye ba dang / phyogs bcu kum tu sangs rgyas kyi zhings ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
192b5(mdo): dpa' chen po bla ma myed pa ya spa ngas par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa tshang myed/ grangs kyi / sa myong pa brgya po/ bde ngas po mo 'i de bzhim gshegs pa
192b6(mdo): ngag gis bkye ste/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed du deng shig/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba pas
192b7(mdo): yang 'azhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa chos kyang ston pa de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul 'dug pa'i gzungs kyi no de ba'i na gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya nas rgya rol ting nge 'dzim sa goms par zhug pa/
192b8(mdo): ma mangs zhes la nas kyang sbyar pa pang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul 'jug pa la gzungs kyi sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i lags kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i dpung 'jams sems par zhugs pa// rigs kyi
192b9(mdo): ngang ti nge 'dzin pa de'i phyi zom pa tsam gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gces smras byed par 'gyur te/ khabs mkhas pa mye la bskal pa brgya stong du pha rol ba tu phyi rang la drug la bya la mims
193a1(mdo): yin gis ting nge 'dzind de nyam du deng shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag so so la de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal te skad
193a2(mdo): cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ rang rang gi mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul kyi stobs bskyed pas/ myi mched kyi 'jig rten gi khams 'di ka la ba dang dbus kyi gling bzhi pa
193a3(mdo): la ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling ka la la dang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga ya ba dang / 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas ka la ba dang / bcom ldam 'das de bzhin gshems la dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
193a4(mdo): sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
193a5(mdo): phyogs kacig tu 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis kanang na/ sa de dag thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi bang ma chen po la skye la mo krung bcas te 'khod do// stong gsum gi stong chen po
193a6(mdo): 'jig nyen gyi khams 'di ma dge slong gang dag nyam thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rab sangs rgyas kyi theb pa pa'am/ byang chub sem pa'i theg pa pa gnas pa yum so sor rgya ni dong ba de dag pas
193a7(mdo): cad kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis/ bya rgod kyi phum mo mig ya ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de 'ongs te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang tu yang ma mthong ngo // sa lathong nam
193a8(mdo): thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skar de bzhim gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ti 'dzinang 'di'i ko'i 'arjid kyi mthus skad cig tha cig yung tsam de nyid la 'ong ma'i tshal bya ka lan nga ka'i gnas su bcom ldan
193a9(mdo): 'das kyi 'khor gi dkyil 'khor du/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad bcu 'dus par gyur da te 'khod do// nyam thos 'bul zag gsum yang 'dus par gyur de te 'thong ngo // stong gsum sa gong che po'i 'dzis
193b1(mdo): ki khams 'di' brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gnang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu d+he da/ lga bres pad da lha'i dbang po rnams dang / klu thams cad dang / klu'i dbang po rnams dang / gnod sbyin
193b2(mdo): thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gi dbang po rnams dang / dri za thams cad dang / dri za'i dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin thams cad dang / lha ma yin gi dbang po rnams dang / nam mkha' lding thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi
193b3(mdo): dbang po rnams dang / mye 'am ci thams cad dang / myi'am ci'i dbang po rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams dang / mda' bzangs thams cad dang / mda' bzangs kyi nga
193b4(mdo): po rnams dang / de dag thams cad so so'i g.yog srog chags bye bakhrag khrim brgya stong mang po dang / 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka'iganas ka la la dang / bcom ldan 'das ka lA der 'ongs te
193b5(mdo): lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kang tu yang ma mthong ngo // ma mtho/ de nas thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// de'i tshe dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
193b6(mdo): chen po dang / nyam thos chen po dang / sga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong sa
193b7(mdo): dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ngag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di snyed du srid pa'i rtse mo man chad sa phyogs ka yang ma gang ba myed de/ tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha gzhag pa tsam yang
193b8(mdo): gabab myed par gyur da to// de nas gnas brtan sha ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gi bu chen po dang / gnas brtan gsus po che dang / ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu kang po dang /
193b9(mdo): gnas brtan rab 'byor nga dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la der dong ste phyin nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'odadi skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshes/
194a1(mdo): pa ltar gang ma bzhugs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshul 'di ci 'dra/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa de ci 'dra/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas nyan thob chen po de dag
194a2(mdo): la 'di skad ces smram mo// tshe dang ldan 'a das khyed thams cad kyang nyan thos chen po shes ral dang ldan la rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa/ mthu che ba dbang che ba/ mkhas pa chen po/ ting nge 'dzin da la dbang thob pa/ yun ring po rna
194a3(mdo): tshangs par spyod pa khyad pa yin na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag so so nas ting nge 'dzid la snyoms par zhugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs pa yongs su tshol cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
194a4(mdo): de ga la yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de mi 'dra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs pa mi 'dra ba yongs su chos cig/ de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin
194a5(mdo): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ stong gsum gi stong chen po la'o// jig rten gi khams thams cad du brtags te/ brtags kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang ma mthong / de bzhin gshegs
194a6(mdo): pa'i bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // de dag nyan thos chen po de dag kis/ de ltar stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di thams cad du brtags na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
194a7(mdo): yang ma mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs pa yang ma mthong nas/ rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal 'o
194a8(mdo): bo cag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs pa yang ma mthong ngo // de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas/ nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smraso//
194a9(mdo): de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos chen po khyed cang ma smra bar thal mo sbyor la sems rtse gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa yid la kyis te skad cig sdod cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma
194b1(mdo): bzhugs la yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang mkhyend pa bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de lam bzhengs so// bcom ldan 'das ting pe 'dzind de las bzhengs ma thag tu/ stob gsum gyi stong chen po la 'jig rten
194b2(mdo): gi khams 'di rnam pa drug dang / ltas bco brgyad du g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kum tu rab tu 'gul lo// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kum tu rab tu ldeg go// 'khrugs rab tu
194b3(mdo): 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// 6 sa pa mamagyur ro// chem chem rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// shi nang tu lam me/ shi nad tu ta le/ shi nad tu lhang nge'o// bcom ldan 'das
194b4(mdo): mchod pa'i phyim yA'i me tog gi char mngon par bab cing / lha'i si ye da snyan dang klu dbyangs kyang lend to// de nas tshe dang ldam pa sha ra dwa ti bu skams sa langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzam nas
194b5(mdo): pum mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'ang/ sa ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom lda/ ma 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
194b6(mdo): ting nge 'dzind gang la zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nyan thom chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyag kris kyi mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'o ci 'dra/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhim gshegs po'i 'azhug
194b7(mdo): pa po ci 'dra/ de skad ces ka mo lang pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' saHya to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting 'dzinang 'di ni nyam thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
194b8(mdo): khyim ma yin gyi/ sharadwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / cho 'phrul chen po 'di mi byasas gis kyi rgyal lo// 'od kyang sha ra dwa ti'i bu legs par rab tu nyos
194b9(mdo): yid la zung zhig dang / de bzhim gshegs pa'i sku'i phyogs tsam zhig ngas khyod la bgang de bstan to// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol ngo to tshe dang ldan mazhar dwa ti'i bu chom ldan 'das kyis ca
195a1(mdo): de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' saHsa to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag pa nyid de ni myi ga thams cad kyi lam las yang dag par 'das pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/
195a2(mdo): de ni lus myed pa/ ma byas pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ ma byung ba/ yang dag par ma byung ba/ rab tu ma byung ba thob pa myed pa gdags pa myed pa/ ma zhugs pa/ mngon par ma grub pa/ mtha' myed pa/ mu myed pa/ zhi
195a3(mdo): rab tu zhi za/ nye bar zhi ba/ gnas myed pa/ skye ba myed pa/ tshig gi lam ma yin pa/ rnam par rig pa myed pa/ kun tu 'byung ba myed pa/ rgyu ba myed pa/ rab tu rgyu ba myed pa/ rgyu ba dang bral ba/ shinang tu rnam
195a4(mdo): de per rje gzung rjo ga g.yo lde khyon byod pa/ ches rjeg phye ma' rdze ni byin rdze mngam gan thoyod pa ma yin pa dran pa ma yin pa/ ma bsdams pa/ ma myangs pa/ ma
195a5(mdo): mthong ba/ rnam par rig pa myed pa/ rnam par rig par bya ba ma/ yin pa/ rnam par rig pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid/ sems myed pa/ bsam gis myi khyab pa/ bsamakhar bya ba ma yin pa/ sems

195b9(mdo): mtshan ma myed pa/ mtshan ma myed pa ma yin pa/ mtshan gis brgya nad pa/ sgo myed pa/ myi chags pa/ chags pa dang bral ba dad par byed pa/ sbyar ba myed pa/ sbyar ba dang bral ba/ bde bar byed pa/ mchog tu
196a1(mdo): tu dga' bar byed pa/ skye mched drug las grol ba myi snang ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis rab tu phye ba/ de kho na nyid/ de bzhin nyid/ sems can rnams myi sgrol ba'i tshul gis sgrol bar sems can rnams myi 'grol ba
196a2(mdo): tshul gis 'grol la/ sems can rnams yongs su myi skyong ba'i tshul gis sbyong ba/ sems can la myi skyob pa'i tshul gis skyob pa/ gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gis sems can rnams la chos stond pa/ mnyam pa myed pa/ myi mnye
196a3(mdo): gdang mnyam pa/ 'dra 'a gyed la/ zla myed la/ kyi 'chi ba dang mnyam pa/ nam mkhal dang mnyam pa/ gnas myed pa dang mnyam la/ shind tu mnyam la/ ma skyes pa/ skye ba myed pa dang mnyam pa/ myi dmyigs pa myi/
