271a6(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas klu'i rigs mchog nges pa 'das pa'i 'og tu/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes 'od ces bya ba 'di bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
271a7(mdo): rgya bar gyur te/ mtshan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'od ces bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhes/ byang chub sems dpal ye shes 'od ces bya gsung bstan nas yongs su
271a8(mdo): mya ngam mas 'dab 'o// 'od srung de ji snyam du sems / de'i mde'i dus ma 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam pa zhes bya ba dem/ de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs mchog ces bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin mo snyam
271a9(mdo): 'od srung khyod kyis de ltar gyi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung 'jas dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas klu'i rigs mchod
271b1(mdo): bya bar gyur to// 'od srub dpa' bar 'gro ba skyes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzid kyi sus la s+hob/ ji snya sangs du 'jug pa dang / ma pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' 'gyod pa dang / byang chub kyi mi ra/
271b2(mdo): 'gro ba dang / 'dud 'dul ba dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'a rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po dang / rang 'bres 'gyed pa ma yang skon da la byang chub sems pas
271b3(mdo): chos nyid par gyi 'dod/ shinang tu yongs su mya nganasas 'das ras kya yo mas mya ngan mam gyi 'do'o// dedapa gnas gtan 'od srung chen pos 'jas dpal gzhon nur gyur pal 'di skad ces smrab mo//
271b4(mdo): 'jam dpal gang khyod 'di lta bur bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i gnas ngag ston pa ni khyod dka' ba byed pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung de ji snyam du sems/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri
271b5(mdo): 'di gang nas byung / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kang nas byung / smras pa 'jim pa yin gyi khams thams cad ni dbu ba ltar byung ste/ sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smyon pa bsam gyis kyi
271b6(mdo): bas mngon par grub bo// 'jas dpal kyis smras pa/ btsun 'od srung chen po de bzhin te/ chos thams cad kyang mas kyi rnam pa sbyin pa bsam gyis kyi khyal pa las byung ngo // de bas ma 'di'o//
271b7(mdo): bo la bya dga' ba byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams pan bcos su rgyal rag las pa bems po ste de dag mi bdag po myed pa'i phyir/ de ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par bskul mo// gang gi tshul de rtogs pa
271b8(mdo): despun/ bya ga/ ma ma yang byed do// brlad pa 'od su chen po gang dag 'dod pa ma mthong ba de dag ni tshul 'di la mos pazhin tu/ bya ka' ba yin gyi/ bde pa mthong ba de dag gi ches la gnas pa'i rnam par 'jam
271b9(mdo): ba ni de lta ma yin te/ de dag ni ngo mtshar gyi che'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das steng kyi bar sna ba la shing ta la bdun tsam du 'phags nas/ skyil lo bkrung du bzhugs shing sku las kyang 'od gang gis phyog pa
272a1(mdo): bcu thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed grangs myed pa snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od btang ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des phyogs bcu ma sangs rgyas bcom ldam 'das dpag tu myed grangs
272a2(mdo): byed pa dag dpa' bar 'gro ba'o ting nge 'dzin pa 'odi 'chad par mtho // chos 'chad pa de yang lhag chad myed cing lhag pa myed pa 'di nas zos so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang steng ki bar sna
272a3(mdo): la shing ta la/ bdun tsam du 'phags nas/ skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs par sdang ngo // de dag thams cad kyis kyang sku las 'od btang bar snang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldam 'das de dag gi 'khor gapa yin pa des kyang /
272a4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa steng gyi bar sna ba la// skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs par mthong ngo // de nas thams cad dang lnga na po'i 'khor des/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
272a5(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shaka kya thub ga la ba der me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dag kyang 'thor bar snang ngo // me tog de dag kyang song ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i stug gi steng
272a6(mdo): kyi drang thad na/ me tog gi gdugs su 'dug par snang ngo // gsang sa rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam/
272a7(mdo): mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba der me tog dag 'thor ro// me tog de dag thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dbu'i
272a8(mdo): phug kau steng gi drang zad na/ me tog gi gdugs su 'dug par snang ngo po// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de dag bsdus ste/ bdan ji ltar bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
272a9(mdo): brtan pa la bka' saHsad pa// blo gros brtan pa sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba spel ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba'i cho 'phrul de bzhin gshegs pas bstan to// blo gros brtan pa
272b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i cho 'phrul 'dis/ lha dang / myi brgyad stong kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzind 'di'i mthar phyind pa dang / mur
272b2(mdo): zug pa bstand pa bshad pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyu ra to// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan lnga brgyas kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di
272b3(mdo): zo' ma thag tu phyogs bcur sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang mthong bar gyur to// chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa la yang snang ba thob par gyur to// sa bcu pa yang thob cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thos
272b4(mdo): cad la dbang bskur ba yang thob bo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// snang ba chen po sa kyang khyab par gyur da to// sted kyi bar sna la lha'i sis snyan brgya
272b5(mdo): stong dag kyang dkrol bar gyurd to// me tog gi char yang bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' saHlad pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzind
272b6(mdo): long shig/ zung shig/ klogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shi ga/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher shod cig// de nas bcom ldan 'das la ba rgya byin ri rab lhun po che mo 'dzin kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
272b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ci lags gnas gtan kun dka' bo dran pa'i ye shes phyogs gcig pa dang ldan pa pha rold kyi sgra'i rjes su mchis pa la/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog 'di 'thad par mdzad dam/ bcom
272b8(mdo): ldan 'das bdag gi bden pa'i tshig gi 'des pa gang gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzid nga 'di da skar dang / phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya tha ma la rgyas par 'gyid pa'i 'den pa'i tshig bdes la des/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro la khor
272b9(mdo): khor yug na shing gang dag mchis pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi snying po'i shing ji lta ba bzhin du gyur da cig/ de dag thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' gnas par gda' bar gyur da cig/
273a1(mdo): brgya byin sum po'i tshe mo 'dzin gyis tshig de smras ma theg tu/ de nas de'i tshe/ gli de dag thams cad byung chub kyi snying po'i gang 'dra bar gyur to// byang chub kyi snying po'i gi de dag thams cad kyi rlung sa byang chub sems pa
273a2(mdo): rnams gnas par yang spa 'o// byang chub kyi ming po'i gang dag las brgya byir phur po'i me mo 'dzin pa khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ bltar ngangaphyi ba'i tshel myong dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dkon mtshon
273a3(mdo): 'di rgyu bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes spa byung ngo // re ras lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dr-i za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis 'grin gcig tu tshig smras pa/
273a4(mdo): gal te de bzhin gshegs po'i sku tshe bskal par gnas par gyur pa la nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te chos bshad nas/ chos bshad pa de rerare zhing yang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas ses
273a5(mdo): can ji snyed 'dul ba de snyed kyi sems can dul bar gyur da ba bas// gang yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams kyi don 'gyes pa ni de bas 'od ches mchog lakra/
273a6(mdo): so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems canade dag mas cad ni nyan thos kyi theg par btul ba lags te/ byang chub se mas dpa'i 'dul ba'i char yang nye bar myi mchi ba nas/ rgyu'i ba
273a7(mdo): du yang nye bar myi mchi ste/ gang tu byang chub sems dpa' dag nges par byung ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin de ni de tsam du tshad ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
273a8(mdo): de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' nges par 'byung ba'i lam thams cad kyis nges par 'byung bar 'chal bas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa 'di la 'thon par 'gyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
273a9(mdo): dpa' bre gros brtan pas/ 'od skad ces gsosad to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad ni ci tsam lags/ ji srid na de bzhin gshegs pa shi nad tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yong su mya ngan
273b1(mdo): mams 'das par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' mams dpa/ rlo gros btad pagar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di rnas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum khri nyis spob 'das lam/ 'jig rter gi khams rnam par skur
273b2(mdo): pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnal par sngang mdzad 'od gzer gyis brgyan pa/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ basbyar 'aro la gzhes shisangs rgya
273b3(mdo): zher te/ bro gros brta pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'ong zer kyis brgya yangs par 'phrul ba ra tsho'i mapo tsam para'i mo 'i nad kyang ngemal mo// tho gros brtan pas gsosang pan/
273b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sdang mdzad 'od zer kyis brgyam pa rnas par 'phrul po'i rgyal po de'i sku tshe'i tsha ji tsam sa dgas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa ya pa/ blo gros brtam
273b5(mdo): ba khyod song la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od// zer gyis brgyan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de nyid la zhus shig/ dang / de nyid khyod la lam 'debs par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub
273b6(mdo): sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / ting pe'irje na kyi mthu dang / bdag gi dge ba'i pha bo'i stobs bskyed pas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'jig rten go khams rnam par sdud pa/
273b7(mdo): zhes bya bar song ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer gyis brgyan pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskon/
273b8(mdo): te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku tshe'i tshad ci tsam lags/ ji srid na shi nad tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan
273b9(mdo): las 'da' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' maHla pa/ blo gros brtan pa/ bcom ldan 'das gas kyi thub pa'i sku'i tshe'i tshad mo ji tsam pa bzhin te/ blo gros brtan pa tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa grangs myed pa/
274a1(mdo): bdun brgya'o// nga'i tshe tshad ji tsam la bcom ldan 'das shaka kya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtam pas ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ yang bcom ldam 'das de bzhi ma gshes
274a2(mdo): pa rnam par snang mdza 'od zer gyis brgyan pa rnam par 'phrul po'i rgyal po'i zhabs la/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor te/ skad cig zang cig yud tsam de nyid la myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gi khams su 'ongs nas bcom
274a3(mdo): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer gyis brgyan pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po de'i sku tshe'i tshad mi bskalang pa grangs ma mchis
274a4(mdo): pa bdun brgya lags te/ nga'i tshe tshad ji tsam la bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam mo zhes bka' aHlad to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las
274a5(mdo): langs ste/ ma gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo// g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das pa/ la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan
274a6(mdo): 'das la 'di skad ces gsos pa to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang po'i don padag gis 'tshal pa dang / bdag ji ltar sems pa lhur na/ bcom ldan 'das
274a7(mdo): nyid 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par sdud pa de'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer gyis brgya nang pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po zhes bkyi bu de lags te/ mtshan de nyid kyis sems can rnams
274a8(mdo): sa pa pa dang / dre ba'i slang du/ na 'chang snyam bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang lnga ba rmongs po la leg pa des byar gyim sa/ soms sogs so// kun dga' 'i khyod sangs rgyas kyi
274a9(mdo): mthus rab tu shes so// nga nyid de yin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsdud pa zhes bya ba de na/ sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir mying de nyid kyis chos 'chad do// kun dga' bo de yang dpa'
274b1(mdo): bar 'gro ba 'i ting nge 'dzin kyi rnam par 'phrul ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' tho gros brtanams bka' yas pa/ tho thos brnam pa de skam na pa'i tshe mi tshad mi bskal la grangs
274b2(mdo): byed pa bdun brgya ste/ de'i 'og tu shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// thams cad dang sdam pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad 'di thos nas/ mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad
274b3(mdo): ces ngo mtsharang to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das che ba'i bdag nyid rnams kyis bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul dang / yon tan gyi khyad par bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i thugs su chud
274b4(mdo): pa dang / spyod pa'i khyu mchog tu gyu rang pa thams cad ngo mtsharade skar bcom ldan 'das zhag kyi thul ba'i sku tshe'i tshad bskas dgrangs myed pa 'dun brgya lags na/ myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
274b5(mdo): khams 'dir ni sku tshe thung bar gang 'o// sems can thams cad kyi tshe'i tshad 'ong dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i tong pa'odzim 'a/ pi thob par shog shig ces smras so// de nas bcom ldam 'dra
274b6(mdo): kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan la la bka la saHla po/ blo gros brtam sa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin bshad pa 'di grong dam/ grong khyer ram/ yul lam/ spongs sam/ gtsug lag
274b7(mdo): khang ngam/ dgon pa yang rung ste/ gang tu spyod par 'gyur ba der bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha grags blta zhing / klan ka tshol ba dag gis glags rnyed par myi 'gyur ro// bre gros brtan pa chos smra ba de yang dang
274b8(mdo): bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin yi ger 'dri 'am/ klog gam/ lung nod dam/ kha khron byed dam/ 'chang ma myi 'am myi ma yin pa las 'jigs par myi 'gyur bar re bar bya ba'i steng du/ de yon tan gi bye brag bsam kr-i
274b9(mdo): gyi khyab pa nyi shu thob par re bar bya'o// nyi shu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bsod nams bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / shes rab bsam gis myi khyab pa dang / thabs bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / spobs pa bsam
275a1(mdo): gyis myi khyab pa dang / chos snang ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / chos kyi sgor 'jug pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / dran pa dang / bre gros dang /
275a2(mdo): rtogs pa'i snod bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / mngon par shes pa bsgrubs pa bsams kyis myi khyab pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi skad la 'jug pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / sems can gyi gyod pa
275a3(mdo): dang / bsam pa 'jug pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / chos thos pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / sems can yongs su smyin par byed pa bsam gis myi khyab pa
275a4(mdo): dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gis myi phyal pa dang / zhing kyi yon tan bkod pa'i yon tan bsgrub pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / gzungs dang mtshan mdzes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa
275a5(mdo): dang / bsngags pa dang / yon tan dang / snyan pa dang brjod pa bas/ ma gyis myi khyab pa dang / pha rold tu phyind pa sbyangs pa bsam/ gyis myi khyab pa dang / chos rtogs pa bsam gis myi khyab pa ste/
275a6(mdo): blo gros brtan pa chog smra ba dpal bar 'gro ba'i ting pe 'jima'os bcom pa ya~M kai ra 'dri 'am/ klog gam/ lung nong ngam/ zon byed dam/ ston na yon tan gyi bye brag bsam gyis kyi rgya
275a7(mdo): pa nyi shu po de dag yongs su 'dzind to// blo gros brtam pa de lta bas ma rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'di 'am/ tshe rabs gzham la yom tan yongs su 'dzind par 'dod pas/ dpal 'ar 'gro ba'i
275a8(mdo): tring nge 'dzi ning 'di yi ker bri ba dang / klag pa dang lung nod pa dang / kha blon bya ba dang / bshad pa la bcom par bya'o// blo gros brtam pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pas bskul pa brgya zan
275a9(mdo): stong du pha rold tu phyind pa drug myod pa bas gang gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thos ma thag tu sems ma zhum la/ myi skrag/ myi dngang / dngang bar myi 'gyur zhing mom par byed na/ de ni ches myu ra tu bla na
275b1(mdo): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur na// ka gis thos nas lung 'bog pa'am/ gzham la 'chad par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis myi khyab pa zos
275b2(mdo): nas/ myi 'jigs par 'dod nas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzind dkon mchog 'di mnyan par bya'o// ma thos pa'i chos rnams thos nas myi spong bar 'dod pa dang / ldem po dag rtogs par 'dod pa dang /
275b3(mdo): ye shes mngon gsu na gyu sog ma 'dod pa sa/ sa 'o / hrI TI 'dzin 'di la so rlo yang 'gro ba'i ting pe 'dzind/ 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can grangs myed tshad myed pa bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhug so
275b4(mdo): gang byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa ni de bas kyang shin da tu tshad myed do// gang dag bzod pa thob par gyur pa ni de sa kyang shi nang tu tshad myed do// skye ba gcig gis thogs pa
275b5(mdo): tshad myed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' khri brgyad/ stong gis ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo// sro// ka chags brkyang khri drug stong gso na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzos
275b6(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dge slong dang / dge slong ma nyi khri brgyang stong mi lend pa myed par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma brgyad khri drug go/
275b7(mdo): ni chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// swa khrag khrig phrag sum bcu rtsa drug gis chos mngon par rtogs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpas gzhon
275b8(mdo): nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol ngo to// bcom ldam 'das don las skyes pa'i tshig ji lta bu dag gis ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'das pa
275b9(mdo): rnams kyi bslab pa slob cing / lobs nas spobs pa rgyun myi 'chad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dom las skyes pa'i tshig bdag la bshad du gsol// don las skyes pa'i tshig ji lta bus gzungs/ thob
276a1(mdo): 'gyur ba'i don las skyes pa'i tshig de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsoyang // de ni skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang / skye bo phal lo//
276a2(mdo): che dang / lha dang / myi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bdel ba dang / gang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag phyi ma'i tshe/ phyi ma'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba du
276a3(mdo): mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i chos nub nas slar yang de dag chos kyi sgom ma 'bar bar 'gyid pa dang / dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin
276a4(mdo): pa'i slad du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad kyi dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid mthong ba dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams tshar gcad par 'gyur ba dang / mu stegs can
276a5(mdo): gzhan spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu dag tshar gcod cing 'jom par 'gyur ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad myi dmyig sa pa'i 'khor so dang / ma g.yos pa'i 'khor lo dang / mya
276a6(mdo): gnas pa'i 'khor lo dang / ma 'dres pa'i 'khor lo dang / brnyas pa la 'khor lo dang / stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lo dang / mnam myed pa'i 'khor lo dang / smond pa myed pa'i 'khor lo dang
276a7(mdo): tsham nyid myed pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo dang / tshig dang yi ge'i don yang dag par bstan po la 'khor lo dang / mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i 'khor lo dang / brjod du byed pa'i 'jo
276a8(mdo): lo dang / phye ste brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi 'khor lo dang / don mnyam par bstan pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos rnams smos pa'i 'khor lo dang / sgril pa byed do//
276a9(mdo): 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad la myi chags pa'i 'khor lo ngag gi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rjes su skor bar 'gyur la/ 'khor lo re bskor ma thag tu lha dang / phyir bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'jigs shing
276b1(mdo): spangs par 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gang mngon pa'i nga rgyal can thams cad dang / mu stegs can gzhan pyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyulas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis la lags pa'i don las skyes pa'i
276b2(mdo): cig rgya cher bshang du gsol// de ni lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gi snang bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldam 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur la
276b3(mdo): 'di skad ces zuga'i mas to 'das dpas khyong de bzhin gshegs pa la ngo zhu bar sems pa legs so// sregs s+ho// khyod ri skye bo mang sol yim pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jos tem sa sa
276b4(mdo): 'che ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang myi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba dang / da star dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub som sa dpa' rnams kyi don kyi phyir zhugs pa yin no// 'jam dpal/
276b5(mdo): khyod gsos la 'dres pa'i tshis/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus skyes so// 'jam dpal ngo'i phyim legs par rab tu nyon/ ya yid la zhung zhig dang / bshad do// bcom ldam 'das lem
276b6(mdo): so zhes gsold te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rad pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' saHsad to// 'jam dpal chos thams cad rgyu
276b7(mdo): myed pa'i phyir myi gnas pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug myed pa'i phyir yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni rnam par
276b8(mdo): rtog pa myed pa'i phyir myi dmyigs pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad myi 'khrugs pa'i phyir kun nas slong ba myed pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'bral ba myed pa'i phyir ma 'khrugs pa'o// 'jam
276b9(mdo): dpal chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa'i phyir dbyer myed pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'odi lta ste/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i phyir 'du shes myed pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni myed pa'i
277a1(mdo): phyir mtshan nyid myed pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ 'du byed myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ya ma rla'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ sems can myi dmyigs pa'i phyir
277a2(mdo): mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni byed pa po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni myig myi dmyigs pa'i phyir mthong ba po myed pa'o//
277a3(mdo): 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni sems ni myi dmyigs pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni tshad myed pa'i phyir mthal yas pa'i mu'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad
277a4(mdo): ni 'di lta ste/ sems can chad myed pa'i phyir tshad myed pa'o// rngam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ gnyen po myi dmyigs po'i phyir sgrib pa myed pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni
277a5(mdo): 'di lta ste mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gnyen po myed pa'o// 'ja/ ma dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs pa myi dmyig/ sa pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni
277a6(mdo): 'di lta ste/ tha ma dang mchog dang / mtshungs pa myi dmyigs pa 'i phyir sna tshogs pa myed pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ myi 'ong ba'i phyir myi 'pho ba'o// 'jam dpal
277a7(mdo): chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste 'byung ba myed pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste dus gsum mnyam pa'i phyir ltos pa myed pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di
277a8(mdo): sta ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba myi dmyigs pa DI dus gsum las 'das pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'odi lta ste/ dbye ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu'o// 'jam
277a9(mdo): dpal chos thams cad ni 'odi lte ste/ rnam par 'jig pa myed pa'i phyir g.yo ba myed pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par mi rig pa'i phyir/ ma zhig pa'o//
277b1(mdo): 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ myi dmyigs pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa yin te/ 'jam dpal ma chags pa'i tshig de dag ni mtshan ma myed pa'i tshig go// ma spros pa'i tshig go// rnyog
277b2(mdo): ba myed pa'i tshig go// ma nor ba'i tshig go// ma g.yos pa'i tshig go// myi 'phrogs pa'i tshig go phas kyi rgos pa thams cad zil kyis myi nonang pa'o// nga rgyal can thams cad kyis zil gyis ma nond pa'o// 'di
277b3(mdo): ni mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyis ma yin no// dmyigs par lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / mtshan mar lta ba rnams kyis ma yin no// sems can 'du byed spyod
277b4(mdo): pa thams cad kyis ma yin no// 'jam dpal de dag ni ngon las skyes pa'i tshig rnams yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni der shes rab kyi stobs skyed pa thob cing / chos thams cad
277b5(mdo): kyang rtogs par khong du chud pa yin no// 'jam dpal byang // chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gnas pa/ de lta// ra zhugs pa dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams spobs
277b6(mdo): panye bar sgrub bo// 'jam dpal 'di sa ste dper na/ r-i gas kyi rgyal po seng ge'i ral pa can rigs btsun pa na~M/ pa/ rkang bzhi pa 'ongs pa thams cad kyis myi 'jigs kyi spang
277b7(mdo): skrag par myi 'gyur te/ za na spu zing zhes bye ba tsam du yang myi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi dmyigs pa 'di lta bu dag la bslabs par gyu rang pa ni/ phas
277b8(mdo): kyi rgol ba dang / kun tu rgyu dmyigs par lta ba can thams cad nas/ mngon par 'du byed pa can dag ge bar la myi 'jigs/ myi sdang skrab par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i'o byor zhe na/ de ltar seng ge'i sgra chen
277b9(mdo): po sgrogs pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang chos thams cad la myi gnas pa'i phyir yon tan gyi bye brag de 'dra bar 'gyur na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
278a1(mdo): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa rnams lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' maHla da te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang
278a2(mdo): ka/ skad gsungs so// chos rnams thams cad myi gnas te/ rang bzhin gis ni dben pa'i phyir// de dag gi ni gnas myed de// de phyir gnas pa myed ces bya// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal khas// de ngas
278a3(mdo): dngos po yod ma yin// kang na dngos po myed 'gyur ba// de ni chos kyi rnam dag yin// dngos po yod pa ma yin pas// de na chags pa myed pa yin// gang na chags pa myed gyurd pa// de'i phyir ni gzus
278a4(mdo): shes bya// chos rnams thams cad de 'dra ste// de na tshig ni yod ma yin// chos rnams mang po'i rgya mtsho ni// de ni gzungs zhes gsungs pa yin// gang na dngos po myed gyur pa// de na
278a5(mdo): de yang myi rtogs ste// gang na bdag tu myi rtogs pa// zungs nyid yin par shes par gyis// chos kun nye bar zhi pa/ ste// rang bzhin gyis ni mtshan nyid myed// ka zhig ye ste
278a6(mdo): der 'jug pa// de ma yang gzungs ni mAr du thob// chos mas thams cad g.yo ba myed// de na 'jig rten byed pa ste/ gang ma 'jog rten yod kyir pa// do ni gzungs zhes bya ba yin//
278a7(mdo): chos kun grub pa byed pa ste// gang na dngos po myed pa dang // ka na mi yang grub myed pa// do ni gzungs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad gzung du byed// de la thog ma yod ma yis// ka /
278a8(mdo): thog ma myed gyurd pa// de phyi gzungs su shes par byas// chos rnams thams cad ma skyes te// rtog pa las ni kun tu byung // gang na rtog pa myed gyu rang pa// de phyir gzungs su shes par ni
278a9(mdo): chos rnams thams car byed par gnas/ kyi rtog pas ni bsam pa me// 'dil 'askam pa cung zad kyis// des ma bstan ces bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad ma 'dres ste// 'ongs ngobo nyid kyi
278b1(mdo): byed// gang na chos su dmyigs myed pa// de ni de mtha dad myed// chos rnams thams cad ma chags ste// de ni nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra// chos kyi rang bzhin de yin te// gzungs shes bya ba/
278b2(mdo): de yin no// chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid gcig/ 'di ma gcig kyang myed pa ste// 'di ma rang bzhin tha dad byed// de bas de dag mtshan nyid gcig/ chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid myed// de ni
278b3(mdo): dngos po myed pa ste// gang na dngos po myed gyur pa// de phyir gzungs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad dben pas na// de na ngo bo nyid myed de// gang na dngos po myi dmyigs pa// de ni gzungs
278b4(mdo): su shes par gyis// chos rnams thams cad myi gnas te/ ldang bar byed pa'ang myed pa yin// gang na ldang ba myed gyur pa// de ni mya ngan 'das shes bya// chos kun mngom par 'dus ma byas
278b5(mdo): sems can dag kyang de na myed// sems can rang bzhin ka/ nga yin pa// de ni gzungs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams// thams cad ma byas te// byed pa po yang de na myed// gang
278b6(mdo): ngag las kyi bya ba myed// de ni gzungs shes bya ba yin// myig ni yod pa ma yin pas// chos rnams thams cad mtho nga ba myed// ka na myig ni myi dmyigs pa// de na myed ces
278b7(mdo): bya ba yin// sems ni yod pa ma yin pas// chos rnams rnam par shes dang bral// sems dang shes pa myed pas na// rnam par shes pa myed pa yin// gang na shes dang de bzhin du// myi /
278b8(mdo): pa'ang myed pa dang // kang na sems ni yod ma yin// de tsam gis ni ye shes so// ji tsam du ni rnam rtog pa// ye shes dang ni myi shes 'gyur// rtog pa sgrub pa myed gyur da na// de la ye shes/
278b9(mdo): zhes kyang bya/ chos rnams thams cad dngos po myed// mying tsam du yang bshad pa ste// ye shes dang ni myi shes pa// de yang de bzhin shes par gyis// chos rnams thams cad myed pa ste/ de ma
279a1(mdo): mi ya ba yod ma yin// gangan chos rnams yod ma yin// de ni chos kyi mchog yin no// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis// char myed par mi bstan pa ste// sems can rang bzhin
279a2(mdo): gang yin pa// de ni gzungs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad gsog yin te// de la snying po yod ma yin/ gang na snying po yod myin pa// de ni gzungs kyi mtshan nyid yin// chos rnams thams
279a3(mdo): cad gnyen po myed// de ltar mtshan nyid gcig pa ste// mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams kyi// gnyen po yod pa ma yin no// chos kun bye brag myed pa ste// dam pa dang ni tha ma myed// 'di la 'dra ba ga sa
279a4(mdo): myed// de'i phyir ni gzungs shes bya// mtshungs shing mnyam parazhugs pas na// chos kun la mi sna tshogs myed// gang mas gas yod myin ma// de ni gzungs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams
279a5(mdo): thams cad myed pas na// 'di ni 'ong ba yod ma yin// 2/ der ni gzham yang 'pho ba myed// de ni chos kyi chos nyid yin// chos rnams thams cad ma 'ongs pas// 'dir ni 'u
279a6(mdo): bar 'gyur ba myed// gang na 'du ba yod myin pa// de ni gzu sa shes bya ba yin// chos kun bsam gyis myi khyab ste// de ma yod dang myed pa myed// de ma 'dzin par yong ma yin// de ni
279a7(mdo): gzungs kyi mtshan nyid do// rang bzhin gyis ni bdag myed pas// chos rnams thams cad ltos pa myed// gang yang bdag ni myed bshad pa// de phyir dngos myed shes par gyis// khams gsum las ni 'das
279a8(mdo): gyur par// gzungs la rab tu shes par gyis// chos rnams thob pa byed pas su// roni gzungs shes brjod pa yin// chos rnams thams cad rdo rje bzhin// de dag la mi tha dad myed// de ltar dngos
279a9(mdo): mig pa ste/ de'i phyir mi dngos po myed/ chom kun g.yo ba byed pa ste// sengs la mi bshige pa byed// de dag la ni skye ba byed// de'i phyi ni bzhis pa byed/ chos rnam pa thams cad 'dzis kya ma//
279b1(mdo): yang dag rjes su mthong ba ste// gang dag gi ni byang chub mchog/ de ni cung zad rtogs pa myed// phra rab chos kyang ma dmyigs pas// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub bshad// chos rnams thams cad gzung du myed//
279b2(mdo): de ni byang chub mtshan nyid do// gzugs nyid rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir// gzungs la gzugs ni myed par bshad// gzhan du gzugs ni ma gtogs par// gzungs su dmyigs par myi 'gyur ro// gzug/
279b3(mdo): sa ngo bo nyid myed kyang // ngo bo nyid ces bya ba yin// de bzhin ngo bo nyid shes na// gzungs ni nye bar 'byung ba yin// gzungs 'di bri bar bya ba ni// mying tsam la yang gnas pa ste// gzungs shes nges
279b4(mdo): par brjod pa yi// chos kyi de yod pa ma yin no// myig la gzugs su shes par gyis// de ma'i khor los bstand pa ste// chos rnams kyi ni ma chags pa// de la gzungs shes bshad pa
279b5(mdo): pa yin// de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid ni gzungs su shes par/ gis// de ni 'khor los bstan pa ste// chos rnams kyis// ni ma lags pa// gzungs so zhes ni bshad pa yin//
279b6(mdo): 'dir ni bshad pa mtha' yas pa// chos rnams de ltar shes rgyu rad na// ji tsam cung zad dmyigs myed pa// thams cad du ni gzu ngas shes bshad// dmyigs pa mang po myi mthong bar// rmyi
279b7(mdo): gnas par ni 'chad byed de// chos rnams thams cad dngos po myed// mtshan ma myed cing mtshan nyid myed// gzungs 'dod gang zhig 'gro myed pa// chos rnams de ltar shes gyur da cing // chags pa myed par
279b8(mdo): rab 'chang na// gzungs ni gzhag par gyur pa yin// 'jam dpal sngon byung la 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
279b9(mdo): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul po'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na myed pa/ lha dang / myi rnams kyi stond pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos ta la la'i sgron ma zhes bya ba zhig byung ba gyur to/
280a1(mdo): de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni chus dang bras ba zhes bya bar gyu rang te/ mnyam pa nyams dka' ba/ mdzes pa/ blta ma sdug pa/ dag pa 'byor da pa/ rgyas pa/ myi dang skye bo mang pos gang bar gyu ra to//
280a2(mdo): 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams de ni/ bye dUr+ya las grub cing / gser skung dmyig mangs ris su bris te/ myig mangs ris thams cad na 'ang rin po che'i shing sdom pa/ me tog dang / 'bras bur ldan par gyur to//
280a3(mdo): sa chan gang yang ka ma lan da ka ltar rag ma'ang bar gyur pa ta// sa chen po de yang ka tsa li na di ka ltar reg na bde bar gyur pa to// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na dud 'gro dang / yid dgas dang / lha ma yin
280a4(mdo): thams cad myed par gyur to// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag kyang / dge ba bcu'i la sa kyi lam rang snun par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin
280a5(mdo): tu yongs su dag par gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad phun sum tsho/ gas shing / rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs so// grong khye// rade mi 'byung ba myed ces bya bar gyur to// 'jam dpal de'i
280a6(mdo): ni gyi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad mi lo// 'bum tshang bar gyur te/ mtshang b.ra' ka' yang 'chi ba'i dus byed pa myed do// 'jam dpal grob khyer 'byung ba byed ces bya ba der/ rgyal po rngam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig bya
280a7(mdo): 'jam dpal rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba de la bu stong yod par gyur to// yang 'jam dpal rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i bu stong dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos ta la la'i sgom ma
280a8(mdo): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la na bzla' dang / bgos dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i gso' smam dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas par gyur to// bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis kyang bkur ste
280a9(mdo): byas par gyurapa/ bla mar byas par gyurapa/ sti stang byas par gyur pa/ rim gror byas par gyurapa/ mchod par byas par gyur to// 'jam dpal de nas rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba bu stong dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das
280b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa chos ta la la'i sgron ma la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun zhus par gyur pa to// de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyend nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'odadi bshad par gyur te
280b2(mdo): zos ma zag tu rnam par rgyal ba de/ bu stong dang lhan cig tu chos shes par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas spobs pa rgyun myi 'chad pa thob par gyur to// 'jam dpal de lta bas nang ltar ram/ de bzhin
280b3(mdo): gshegs pa 'das kyang rung ste/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gapa la la spobs pa rgyun myi 'chad cing / spobs pa thogs pa myed pa 'di 'dod pa des/ zab pa chags pa myed pa 'od 'dra ba'i gnas kyi chos la
280b4(mdo): brtson par bya ba bslab par bya'o// chos kyi tshig zab mo 'di lta bu gzung bar bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// khathon du bya'o// chos zab mo'i rnam grangs 'di lta bu kun chub par byas nas/ gzhan
280b5(mdo): la yang bstanang par bya'o// chos thams cad la ser sna mye/ de bar bya'o// de skad ces bka lasaHlad pa dang / 'jam dang/ la gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
280b6(mdo): to// ma 'ongs po'i dus kyi sems can rnams kyi don kyi slang du/ ci nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'od slar yang spyod par 'gyur bar/
280b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gis brlab du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur po'i gsol ba btab pa mkhyend nas ros kyi gras 'di byid kyis brnabs so// de 'i gshes pa shA pa'i bdag 'a rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas kyis khod kyi
280b8(mdo): sar kyi su na na // bcom 'das kyis de skad ces bka' mtsha la nas/ ma dang ldan la kun dka' bo dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
280b9(mdo): brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / de ma yin po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
281a1(mdo): swA dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro/
281a2(mdo): ba'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol/ rdzogs s+ho//
281a3(mdo): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ma yo pa ma sa ma d+hi ma/ na ma ma hA ya ma su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i
281a4(mdo): ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba/ theg pa chen po la mdo'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig ma/ bcom
281a5(mdo): ldan 'das grong khyer ba ra na se ma/ drang srong ltung ba'i ri dgas kyi// nags na dgra bcom pa nyi khril dge slong kyi dge 'dun chen po dang // byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong la/ 'di lta ste/
281a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i seng ge/ dang / seng ge'i glo gros dang / legs par gnas pa'i blo gros dang / dpe' myed blo gros dang / sa 'ja nad dang / myis 'byin
281a7(mdo): dang / chu lha dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / phug sbas dang / bzang skyong dang / klog lha dang / rnam par snang byed dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa dang / ye shes 'byung gnas dang / brtson la myi
281a8(mdo): nga / mnathas dan yod dang / byang rgyam mams dpal sems dpa' chemapo byams yul lags pan nyis stong dang / babus gcig tu 'azhugs so// sna'i bu sumams 'anas dang / sogs pa gas
281a9(mdo): ba'i blo gros la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa nyi khri dang thabs gcig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gis bltas te//
281b1(mdo): chos stonang to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mal dpal gyi snying po stan las/ langs ste/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha pa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
281b2(mdo): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus ma zhu ga yung bstan po'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'dra
281b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gso yad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
281b4(mdo): pad ma'i dpal kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' ma yang to// da ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas dris pa lung bstand pa'i phyir rtag tu skabs phyes/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po
281b5(mdo): khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs / pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstand pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//
281b6(mdo): de skad ces bka' maHlad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gi snying po sa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/
281b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind kyang thob cing /
281b8(mdo): ting nge 'dzin pa 'di thob ma thag tu ji ste ji ltam sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i zla ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba/ de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas/ sems can rnams kyi mos pa rdzis
281b9(mdo): de bzhin du chos stond pa dang / tso nas myur du bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur la lags/ de skad ces gsos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khya
282a1(mdo): tshul sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i rapal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' mas to// pad ma'i rapal gyi snying po leg so// legs so// pad ma ling lal mi snying po khyod nangon/

282a8(mdo): sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos stond pa dang / ci nas myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// chos gcig po gang
282a9(mdo): zhe na/ pad ma dpal gi snying po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum pa thams cad la myi gnas pa yin te/ nang ngam phyi rol pa la gnas par myi byed do// de gnas pa myed pas

287a1(mdo): ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen
287a2(mdo): bkur bgyi ba dang / chos bstand pa de yang mnyan pa'i slad du 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na deng shig/
287a3(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis yongs
287a4(mdo): su bskor te// mdun du bdar na 'jig rten gi khams bdel ba can de nas dong ngo // de nas de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon bar 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas/ byang chub sems dang
287a5(mdo): bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag thams cad re re la yang / khang pa rtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi sprul pa de lta/ bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon rna lu byas so//
287a6(mdo): khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang gru bzhi lham pa ka ba bzhi zug 5/ cha mnyam pa legs par rnam par phye ba/ legs par rin pag stug go// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang 'phang du ni
287a7(mdo): dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ rgyar dpag tshad brgyad do// khang pa brtsegs pa dag gser las byas pa dag kyang yod dngul las byas pa dag kyang yod/ bye dur+ya las byas pa dag kyang yod/ shel las byas
287a8(mdo): pa dag kyang yod/ mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug las byas pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / sku gnyis pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bye
287a9(mdo): ru rwa dang lnga gsum pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bye du r+ya dang / shel dang sna bzhi pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che ga ser dang / dngul dang / bye dur+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig
287b1(mdo): dmar po dang sna lnga pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod do// rin po che ka ser dang / dngul dang / bye ru n+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dam po dang / spug dang / sna drug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ rin
287b2(mdo): po che gser dang / dngul dang / bye dur+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spu ka dang / rdo'i snying po dang / sna bdun pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ can dan dmar po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs
287b3(mdo): pa dag kyang yod/ tsan dang sbrul gi snying po las byas pa dag kyang yod// a ka ru dang / tsan dan las byas pa dag kyang yod/ a ka ru nag po dang / tsan dan las byas pa dag kyang yod/ tsan dan thams cad
287b4(mdo): las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod// snga ma'i
287b5(mdo): me tog dang / par sha ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / s+ya sAr dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / ta ra ni dang / ko ta rA ni las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog da nu ska ri las
287b6(mdo): byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs ba dag kyang yod/ me tog pa mun ka dang / ba mun ka chen po
287b7(mdo): drang / man 'dzu sha ka dang / man 'dzusha ka chen po dang / mdog dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / me tog 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / kun tu 'khor lo dang / shind tu mdzes pa'i 'khor lo dang
287b8(mdo): me tog zla ba dang / zla ba chen po dang / shind tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang / zla mchog dang / sAl dang / sbal chen po dang / shind tu mdzes pa'i sbal las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyangang yod// me tog/
287b9(mdo): thams cad las byas pa'i kha pa brtsegs pa dag kyang sod/ kha dog sum pa/ kha rog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog brgya stong du ma pa// bkrab/ bstan mug pa yongs su dag pa/ 'od gsal ba dag
288a1(mdo): kyang yod do// khang pa brtsegs pa re rem ya pa lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stom mngon par sprul te/ de na lnga'i bu mo kha cig gi laka na rung dang / ma bo che dang / rdza rba dang / khar dza dang /
288a2(mdo): pi khang rgyud gcig pa dang / klu dbyangs sgra snyand pa dang / gling bu dang / rgyud can pi bang dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa rnams thogs ste/ sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i sgra skad rnam pa mang po
288a3(mdo): de lta bu lend cing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cika ni tsam dan dam po'i phye ma'i um thogs shing 'arjod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni can dan sbrul gi snying ze'i phye ma'i bum ma thogs shing 'khod do// wa'i
288a4(mdo): bu mo kha cig ni tsan ran sbrul ki snying po'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo khA cig ni a kA ru dang / tsan dan gi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu
288a5(mdo): mo kha cig ni a ka ru nag po dang / tsan dan gi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// s+tha'i bu mo kha cig ni can ngan thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do//
288a6(mdo): lha'i bu mo kha cig ni mud pa la dang / pad ma dang / klu mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po'i me tog gi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni me tog man da R+sha ba dang
288a7(mdo): man da ra ba chen po dang / ba ru ga ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / man 'dzug ka dang / man 'dzusha ka chen po dang / me tog mdog mdzes dang / me tog mdog mdzes chen po dang / me tog 'khor lo dang /
288a8(mdo): 'khor lo chen po dang / kun tu 'khor lo dang / shAnid tu mdzes pa'i 'khor lo dang / me tog zla ba dang / zla ba chen po dang / shind tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang / zla ba mchog dang / sbal dang / sA la chen po dang
288a9(mdo): shi dang tu mdzes pa sA la'i me tog gi phye ma'i mur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni me tog thams cad dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / thug pa dang / phye ma'i phur mthod pa
288b1(mdo): shing 'khod do// 'bapa brtsegs pa re rem yang bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khre lA/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par bachudad pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mngon par sprul to//
288b2(mdo): kham pa brtsegs pa re rer yang mu tig dkar po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / mu tig mthon ka'i mu tig gi 'phreng ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprus to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rems lha'i ras bcos bu'i
288b3(mdo): rgyal mtshan gser gi dril bu gser ka'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprus to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang spos kyi phur ma brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par spyas to// khang pal
288b4(mdo): brtsegs pa re rer yang gdugs kha dog du ma pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog brgya stong du ma pa/ bkra ba bsta na stug palegs par las su byas pa/ dbyi bas shi nad tu legs pa
288b5(mdo): brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to// khang pa' brtsegs pa re rer yang shing ta la'i 'phreng ba brgyad khri bzhi stong / mngon par spruld to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rin
288b6(mdo): po che'i zhing sngon pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba gang dag rlung gis bskyod na/ 'di lta bu'i sgra dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste
288b7(mdo): dper na/ lha'i sim snyan yan lag bye ba brgyad stong dang ldan pa/ mkhas pa dag gis legs par blangs nas skra byung ba de bzhin du/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod na/ sma sas
288b8(mdo): pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprulang to// khar pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rdzing bu bzhi gser gi bye ma bdal pa bye bur+ya dang shes kyis sbas pa/ ring po che sna bdun gyi
288b9(mdo): kha khyer gyis bskorang pa/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar pos gang ba/ rur ba skra 'byi dad pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ bya rog gis btung du rung
289a1(mdo): bar bu dang / kha ra chung ngu gas pa dag sprul to// khang pa 'artsegs pa re rem yang rin po che'i shing ljond pa'i 'greng ba rim pa bdun gis bsko rang to// rin po che'i rgud pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis
289a2(mdo): kun nas dkris so// rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa re re'i 'od kyis kyang dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du snang bar gyur da to// de bzhin du khyang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi bkod pa dag so sor byas so// de nas
289a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi
289a4(mdo): khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa ji snyed yod pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na bkod pa chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad khang pa brtsegs pa re rer mngon par sprul to//
289a5(mdo): blam bzhin du byar te 'a das da sa na rdzog na nga sngon ca ra'i ga te sa pa kyi ga
289a6(mdo): ki khams bdel ba can de nas kyi snang bar gyur to// 'jigatwen ki khams kyi mjed 'dir phyi nad to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de gnyis kyis de'i tshe
289a7(mdo): ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/ 'jig rten ki khams myi mjed 'di lag mthis bzhin du mnyam par gyur pa de lta bu'i/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so//
289a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang kha ba brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor da te/ mdun du bdar nas yon tan gi bzhon pa chen po dang ldan pas shi ring tu lhag gi'o//
289a9(mdo): pa brtsegs pa de dag gi 'od kyis kyang / stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di snang bas khyab par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
289b1(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ka la ba der dong ste/ phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub/
289b2(mdo): pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis tshig mthun par smra dbyangs gcig tu/ bcom
289b3(mdo): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// gzi' 'arjid mtshungs myed yon tan phung po gcig la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong chen po kun mkhyend yon tan kun gyi pha rol gshegs/
289b4(mdo): thams cad zil gnon srid pa gsum gi chags pa'i lam las 'das// shag kya khyu mchog dri bral zla ba'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo// nyi ma dri myed lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa rnam
289b5(mdo): par mdzes// mtshan mchog sum bcu rtsa gnyis dag gi go cha mnapas gyurd cing // dpe' byad bzang po rnams// kyis spras pa 'jig rten kun tu gsal// myi mchog khyod
289b6(mdo): mtshungs 'jig rten gsum na gang yang yod ma mchis// bden bar gshegs pa'i sku'i 'od kyis gang tshe reg gyur pa// de tshe 'jig rten nyi ma zla ba nor bu bzhugs rnams dang / brgya byin tshangs
289b7(mdo): bsgra dang de bzhin gyi ci rnams kyi 'od// snag tsha'i phung po bzhin du mog mog myi snang gsal ma mchis// rgyal ba zhing gcig pa ni yang dag bzhugs par kada' bzhin du// 'gro ba'i don tu skad cig
289b8(mdo): gcig gis mtha' yas zhing du gshegs// ston pa'i bzhud dang byon pa 'tshal ba su yang yod ma mchis// mdzad pa dag dang 'dul ba sna tshogs dag gis sems can 'dul// spu'i khung gcig nang du
289b9(mdo): mtha' yas zhing rnams stond mdzad kyang // 'phel ba dang ni bri bar gyur pa gang yang yod ma mchis// 'di ni ji bzhin las dang byed pa rgyu dang 'bras gda' la// sems can rnams la gnod pa ma mchis//
290a1(mdo): 'brel par gyur da ma mchis// gang na sems can dmyal ba dud 'gro yi dgas ma mchis shing // rgyal ba'i sras po grag chen po dag gis yongs gang la// myi khom brgyad po dag dang bral te mchog
290a2(mdo): tu nyams dka' ba'i// yongs dag zhing de dag kyang myi mchog la lar stond par mdzad// lha byi kang dag myi 'jigs bag ma mchis pa bskad slad du// sems dmyal dud 'gro yi dgas 'gro ba shi nad tu myi
290a3(mdo): bzad pa'i// kun nas nyon mongs zhing rnams la la dag kyang bstan mdzad nas// de dag thams cad bde bar gshegs la skyabs su nye bar mchi// zhing gzhan la la dag kyang nam mkha' lta bur stond pa mdzad/
290a4(mdo): de bzhin gzhan yang gzugs kyis lham zhing me lce 'khrugs pa dang // zhing gzhan dag kyang chab kyis yongs su bltam par stond par mdzad// rnam 'phrul 'phrul 'di ni thams cad mkhyen
290a5(mdo): pa'i ye shes yul lags so// 'dul ba'i don tu gzugs/ kyi rnam pa mtha' yas stond mdzad pa// la yar 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'od chags gzugs dang ldan par gyur da// tshangs
290a6(mdo): pa'i bdag po mchog tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rnyed pa dang // sumabacu rtsa gsum dbang phyug kyi stong rdo rje 'bar ba dang // srog chags brgya phrag mang po rab tu dga' bas mchod bgyid cing // dge ba
290a7(mdo): bcu po dag gis sems can mtha' yas 'dul bgyid pa// blon po tshong dpon dag dang bka' la gtogs pa'i cor gyur cing // shind tu 'jigs myed dgra tshogs pab nas chad pas kyi gcod lnga// bkru ba'i
290a8(mdo): dngos po bzhi pos sems can rnams ni skud bgyid cing // rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la sems can rab tu 'jog bgyid pa// bsod nams las kyis rin chen bdun da ldan par gyur pa'i// gling bzhi dag gi
290a9(mdo): dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur pa dag tu gyur // 'jig rten 'di na la lar bltam pa lta bur stond mdzad de// dog sa la ni gom pa bdun dag bor zhing gshegs nas kyang // pa ni skye gnas skye dpa' ma/
290b1(mdo): ba'i mtha' mar 'byung ngo zhes// yid 'ong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gsung mchog brjod par mdzad// mar me mdzad pa tshun chad dri ma thams cad spangs lags kyang // 'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye shes mchog 3
290b2(mdo): yongs sbyind mdzad slad du// la yar sems can dag pa btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs par gda'// myi'i dbang po btsun mo dag dang sras kyang stond par mdzad// yab yum dag dang gnyen ka rtse lag bstud pa'i
290b3(mdo): 'khor rnams dang // yul 'khor 'byor da dang rin chen gter mdzod mang po btang mdzad nas// brgya byin tshangs pa dag dpalha myin rnams kyis phyag bgyis shing // drang srong chen po mngon par 'byung ste nags
290b4(mdo): na bzhugs par gdal// 'gro la sman slad dku lo drug du dka' ba spyad nas ni// bsam gtan mkha' khyab rin chen mchog la bsam gtan mdzad par gdal// mu stegs
290b5(mdo): can gi tshogs rnams thams cad tshar gcad mdzad skad du// sems can dag pa byang chub shing drung du yang gshegs par kadal// 'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye shes mchog tu yongs
290b6(mdo): sbyin mdzad skad du// kyi dbang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin mchog la zhugs mdzad nas// sku'i tshul ni gang gis 'jig rten rnam par 'dul 'gyur ba// rgyal ba de 'dra nyid kyi sku'i
290b7(mdo): ma lugs 'dzind par mdzad// ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gis 'gro ba rmongs par bkyi skad du// sgyu ma yang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston bgyid pa// de bzhin 'gro ba sgron mas sems can 'dul ba
290b8(mdo): mdzad sprad cu// sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mang po rnams kyang stond// thub pa dpa' bo la lar dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul ston pa// gapal pha rol mu stegs tshogs kyi 'gro ba
290b9(mdo): ma mchis shing // rdul bral mya ngan ma mchis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob pa// bla na byed par 'gyur ba ma mchis 'khor lo rab tu bskor// khyod kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas byang
291a1(mdo): chub brnyes// phyogs kyi lam rnams thams cad thams cad du yang 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad// myi'i dbang po kun nas zhal ldan chu zla bzhin du bzhugs// bdel gshegs rang byung mtha'/
291a2(mdo): las yul la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo// ma la rag la sangs rgyas chos kyi sku ni ston mdzad pa// rtag pa brtan pa zer zug 'gyur ba ma mchis kyu rad pa dang // ma bgyis ma skyes dri ma ma mchis 'gog pa
291a3(mdo): ma mchis chos// myig yor 'dra bas phyogs bcu dag ni shi nad tu rgyas par 'gyengs// ring por myi thogs par ni stug la dag dang 'bral 'gyur gyis// 'dus byas 'di la khyed cag yid brtan bya bI kyi rigs shes//
291a4(mdo): 'gro ba thams cad rmyi lam sgyu ma smyig rgyu 'dra ba dang // myi rtag myi brtan skad cig par yang la la dag la stond// bdel gshegs sku'i 'phrin las mtha' dang pha rol yod ma mchis/
291a5(mdo): gsung dang thugs kyi 'jug pa'i spyod yul dag kyang dpaka myi lang // nam mkha' lta bur rgya che tshad ma mchis pa ston mdzad de// rgyal ba'i spyod yul sems can rnams kyis 'tshal/
291a6(mdo): bar nus ma lags// phyogs bcu dag na mchis pa'i semasacan ma lus ji snyed pa// de dag sha ri'i bu dang 'dra bar shes rab ldan gyur kyang // rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po la dngos po'i yul
291a7(mdo): tshad ma mchis pa// rgyal ba'i spyod yul thams cad de dag rnams kyis rig kyi rus// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mkhal 'dra pha rol mtha' mchis pa// de ltar rgyal ba'i yul ni bsam gyis kyi khyab sa
291a8(mdo): lus pa// 'di na rgyal pa'i sras rnams kun dang nyan thos rnams dang ni// rkyen gyi rgyal ba 'dus pa rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus pam lags// de ltar 'di dag las phyogs mtha' yas thabs dang ldan pa'is//
291a9(mdo): 'dus pa'i don tu sku'i mdzad pa mtha' yas stond par mdzad// nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs par mtha' yas sku dang ldan gyur pa// mgon po rtog dang rnam par rtog dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo// sduka
291b1(mdo): bsngal rgya mtsho rgya chen pha rol dag tu rgal gyur pa// nyon mongs thul ba rgyal ba 'gro ba'i rtso la bstod pa yis// bsod nams ci mchis des ni 'di na 'gro ba ma lus pa// byang chub rin chen rab mchog zhi zhi/
291b2(mdo): bde la la reg par shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad
291b3(mdo): pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsosod to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yong /
291b4(mdo): dpag myed/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam zhes ma/ na gso lad to// nyam ra ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang da stobs dang bde bar red pa la gnas sam zhes kyang btsun
291b5(mdo): gsod to// 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag 'jig ter ki khams nyams dga' ba ltar gro la cig/ ces kyang gsung ngo // de nas 'jig rten gi khams kyi mjed/
291b6(mdo): 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos chen po de dag kis 'jig rten gi khams 'di khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen bro des yongs su khyab pa dang / rin po'i sna tshogs dag kyang
291b7(mdo): mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du 'dzind cing de dag 'di nyas du thasasas te/ gang dag 'jig rten gi khams bde ba can nas 'dir lags pa 'di dag/ ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i sana'am/ 'on te byang chum ma mas du
291b8(mdo): sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi mthu yin lham mo// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pard ma'i dpal gi snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsos ni/
291b9(mdo): 'di ltar 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed 'di khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs du mas brgya nad cing / yongs su khyab par gad la ni bcoM ldan 'das ngo mtshard to// bde' bar gshegs pa mchog tu rongo mtsha rad to// gang
292a1(mdo): dag 'jig rten gyi khams bdel ba can nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mjed 'dir lpags pa dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu lags sam/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi mthu lags/ re
292a2(mdo): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal ki snying po la 'di skad ces bak+Sha stsal to// pad ma'i dpal gi snying po 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed 'di
292a3(mdo): rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa du mas brgya nad cing yongs su khyab par snang ba 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ma yin ki/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
292a4(mdo): phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthuchen thob kyi mthu yin no// gsol pa/ 'di ltar 'di dag gi mthus 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed 'di rin po che sAl
292a5(mdo): tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa du mas brgyand cing / yongs su/ khyab par gda' ba ni skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su sbyangs pa bsam gis
292a6(mdo): myi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshard to// bdel bar gshegs pa ngo mtshard to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gi snying po ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/
292a7(mdo): skyes zhu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bskas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs myed pa nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su sbyangs pa yin no// pad ma'i dpal gi snying po skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting
292a8(mdo): nge 'dzin thob pa yin te/ 'di gnyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ti le 'dzin la gnas nas/ rdzu 'gyul gi rnam par 'phrul ba 'di lta bu 'dri dag ston to// pad ma'i dpal gi snying po khyod ga gyi phyog sa ma thogs pa
292a9(mdo): de na ci sdang ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gi snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i myig sgrib pa myed pas bltas na/ shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang 'ag
292b1(mdo): klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang 'aka'i klung ki bye ma snyed mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi zhabs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
292b2(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob gnyis phyag 'tshal nas/ tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag
292b3(mdo): myed/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ zhes bsnyun gsol da to// nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde' bar reg pa la gnas sam/ zhes kyang bsnyun gsol da to zhes smra'o//
292b4(mdo): de bzhin du lho'i phyogs cha dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de bzhin du byang dang / de bzhin du 'og dang / de bzhin du steng dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang 'ga'i klung
292b5(mdo): ki bye ma snyed na/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i/ bkod pa chen po du mas brgya nad cing yongs su khyab pa mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
292b6(mdo): 'dra dag kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi spyan sA na/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis zhabs la bya/ 'tshal khA n+da mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de ni nad tu po mtshar
292b7(mdo): cher 'dzind par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gi snying po ngo mtshar du gyur da nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di ltar skyes
292b8(mdo): bungam pa de gnyis kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrubs pa ni bsapa gis kyi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar na to// bdel bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtsha rang to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di
292b9(mdo): ltar skyes bu dam pa de gnyis ting nge 'dzind la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na dga' ba'i slad du'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngod
293a1(mdo): bar 'du mdzad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal ki snying pos phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom
293a2(mdo): ldan 'das dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang / de bzhin du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi
293a3(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong
293a4(mdo): ba dang / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'tshar srog chag/ sum khri nyis stong / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub tu sems skyes pa/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du
293a5(mdo): mdzad pa mngon pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byar chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal ki snying pos 'di skad ces/ gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di
293a6(mdo): gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang las/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji srid cig lags/ de'i mtshan ni ci zhig ces bgyi/ bcom ldan
293a7(mdo): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ldan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par bstan dadu gsold/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
293a8(mdo): gzhan dag kyang de'i bya ba dang / de'i spyod pa dang / de'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/ de lta bas na pad ma'i dpal ki snying po khyod shi na tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig
293a9(mdo): dang bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gi snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyand pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces
293b1(mdo): bkal stsa la to// pad ma'i dpal gi snying po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs byed pa'i srang ches grangs myed pa yangs pa// tshad myed pa bsam gis myi khyab pa 'jig rten gi khams brgya stong gi
293b2(mdo): rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de snyed du tshad myed pa// de snyed du bsam gis myi khyab pa/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul ci'i tsam yod pa de bas kyang ches mang ba'i bskal pa byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gi khams
293b3(mdo): yon tan rin chen bsngags pa dpag tu myed pa bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa
293b4(mdo): bde' bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu/ 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na myed pa/ lga dang myi rnamasakyi stond pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser 'od
293b5(mdo): seng ge'i rnam par rold pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste/ pad ma'i dpal kau snying po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ka she/ pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
293b6(mdo): gser 'od seng ge'i rnam par rold pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ki yon tan bkod pa/ gang dag yod pa de dag dpe' cung zad cig brjod par byas nyon cig/ pad
293b7(mdo): ma'i dpal gi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'jig rten gi khams bde ba can na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag myed kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
293b8(mdo): gi yon tan bkod pa mang ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa tshad ma mchis te/ ngag gi las kyis lan gdab par sla ba ma lags so// bcom
293b9(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' su lad pa/ pad ma'i dpal ki snying po 'di lta ste dper na/ myil la zhig gis skra'i rtse mos brgyar bshags pa'i rtse mo rgya mtsho chen po las chu thigs pa gcig blangs na/ pad ma'i/
294a1(mdo): dpal gi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems// chu blangs pa dang / luka ma lus pa de gang mang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das blangs pa ni nyung/ lpaka ma lus pa ni tshad ma mchis so// bka' stsa/
294a2(mdo): pad ma'i dpal ki snying po khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o// myi des skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags pa'i rtse mo des rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa ji snyed pa de tsam
294a3(mdo): ru/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag myed kyis// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po ji snyed pa de tsam du
294a4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom payang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge'i rnamapar rold pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
294a5(mdo): rin chen bsugs pa dpag tu myed pa/ bde ba kun tu stond pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi yon tan bkod par blta'o// de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang dpag tu byed
294a6(mdo): de/ ji ltar da ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu byed do zhes bya ba na/ de las brgya stong du bsgres pa bas kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
294a7(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ches mang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang
294a8(mdo): de snyed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de ni theg pa gsum kho na las brtsams te chos ston to// pad ma'i dpal ki snying po ngas bskal pa kang 'aka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bcom ldan 'das
294a9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po'i de'i/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ki yon tan dang / nyan thos kyi yon tan bkod pa dang /
294b1(mdo): bdel ba'i rgyu las brtsams te/ chos bstand par 'dod kyang nga'i spobs pa yang zad par myi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pade'i mthar phyind par yang
294b2(mdo): myi 'gyur ro// pad ma'i dpal gi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i gsung rab la 'jig rten ki khams stong gi dbang phyug
294b3(mdo): chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po dpal ki gzi' brjid zhes bya ba'i rgyal po zhig byung ste/ pad ma'i dpal gi snying po rgyal po dpal ki gzi' brjid de la bu bye ba phrag brgya yod de/ rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag zas
294b4(mdo): cad kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan paragyur to// de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogapa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// par
294b5(mdo): ma'i dpal gi snying po rgyal po dpal ki gzi'i brjid kyi yodas su longs spyod pa'i bskyed mos tshal ni bdun khri drug stong yod/ do// rgyal bu re mel yang longs spyod kyi bskyed mos tshal khri
294b6(mdo): khri yod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud myed mchis sam
294b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ pad ma'i dpal gi snying po de ni byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud myed kyi myir yang gyi grag ste/ rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang tshangs par spyod pa las
294b8(mdo): gyur da pa thus te/ byung ba sha stag go// sems cadan de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gi dga' ba dang / chos kyi dgal ba'i mas can yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na Sha zas rags pa byed par gyurd to//
294b9(mdo): pad ma'i dpal gi snying po rgyal po dpal gi gzil brjid de ni/ las gzhan gyi byed de/ bu de rnams dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das de la/ lo bye ba stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bsnyen bkur bar
295a1(mdo): byas so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyend nas/ tshad myed pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul mkhas pa yang dag par rab tu ston to// pad ma'i dpal/
295a2(mdo): gi snying po tshad myed pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul mkhas pa gang zhe na/ pad ma'i dpal gi snying po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spyod pa tshad myed pa dag/ don tu gnyer bar myi bya ba de gang yang
295a3(mdo): myed do// rtul pa tshad myed pa gang dag rtsal bar myi bya ba de gang yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa ni tshad myed/ tshul khrims ni tshad myed/ bzod pa ni tshad myed/ brtson 'grus
295a4(mdo): ni tshad myed/ bsam gtan ni tshad myed/ shes rab ni tshad myed 'khor ba yongs su 'dzind pa ni tshad myed/ sems can dag la byas pa ni tshad myed/ zhing gi bkod pa dag ni tshad myed/ nyan thos
295a5(mdo): dag ni tshad myed/ gzungs yongs su grub pa ni tshad myed/ dbyangs ni tshad myed/ spobs pa ni tshad myed pa'i phyir ro// pad ma'i dpal gi snying po byang chub sems dpa' ni za na sems
295a6(mdo): bskyed pa gcig gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang / ci mngon par 'du byed pa de dag thams cad tshad myed pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o// ji ltar yongs su bsngos pas tshad myed par 'gyur zhe na/ kang
295a7(mdo): gi tshe sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bar byed pa de'i tshe/ sems can 'di dag thams cad skye ba myed par mngon sum du byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas/ yongs su mya ngan
295a8(mdo): las 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'di rigs kyi bu yongs su bsngo ba tshad myed pa zhes bya'o// spyod pa nyid tshad myed pa'o// mtshan ma myed pa tshad myed pa'o// smond pa myed pa tshad myed pa'o// mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa
295a9(mdo): tshad myed pa'o// de ltar na 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag pa'i mtha' chos kyi dbyings rnam par grol ba ma skyes pa/ dben pa dang bral ba mya ngan las 'das pa tshad myed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu mdor na chos zas
295b1(mdo): cad ni tshad myed pa'o// de'i phyir chos thams cad ni la skyes/ ma 'gags pa zhes bya'o// kad kyi bye ma 'gag pa de ni chad byed pa'o// pad ma'i dpal gi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
295b2(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge'i rnam par rol pa'i rgyal pos/ de ltar rgyal po dpal ki gzi'i brjid de la tshad myed pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa 'di yang dag par rab tu
295b3(mdo): bstan to// des kyang chos tshad myed pa dag la nges par sems par byas par gyur to// de nas rgyal po dpal gi gzi' brjid kyis bcom ldan 'das de las/ chos dpag tu byed pa bstand pa 'di thos nas tshis
295b4(mdo): zhing mgu ste/ yid rangs nas/ rab tu dka' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bu de dag dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/
295b5(mdo): 'drend pa chos rnams kun la dbang bsgyur pa// smra ba'i tshogs/ kun yang dag rab tu 'jom// bdud kyi brtsod dang nyon mongs kun/ seld pa// mtshungs myed ye shes gtsol phyag 'tshal lo//
295b6(mdo): nyi zla dashar me'i 'od rnams dang // brgya byin tshangs pa nor bu klog 'od rnams// bde gshegs gzi'i brjid kyis ni mog mog gyur // myi mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa bskal
295b7(mdo): pa rgya mtshor gnas pa yang // dka' ba rnam pa du mar spyod par mdzad// 'phrin las de'i 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba ste// des na 'gro bas bltas na ngoms kyi 'gyur// skye dang rga dang na dang 'chis gces shing //
295b8(mdo): sems can sdug bsngal mang thos gzir gzigs nas// de dag rnaMs sa thub chen thugs je nye// rtag tu kyi 'pho zhi ba'i chos kyang ltond// srid gsum thog chags kun tu ldand pa 'dra// 'dod chags
295b9(mdo): zhe sdang mun pa thams cad sbyong // thugs rje bskyed pa mdzad nas chos kyi snga dang // zhi ba bla na myed par rab tu stond// sems can kun kyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyend// rab 'byam zhing rnams kun na srog
296a1(mdo): chags kyi// mkhyend nas gang gis mya ngan 'das mchog la// reg par 'gyur ba de 'dra'i chos kyang stond// myi mchog khyod kyi thugs rje ci 'dra ba// ji snyed rab 'byam zhing gi nyan thos dang //
296a2(mdo): rkyen 'byung thub pa ma lus de dag la// de 'dra ba'i snying rje yod ma mchis// bsod nams phung po mtshan mchog rnams dang ldan// rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gi ri bo 'dra// bye ba gnyis las lhag pa'i gzi'i mngal ba
296a3(mdo): myi mchog mtshungs ma mchis la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sprin rgyas las chos char 'bebs pa na// gang dag rgya chen mos pa spyod yul ba// sngon gi sangs rgyas spyod la 'jigs ma mchis// de dag rtag tu bdel
296a4(mdo): gshegs mdun na mchis// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig pas yas su// myi mchog mthong bar rnyed par gnad tu dkal// bsod nams las kyis bsam pa yongs sbyangs pa// de dag
296a5(mdo): myig lam rnam par 'dren rnams gdal// rgyal ba'i sku ni chos dbyings rgyas par 'gyengs// zhing rnams rab 'byam thams cad na yang gdal// bzhud dang byon par mngon pa
296a6(mdo): yod ma mchis// 'on kyang 'jig rten dka na snod bzhin gdal// bden pa gzigs shing don dam stond pa po// chos kyi sbyin bdag zhi ba'i thugs ldan pa// rgal nas srog chags
296a7(mdo): bcings gyur de gzhan sgrol pa// bde bar gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis skye ba'i shing ljon rtsa nas bton// nga rgyal ri bo sra ba rdul du bsgrags// rgod pa myi mnga' g.yol dang sgyu dang bral/
296a8(mdo): rab zhi thugs dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// myi mchog chags po myi mngal// dgongs pa sa dang chu dang me dang 'dra// rgyal ba sems can kun la snyoms thugs ldan// rlung dang nam mkha' 'dra la phyag
296a9(mdo): 'tshal lo// thub pa chen po yon tan 'di 'dra'i gter// bsod nams rgya mtsho las byung sku dang ldan// bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu de brjod kyang // yon tan rgya mtsho zad par nus ma lags// yon tan
296b1(mdo): rgya mtsho lha phyis mchod pa la// bdag ki bu dang bcas te mchod par bgyid// rgyal ba'i mchod pa'i bsod nams mi mchis pa// des na thub pa chen po khyod 'drar shog/ pad ma'i dpal gi snying pos de
296b2(mdo): nas rgyal po dpal ki gzil brjid des dus gzhan zhika na/ bskyed mos tshal na bsam gtan gi gnas pas gnas shing / 'dug pa'i glo g.yas g.yon nas/ tsan dan sbrul ki snying po pad ma bkra ba bltan
296b3(mdo): sdug pa dag pa gnyis byung ngo // pad ma de gnyis las khye'u mying rin chen sems dang / rin chen mchog ces bya ba gnyis rdzus te byung nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go// pad ma'i dpal gi snying po
296b4(mdo): de ltar rgyal po dpal gi gzil brjid de/ ting nge 'dzind de las langs nas khye'u de gnyis kyis skyil mo krung bcas te/ 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa
296b5(mdo): 'di smras so// khyed gnyis lha'am klu yin nam// gnod sbyin dri za myi ci'am// myi 'am myi ma yin nam ci// dris pa smros shika grogs po dag// pad ma'i dpal ki snying
296b6(mdo): po de ltar rgyal po dpal gi gzi brjid kyi g.yas phyogs su byung ba'i khye'u ka pa yin pa des/ rgyal po dpal ki gzil brji de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// grogs po chos kun ston
296b7(mdo): ba'i// mying ni 'dri bar byed dam ci// chos rnams thams cad mying myed na// kang ki mying ni 'dri bar byed// stong nyid gapa la 'ang lha myed cing // klu myed srin po yod ma yin// myi 'am myi ma
296b8(mdo): yin yang rung // thams cad de na yod myed do// pad ma'i dpal gi snying po de nas khye'u gcig zhos des/ rgyal po dpal ki gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bying ni mying gis stong pa
296b9(mdo): ste// mying la mying ni yod ma yin// chos rnams thams cad myang myed de// 'on kyang mying gis yongs su brjod// mying gi rang bzhin gang yin pa// de ni ma thos ma mthong ngo // las kyis 'gags/
297a1(mdo): pa ma yin na// 'di na gang gi mying zhig 'dri// ba na du mi myid byas nas// mying btags byas te bstan pa nI// kho bo'i mying ni rin chen sems// gcig zhog rin chen mchog ces bya//
297a2(mdo): pad ma'i dpal ki snying po de ltar khye'u gnyis kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sbas te/ mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrubs nas/ rgyal po dpal gi gzil brjid de dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
297a3(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po ga la ba dor dong skye phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
297a4(mdo): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas thal mo sbyar te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// pad ma'i dpal gi snying po de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis dbyangs gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das la chag
297a5(mdo): su bcad de gso med pa// pad ma dag dang dri gda' dang / me tog 'phreng dang na bzu' dang // 'on te zas dang skom gis sam// rgyal ba mi ltar mchod par bgyi// rdzogs pa'i
297a6(mdo): sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gnol// ji ltar mchod par 'gyurab lags// don 'di legs par bsta nad tu gso med/ 'dren pa thos nas 'tshal yar bkyi// pad ma yi dpal gi
297a7(mdo): snying po de nA N+DIgasheg pa sob lnga ga rjog+sa nisangs rgyas de bye de ga nyis cig su 'de gyur pasus can kun pa pana'i phyir khya lu ni mo bgyi / rna sogasus nyi TI/ rgya dag pa yod du grus kyi khre mas kyi sa yogs kyi /
297a8(mdo): 'jig rten mgon pa phul pa bas// gang gis 'dir ni thal sprur nas// byang chub tu ni sems btud nas// 'di ni bsod nams ches yang ste// des tshad ni yod ma yin// byang chub sems ni ci 'dra ba
297a9(mdo): de ltar blo mchog gis bstand pa// de 'dra'i mchod pa gang yang myed// de 'dra ba'i dpal yang byed// pad ma 'i dpal gi snying po de sngar khye'u de gnyis kyis skam yang / bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su
297b1(mdo): bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// bdag cag yi dam yang dag 'chas// bla na myed pa seng ge'i sgra// lha dang myi dag gsan mdzod cig// ji srid du ni 'khor ba'i// sngon gi mthal/
