297b2(mdo): ni myi dmyigs pa// de srid bskul pa du mar yang // sems can phyir ni spyad par bgyi// ji tsam sngon gi mtha' dran pa// rnam grangs 'di'i tshul dag gis// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// de srid bskam
297b3(mdo): par spyad par bgyi// gal te de ring slar chad du// 'dod chags kyi ni sems byung ba// phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni bskus par gyur // de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dang // phrag dog
297b4(mdo): ser sna yang de bzhin no// rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smra zhing / brdzun gi tshig ni spang bar bgyi// gal te de ring slan chad du/ rdus myed byang chub ma thob par// bdag cag nyan thos sems
297b5(mdo): gyur pa// des ni brdzun ni sba bar 'gyur// nams kyang rang // sangs rgyas su ni// bdag cag dga' bar myi bgyid de// sems can rnams la snying rje zhing // bskal pa bye bar spyad
297b6(mdo): par bgyi// ji ltar 'drend pa khyod kyi zhing // grub pa rnam pa 'di dag las// gzhan du yon tan bye ba rnyed// phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing du bgyi// de na nyan thos gang yang myed//
297b7(mdo): rang rgyal 'drend pa dag kyang myed// de tshe bye ba tshad myed pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gnas// bde ba 'di dang ldan pa'i// skye bo dri ma myed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mdzod ni bzung bas na//
297b8(mdo): sangs rgyas chos rnams tshar phyi nad to// gal te 'di dag gzhan myin par// de bzhin du ni 'gyur des na// rgya mtshor bcas dang rir bcas pa'i// sa 'di thams cad g.yos par sho ka// tshig 'di smras pa'i
297b9(mdo): mod la ni// sa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur // sil snyan dag ni ma dkrol bar// de na thams cad sma yang 'byind// stong phrag bye ba'i lha rnams kyis// me tog char dang phye ma'i char// spos kyi
298a1(mdo): char ni yid 'ong dang // na bza' bye ba rab tu phag// pad ma'i dpal ki snying po de'i tshe dus na/ rgyal po dpal gi gzi'i brjid ces bya bar gyurd pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs sam// yid gnyis/
298a2(mdo): za na de ltar myi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag myed 'di'i de'i tshe/ de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gi gzi' brjid ces bya bar gyur to//
298a3(mdo): pad ma'i dpal gi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u rin chen sems dang / rin chen mchog ces bya ba de gnyis gzhan zhig yin pa sum du 'dzin na/ de yang de ltar gyi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sos
298a4(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khye'u rin chen mchog ces bya bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob 'di ni khye'u rin chen sems zhes bya
298a5(mdo): bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis bla na myed pa yangadag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed pa ni de// ma yin no// de skad ces bka' stsa lad pa dang / bco ldan
298a6(mdo): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pad ma'i dpal gi snying pos 'di skad ces gso lad to// ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ci tsam du zab mo la
298a7(mdo): mos par gyur da pa dang / gang gi mying yang ma dmyigs pa de srid du 'di gnyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur pa ngo mtshard to// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs/
298a8(mdo): bA de'i pha ro lad na/ sangs rgyas ji snyed cig sa rim gro bgyis par gyur// bka' sA lad pa/ rigs kyi bu kar 'ga'i klung gi bye ma ni bgrang bas mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis
298a9(mdo): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol na/ sangs rgyas dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'di de dag ni su ma yin te/ de srid du 'di gnyis kyis byang chub tu sems ma bskyed do// skyes bu/
298b1(mdo): dam pa 'di gnyis ni bsam gis myi khyab pa'i ko cha bgos shing / yon tan dpag myed pa dang ldan te/ 'di gnyis kyi yon tan dag gi mtha' rtogs par myi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
298b2(mdo): sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal ki snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten gi khams yon tan rin chen brtsegs pa dpag tu myed pa bde ba kun tu stond pa zhes bgyi ba de dang / bcom ldan 'das de
298b3(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par ro led pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba/ gang lags pa de 'di nas phyogs gang logs na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su lad pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs
298b4(mdo): na ste/ 'jig rten gi khams bde' ba can de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gi khams yon tan rin chen brtsegs pa dpag tu myed pa bdel ba kun tu stond pa zhes bya bar gyurd to//
298b5(mdo): de skad ces bka' stsa lad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpal pad ma'i dpal gi snying pos 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
298b6(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang myi rnams kyi
298b7(mdo): don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu dam pa de gnyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa/ kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
298b8(mdo): ci 'dra bar gyur pa dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / tshe ci tsam pa dang / longs spyod ci nga dag ci ga skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
298b9(mdo): bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mtshan ji skad bgyi ba de dag legs par bstan du gsolang // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam chen po
299a1(mdo): bshad pa mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byung /
299a2(mdo): chub sems dpal pad ma'i dpal gi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lang to// pad ma'i dpal gi snying po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// byang chub semadas pad mI dpal ki
299a3(mdo): snying pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sngar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpa
299a4(mdo): byed kyi tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu myed de/ de'i mtha' ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du bshad kyang rtogs parasla ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
299a5(mdo): dpag myed kyi tshe dpag tu myed du 'i nad kyang / 'dus byas/ thams cad myi brtan pa/ zer zug ma yin pa/ sun tu gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus
299a6(mdo): 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag byed de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
299a7(mdo): 'gyur ro// de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bzhas pa bye ba khrag khragri brgya stong phrag brgya bcu ba sa su de'i dam pa'i chos klanas te/ ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las
299a8(mdo): 'das nas kyang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub ste smag chad myed par 'gyur ro// gzhan du na sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ba byed par zad do// byang chub
299a9(mdo): sems dpal de dag kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ de dag rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chad par sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / myi 'bral bar myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'ong
299b1(mdo): dpag myed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / rin po che sna bdun gi pad ma dag dang / king ljon pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de ji ltar chos stond pa de bzhin du pad ma dag dang / shing
299b2(mdo): ljon pa de dag las kyang chos kyi bsgo ba brgya phrag du ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos nub ma thag
299b3(mdo): pa'i mtshan mtshan mo skya reb 'char ba'i chus kyi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug rin po che du ma bkod pa'i byang chub kyi zhing drung du 'dug nas// bla na myed pa
299b4(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'od gzer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal rtsegs rgyal po zhes
299b5(mdo): bya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer kun// nas 'phags pa'i dpal rtsegs rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi// zhing gA bkod par 'gyur ba/ gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin
299b6(mdo): gshegs pas bskal pa gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bstand kyang mtha' rtogs par myi nus so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i bde ba'i rgyu dang / yon tan gi rgyu ni de snyed du gyur
299b7(mdo): mod kyi/ 'od kyang rigs kyi bu dpel tsam du cung zad cig bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi na
299b8(mdo): tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa/ yon tan bkod pa snga ma dag ni yon tan bkod pa 'di dag gi brgya'i char yang myi chog/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / dpel dang / rgyur yang myi
299b9(mdo): bzod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi mying yang myed par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gis gang bar 'gyur ro//
300a1(mdo): rigs kyi bu da ltar bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag myed kyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsdus kyang / bcom ldan 'das//
300a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal rtsegs rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gi brgya'i char yang nye bar myi chog ste/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang
300a3(mdo): dpe' dang / rgyur yang myi bzod do// de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ro// de'i dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa bye ba drug bcu rtsa gsum du gnas par 'gyur ro// /
300a4(mdo): de skad ces bka' stsa lad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byung chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gi snying pos 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gi khams
300a5(mdo): de'i mya yang bde ba can zhes bgyi bar 'gyur ram/ btsa ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin te/ 'jig rten gi khams de ni rin chen kun nas
300a6(mdo): bstsags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po'i tshe ji srid gnas pa nas bzung ste/
300a7(mdo): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de srid du byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob mchod par byed par 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur te/ dam pa'i chos yun ring
300a8(mdo): por gnas par bya ba'i phyir spro bar 'gyur ro// phyi ma'i dus su mengs pa'i cho nus nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab
300a9(mdo): 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dusal ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba
300b1(mdo): bla na myed pa/ lha dang myi rnams kyi stond pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan shi nad tu gnas pa'i nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de
300b2(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od gzer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po// de'i byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa dang / snang ba phun sum tshogs
300b3(mdo): pa ci 'dra ba de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shi nad tu gnas pa/ nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de'i yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ lhag chad myed cing shi nad tu skrag pa myed par 'gyur
300b4(mdo): ro// tshe'i yun dang dam pa'i chos gnas pa yang de srid du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo kapal la dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun
300b5(mdo): nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shind tu gnas pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de'i mtshan thos pa/ de dag
300b6(mdo): thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// pad ma'i dpal ki snyingapo bud myed ka la las/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
300b7(mdo): gshegs pa ka ser 'od ser ke'i rnam par rold pa'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dang / ma 'ongs pa de gnyis kyi mtshan thos na/ de bud myed kyi rang bzhin las 'gyur ro// bskal
300b8(mdo): pa bye ba phrag bzhi bcur 'khor ba brnyil bar 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun
300b9(mdo): la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang myi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rjes nas kyang rab tu 'byung ba 'thob par 'gyur/ tshe rabs dran pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa myed par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro//
301a1(mdo): de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang / myi dang / skye dku'i srog chags bye ba phrag dku bcu rtsa drug gis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ kang dag ma byon pa de dag dang / gang dag da ltar bzhugs
301a2(mdo): pa 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag dang / phyogs bcu na gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la phyar/ 'tshal lo// de dag gi mtshan gang lags pa de dag la yang rjes su yi rang ngo // tshig
301a3(mdo): 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lhan cig 'tshogs pa thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o zhes smras so// de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das
301a4(mdo): kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnams
301a5(mdo): par dag go// dge slong bdun stong ni lend pa myed par zag/ pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas de'i tshe bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
301a6(mdo): phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gis phyogs bcu
301a7(mdo): na/ bcom ldan 'das dpag tu byed grangs myed pa dag gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa pa mthong ba/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas so//
301a8(mdo): mthong nas kyang tshig 'di skad 'dzind to// bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di gnyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis legs par yongs su bzung ba las
301a9(mdo): ste/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyed cig gis lung stond pa ni/ ngo mtshard to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal ki snying pos
301b1(mdo): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo'i sde zab mo 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
301b2(mdo): bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu stond pa de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs
301b3(mdo): pa la yongs su 'dri ba'i gtam 'dis ci zhig bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can dman pa la mos pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa la yid myi ches par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de
301b4(mdo): ltar 'di dag yun ring por gnod pa dang / phan pa myed pa dang / bde' ba myed pa dang / log par ltung bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
301b5(mdo): bu mo dag rgya chen po la mos pa dang / mos pa mang ba dag kyang mchis/ slad ma'i skye bo rnams la yang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pas skye bo mang po la
301b6(mdo): smand pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du bshad par gsol da/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su lad pa/ pad ma'i dpal gi snying po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la
301b7(mdo): yid la zung shig dang / bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal ki snying pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyand pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
301b8(mdo): kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// rigs kyi bu 'di la myi ga pal la stobs dang ldan pa/ mthu dang ldan pas bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ ji tsam sems can gi khams
301b9(mdo): su gdags pas/ btags pa'i sems can gi khams de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas ches mang bar gsungs kyi/ sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin te/ sems can de dag thams cad bskal pa bye ba mtha'
302a1(mdo): yas mu myed par mgo bo 'am/ phrag pa 'am/ laka pa na thogs te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar dag tu gos dang zas dag byin te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byed/ bla mar
302a2(mdo): byed na pad ma'i dpal gi snying po mya de bzhi las/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ sems can kacig la yang se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig/ byams pa'i sems can kyis khyab par
302a3(mdo): bgyis nas/ de tsam gyis kyang bsod nams mang du bskyed na/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas mu ma mchis par sems can thams cad bzung ste/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror bgyis pa lta smos kyang
302a4(mdo): ci 'tshal/ bka' sra yad pa/ pad ma'i dpal ki snying po khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// kang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdol sde 'di lta bu 'di byang
302a5(mdo): chub kyi sems la gnas ste/ lend pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi
302a6(mdo): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa la zhugs pa mang ba dag gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i
302a7(mdo): dpal gi snying pos 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo' sde 'di lta bu 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bdag cag
302a8(mdo): gis blang bar 'gyi/ gzung bar bgyi// bcang par bgyi// klag par bgyi// kungan chub par bgyi/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstand par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bar
302a9(mdo): ma'i dpal gi snying pos tshig de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu bcu rtsa drug gis dbyangs gcig tu/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang
302b1(mdo): mdol sde 'di lta bu 'di blang bar bkyi/ gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstand par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das/
302b2(mdo): kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' su lang to// pad ma'i dpal ki snying po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rnam grangs 'di bud myed kyis thos ma thag tu bud myed kyi dngos po las/
302b3(mdo): rgyur te/ rgyu gnyis ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ phrag dog dang / ser sna'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i bu brgya stong du ma
302b4(mdo): dag gis lha'i me tog man da ra ba dka/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po de dag la mngon bar gtor da to// lha'i bsil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya
302b5(mdo): stong bsil nas/ 'di skad ces kyang 'dze rad to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag ki rna lam du klaka pa dka legs/ par bton nas 'dzind pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya
302b6(mdo): cher yang dag par rab tu stond pa'i sems can de dag gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de de
302b7(mdo): bzhin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag na 'dug pa dang / gang dag gis thos nas mos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas khri la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ de nas
302b8(mdo): sring mo brdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa de snyams sa langs nas lhag pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis phrag dog dang
302b9(mdo): ser sna spangs ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni med pa gsung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag
303a1(mdo): sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhing / bud byed gzhan dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na/ zos pa'i mod la bud myed kyi dngos po las 'gyur ba lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du phung po 'di nyid la/ bud byed kyil
303a2(mdo): dbang po myi gda' bar 'gyur te/ skyes pa'i dbang po 'byung bar gyur da cig/ ces smras so// de nas sring mo de nyid du bud myed kyi dbang po myi snang bar gyur da te/ skyes pa'i dbang po byung bar gyur to// de yang
303a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zlog pa zhes bya bar
303a4(mdo): 'gyur ro zhes lung bstand to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa la nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gi snying po dang / dge slong de dag
303a5(mdo): dang / byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag dang / lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
303a6(mdo): bar bstod do// / 'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol/ rdzogs s+ho//
303a7(mdo): rgya kar gi mkhan po su len dra bo de dang / zhu chen ki lo ba ban de ye she sde bsgyurd cing / zhus te gtan la phab pa/
303a8(mdo): // rgya kar skad du/ a n+ya sa ma dI ma tra u ta ma// bod skad du/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzind kyi mchog dam pa/ bam po gcig ko// / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i
303a9(mdo): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun sum khri dang / byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu chen po lnga stong tsam dang / lga dang / klu las sogs pa sde brgyad dang / lba dang myi
303b1(mdo): las stsogs pa 'khor mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang phyogs bzhi'i 'gon po bzhi dang / srin po dang yi dgas las stsogs pa sde bzhi 'khor der 'dus par gyurd to//
303b2(mdo): de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gi ting nge 'dzi nad du zhugs nas/ cang myi gsung zhing bzhugs pa las 'khor mang po the tsom du gyurd to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu chos kyi rgyal bu 'dug par
303b3(mdo): mas spangs te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod// gi nad tu legs so chos kyi rje// ting nge 'dzin la zhi bar bzhugs// 'khor
303b4(mdo): kyi dkyil 'khor mang po rnams// thams cad the tsom skyes par gyur // nad tu legs po nyi zla'i 'od// cang myi gsung bar snang myi mdzad// shind tu legs so rin chen
303b5(mdo): gter// dbul 'phongs rnams la sbyin myi mdzad// shind/ tu legs so mya'i rgyal// ting nge 'dzind las bzhengs su gsol// nad tu legs so klu'i rgyal// bdud rtsi'i
303b6(mdo): char pa dbab du gsol// sha nid tu legs so lha'i mchog/ myur du chos rnams bstand tu gsol// shind tu legs so sems can la// theg pa gcig don bstand du gsol// de nas
303b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzind de las bzhengs nas/ 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsald to// pa la rin po che bla na myed pa'i ye shes mang du yod pa khyed la phan pa dang / bde bar
303b8(mdo): mdzad cing dbul 'phongs pa dang bral ba yod kyis/ the tsom ma byed par ci dang ni 'dod pa dris shig/ de nas dka' bo stan las langs te sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
303b9(mdo): gis ni mang du thos pas tha na myed pa'i byang chub myur du thob snyam snyam na/ mdo sde dag las bshad pa thos pa ltar na mang du thos shing shes rab rno ba'i dbang po dang ldan pa ni byang chub thob par shi nad tu dka' ste/
304a1(mdo): bkyegs brgyad du skye'o zhes byung na/ bdag gis ji ltar bla na myed pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' bo la bka' su khad pa/ dga' bo mang du thos pa la sems
304a2(mdo): rnam pa gnyis te/ kang zhe na ting nge 'dzind kyi sems dang 'khrul pa'i sems so// sems ting nge 'dzin la gnas na ni mang du thos kyang gnod pa myed do// sems 'khru lad pa la gnas na ni mang du thos kyang
304a3(mdo): phan pa myed de/ gang gis ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab shi nad tu ldan na/ myur du bla na myed pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro// dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mdol kun las ting nge
304a4(mdo): 'dzind dang / shes rab ni mchog dam pa zhes bstod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsa lad pa/ dga' bo ting nge 'dzind dang shes rab tu ldan pa/ dper na ri dgas kyi
304a5(mdo): na na seng ge mchog tu gyur pa dang / snang ba thams cad kyi nang na nyi ma mchog tu gyur pa dang / ri'i nang na ri rab lhun/ po mchog tu gyur pa lta bu'o// de yang ci'i phyir zhe na/
304a6(mdo): ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab tu ldan pa'i shugs ni mchog dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' bo la bka' su lad pa/ dka' bo kal te myi zhig gis shing tsan dan las
304a7(mdo): stong gsum ki stong chen po'i 'jig rten ki kha bas gang ba'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa dang / myi gzhan zhig gis rin po che sna bdun las stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten ki khams gang ba'i gtsug lag
304a8(mdo): khang byas na/ myi gnyis kyi bsod nams mnyam pa yin nam/ dga' bos gsol pa/ myi de gnyis kyi nang na rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i bsod nams mchog go// sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo
304a9(mdo): lo bka' su lad pa/ gzhan yang myi zhi ka kis gser tha mal ba las stor gsum ki stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kang ba'i gtsug laka khang byas pa dang / myi gzhan zhig kis kaser gtsom las
304b1(mdo): stong gsum ki stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kang ba'i gtsug lag khang byas na/ de gnyis bsod nams mnyam pa yin nam/ dka' bos gsol pa/ gser katsom las byas pa'i bsod nams rab
304b2(mdo): tu che'o// sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsa la pa/ gal te myi zhig gis shing tsan dan dang spos kyi shing gzhan dag las/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten ka khams gang ba'i sku gzugs byas
304b3(mdo): te mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang / myi gzhan zhig ki girje gtsom dang / rin po che sna bdun las stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kang ba'i sku gzugs byas te mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal nas
304b4(mdo): myi gnyis kyi bsod nams la khyad par yod dam/ dag bos gsol pa// rin po che sna bdun dang / kaser gtsom las sku gzugs bgyis pa'i bsod nams che'o// sangs
304b5(mdo): rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsa sad pa/ gal te myi zhigakis sbyin pa chen po'i sems bskyed de/ rin po che lnga bdun/ ki mdzod dang / chung ma dang bu sbyin pa byin na/ myi gzhan
304b6(mdo): zhig gis yan laka ki dam pa mgo dang / myig dang lus dang rnyed dka' ba'i rin po che sna bdun gi bar mdzod kyi sbyin pa byin pa na myi gnyis kyi bsod nams la khyad par ci yod/ dga' bos gsol/
304b7(mdo): pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang / sus dang chung ma dang / bur bcas pa'i sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams che ba lags so// sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' su yad pa/ gal te myi zhig kis mdo sde bcul
304b8(mdo): gnyis kyis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams gang ba'i myi rnams dang / 'jig rten ki khams gang ba'i phyi rnams la 'jig rten du spe lang te/ klog cing kha ton byed du 'jug pa dang / de la/
304b9(mdo): myi zhig gis stong gsum ki stong chen po'i 'jig rten ki khams gang ba'i myi rnams yi ge bzhin du 'dond cing / gang yi ge yang don stond cing khongs su chud na/ myi de gnyis kyi bsod nams kar che
305a1(mdo): dka' bos gsol pa// yi ge bzhin du 'dond cing khong du chud pa'i bsod nams che'o// sangs rgyas kyis dka' bo la bka' stsal da pa/ gal te myi zhig kis mdo' sde bcu gnyis kyang thogs pa myed
305a2(mdo): kha ton shes la/ don zab mo myi shes pa mdo rje glegs pa ma 'am/ stong gsum ki stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams ga ba tsam 'chad na/ des kyi zhig mdo sde bcu gnyis byang bar kha ton shes la
305a3(mdo): don zab mo yang rtogs te/ mdo sde 'di glegs bam yang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams gang ba tsam 'chad na/ myi de gnyis kyi bsod nams gang mchog tu 'gyur ba yin/ dka' bos
305a4(mdo): gsol pa/ kha ton bgyis la don yang rtogs te/ gzhan la yang stond cing 'chad pa'i bsod nams mchog tu gyurd / pa lags so// sangs rgyas kyis dka' bo la bka'
305a5(mdo): stsa lad pa/ gal te myi zhig gi sa bcu gnyis 'greld cing / 'chad cing sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang // byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dka' ba dang / btang snyoms
305a6(mdo): myi spyod pa dang / gal te myi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang 'grel cing 'chad la sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang
305a7(mdo): mas dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa spyod cis sems can la sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams che zhing mang pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' bo la bka' stsa la pa/ gal te phyi zhig gis
305a8(mdo): mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang 'grel cing 'chad shes la/ bstan chos 'u tha bco lnga yang byang bar 'chad shes te/ 'jig rten du spel ba dang / de la myi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang 'grel cing 'chad shes
305a9(mdo): dkri ba'i bstan da chos dang / nges pa'i bstan chos dang / phung po'i bstan chos dang / rtend cing 'breld par 'byung ba bcu gnyis kyang 'grel cing 'chad la nges pa'i bstan chos dang / phung lo lnga'i/
305b1(mdo): bstan chos dang / rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis kyi bstan chos dang / khams bcol brgyad kyi bstan chos dang / stong pa chen po'i bstan chos dang / nyi zla'i bstan chos dang / zla ba sbyin ka bstan//
305b2(mdo): chos dang / mdo sde brgyad kyi bstan chos dang / don dam pa nyid kyi bstan chos dang / rdo rje snying po'i bstan chos dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i bstan chos dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo gsum ki bstan
305b3(mdo): bcos las stsogs pa bstan bcos shu ta bco lnga yang shes la sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyang spyad de/ tshul khrims 'chal
305b4(mdo): ba dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / sems gnyis su myed cing nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa dang / sems can gi skyon thams cad myi mthong zhing / sems can rnams la bu'i
305b5(mdo): gcig pa dang 'dra bar snyoms te/ dgra sdang ba la nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa dang / de la myi zhig gis phyogs bcu rgyas pa/ 'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la skur pa myi 'debs na/ myi de
305b6(mdo): gnyis kyi bsod nams gang che ba yin/ dga' bos gsol pa/ phyogs bcur brgyas pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la bskur ba ma btab na/ myi de'i bsod nams tshad ma mchis grangs ma
305b7(mdo): mchis te/ bsam gis myi khyab pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ gzhan yang myi zhig gis gong du smos pa'i bsod nams thams cad kyang / stong gsum gi stong chen po'i
305b8(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams gang bar byed nus la/ mdo sde bcu gnyis dang bstan chos 'u ta ma bco lnga rnyed kyang kha ton dang 'greld cing 'chad nus te/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / byams pa las
305b9(mdo): stsogs pa dag kyang spyod/ sbyin pa yang byed de/ mang du thos pa'i mchog tu yang gyur la/ chos thams cad stong zhing zhi ba'i don yang ston te/ nyan pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga thob par byed de/
306a1(mdo): de ltam phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byas kyang / des ni myi zhig nyin cig kam/ mtshan cig ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa tsam du gyi yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mang du thos pa'i gang
306a2(mdo): zag ni ri 'am rgya mtsho ltar brgyal gi sems che'o// de ltar rgya che ba ni ngan song du bskal pa grangs myed pa'i bar du lug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba de las tha ra na yang mdab chags kyi byar skye bar
306a3(mdo): 'gyur na/ mang du thos pa la phan pa ci yod/ ral bsam gtan gi ting nge 'dzin yod pa ni lce shi 'khor ba'i sdig Sha na ma tho bo'i las lci ba byang bar nus so// mang du thos pa ni rtsa dpa'adra'o// ting nge 'dzidad
306a4(mdo): ni me dang 'dra'o// mang du thos pa ni lugs dang 'dra'o// bas gtan gi ting nge 'dzin da ni rtsa'i sdong po dang 'dra'o// mang du thos pa ni rtsang po dang 'dra'o// bsam gtan gi ting nge 'dzin ni
306a5(mdo): rgya mtsho dang 'dra ste/ ngas bsamam gtan ki ting nge 'dzin // ki bsod nams dang / yon tan bshad na zad pa'i mtha' myed/ de bskal bar yang myi rdzogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
306a6(mdo): dka' bo la bka' stsal pa/ nga mngon gsum du dran pa sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ mang du thos pa'i skye bor gyur pa'i tshe/ 'jam dpal dang nga gnyis yod myed gnyis la rtsod par gyur da te/
306a7(mdo): 'jam dpal ni yod ces spa/ ras ni myed do zhes smras te/ yod myed gnyis kyi bden pa la rtsod par gyurd te/ gcig tu ma chad do// mtha' tshe 'phos na ngan song gsum du ltung ste/ bskal pa grangs myed
306a8(mdo): kyi bar du lcags kyi thu lum za bar gyur te/ dmyal ba de de las tha rad te/ sangs rgyas 'od srung dang 'phrad nas yod pa dang myed pa gnyis 'od srung kyis 'di skad du bshad do// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
306a9(mdo): ni gcig tu nges shing tshad byed de/ phyed yod pa myed par smra ba ni don de lta bu ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyis zhi ba ste/ bden pa gnyis ni yod pa yang ma yin
306b1(mdo): byed pa yang ma yin te/ khyed shes pa ni yi ge'i don shes par zad kyi don zab mo myi shes pas/ don 'di lta bu ni khyed dmus long ma/ 'on pa 'di lta bu yin na/ don zab mo 'di lta bu ji ltar shes shing rtogs par/
306b2(mdo): 'gyur zhes bshad pa thos nas ri dben par song ste/ bdag yid la byas nas bsam gtan ki ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so// zhag bdun lon pa dang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzind
306b3(mdo): rnam gsum gsam dang / ye shes rnam gsum dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di dag rtogs shing khong du chud par 'gyur te/ chos thams cad stong pa
306b4(mdo): nyid kyis zhi ba ci yang myed par rtogs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// de bas na bsam gtan bsgom pa ni mchog dam par rig par
306b5(mdo): bya ste/ gang zhig nyin cig gamag mtshan gcig gam/ nyin zhag bdud gi bar du bsam gtan ki ting nge 'dzind bsgom/ ke na/ bskal pa grangs myed pa tshun chad kyi kha na ma tho ba'i sdig kyi/
306b6(mdo): ba yang khad kyis zhi zhing byang bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang kha na ma tho ba'i sdig lci yang 'byang bar 'gyur te/ de gang zhe na pha ma bsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / mchod rten
306b7(mdo): dang gtsug lag bshig pa dang / dge 'dun ki khang pa mes btang ba yin te/ phas pham pa bzhi dang / phas pham pa brgyad dang / lci ba lnga dang / rang bzhin ni lci ba drug nyams pa yin te/ phyogs bcu rgyas pa'i
306b8(mdo): mdo'i sde la bskur ba btab pa yin na pha rol pa'i nyes pa'i skyon spa zhing bkur bsti myi byed pa yin/ gong du smos pa'i nga rgyal che ba dang / rang bzhin kis sdig lci ba lnga yin te/ de yang bsam gtan gi
306b9(mdo): ting nge 'dzind bskos na rang zhi zhing 'byang bar 'gyur te/ de yang bsam gtan ki ting nge 'dzin gi mthus 'byang gi/ gzhan gi mthus 'byang ba ma yin no// nyin zhag bdun tsam gyis kyang de ltar yon tan dang
307a1(mdo): bsod nams dpag tu myed pa 'thob na/ tshigacig tu dben sar ri da shing drung du 'dug ce/ tog la bams pa dang / 'jug pa dang rlo pa yi sa byed pa / chos kyang kyi dgos// de ci'i phyi
307a2(mdo): zhe na/ sems ni 'bab chu dang / 'dra ste skad cig kyang myi sdod/ sems ni spre'u dang mtshungs te gcig btang yang gcig 'dzind to// mdor na sems ni ting nge 'dzin gi dbang gis kayo'o// gal te sems
307a3(mdo): g.yol na chos thams cad la 'khrul pa'i 'du shes skye'o// gal te ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa ni 'jig rten skye ba dang / gnas pa dang 'gog pa'i 'du shes shing rtogs te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis zhi ba'i
307a4(mdo): myi rtag par 'gyur zhing 'pho ba/ stong zhing bdag myed pa skyu ma dang 'dra ba/ sprul pa lta bu kloka dang rlung dang / dri za'i krong khyer lta nu chu'i khu ba dang / smyig rgyu dang brag cha dang / bar snar
307a5(mdo): gi bya rjes lta bur rtogs so// 'jig rten na srid pa'i ri dang / tshal dang rtsang po dang 'bang chu dang / mtshe'u dang lteng / ka dang / rgya mtsho las srogs pa chu thams cad kyang me'i
307a6(mdo): bskal pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe/ thams cad tshig cing zad par 'gyur yang bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi ma rtogs te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du
307a7(mdo): ges na bsam gtan gi mthu ni shind tu bsam gis myi khyab par rig par bya'o// sems ting nge 'dzin la gnas na phyogs bcu'i stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams nyi ma dang / zla ba dang
307a8(mdo): skar ma dang / 'bab chu dang / mang po dang / rgya mtsho dang ri dang / tshal dang krung du lung gA g+hu ru ra'i 'bras bu lag mthil du bzhag pa bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gi ting nge 'dzind la gnas
307a9(mdo): nas rdzu 'phrul gyis phyogs bcu 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang phyi nad cing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi rlung dang / me dang sa dang / chu dang nyi ma dang / zla ba dang skar ma dang
307b1(mdo): gza' dang ri dang / tshal dang chu dang / shing dang lha'i pho brang dang / klu'i pho brang yang rdzu 'phrul kis sbrul nus te/ de bas na bsam gtan gi mthus ni gnad tu bsam gyis myi khyab par rig par bya/ bsam gtan ki ting /
307b2(mdo): nge 'dzind kyi shugs kyis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams kyang sprul nus so// dka' bo me'u 'gal gi bu chen po ting nge 'dzind du zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzind kyis rnam pa sna tshogs
307b3(mdo): su sprul cing / sa chen po 'di yang 'gal me bskor ba bzhin du bskor nus te/ mang du thos pa ni de ltar gyi nus par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' bo la khyod sa chen po bsgul cig ces bka'
307b4(mdo): su yad pa dang / dka' bos gsol pa/ bdag la bsam gtan gi ting nge 'dzin ma mchis pas bskul rdo myi thog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsa lad pa// bsam gtan
307b5(mdo): ki ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa/ dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi ma thob kyang mang du thos pa las khri phrag brgya stong gis 'phags so// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'od ma'i tshal na gnas pa'i dge slong lnga brgya
307b6(mdo): tsam zhig thams ga bas phag 'tshal nas/ sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mang du thos pa bslabs te/ mdo sde bca gnyis kyang
307b7(mdo): cad mang du thos pa lta zhig las / bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la me'u 'gal ki rdzu 'phrul dang / ting nge 'dzind mchog go zhes gsungs pa thos nas/ sangs rgyas gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan
307b8(mdo): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mang du thos pa bslabs te/ mdol sde bcu gnyis kyang khong du chud nas rgyal zhes
307b9(mdo): chen po bcu drug rnyed kyang bdag cag la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar gus shing bkur bstir bgyid na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du zos pa ni/ nam yang bla na myed pa'i byang chub thob par myil
308a1(mdo): 'gyur ro zhes gsungs zhes gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la dge slong lnga brgya po mthun par dus gcig tu bdag cag ni mang du thos pa spang zhing / bsam gtad ki ting nge 'dzin la rmo/
308a2(mdo): bo zhes gsold to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsa yad pa/ dge slong khyed mang du thos pa spangs te/ bsam gtan gi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug go zhes ma smra zhig/ ngas bltas na khyed kyi shes rab
308a3(mdo): ni sbrang bu'i 'dab mas nyi zla sgrib par 'dod pa dang / dmus long gis ri rab lhun po 'dzeg par 'dod pa dang / gru gzings myed par rgya mtsho la rgal bar 'dod pa dang / bya 'dab ma chag pa nam mkha' la 'phur
308a4(mdo): 'dod pa bzhin khyod kyang de dang 'dra'o zhes bka' stsa khad pa dang / dge slong rnams shi ba tsam du 'jigs shing skrag pa'i sems skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rnams la bka' stsa lad pa
308a5(mdo): dge slong khyed ma 'jigs ma skrag par sems ting nge 'dzin da la zhog cig/ bdag cag la bsam gtan gi mthu yang ma mchis na ting nge 'dzind du ka la 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
308a6(mdo): kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ nga la sman dam pa yod de/ khyed ting re 'dzin thob par bya'o zhes bka' su lad pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstand tu gsol// bdag cag
308a7(mdo): gis de bzhin du spyod par 'tshal lo zhes gsold to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa sad pa/ sman dam pa zhes bya ba 'di lta ste/ rtog pa dang bsal ba dang / 'jug pa dang spong ba'o// dge slong rnam
308a8(mdo): kyis gsol ba rtog pa dang / bsal ba dang 'jug pa dang / spong ba ci lags bdag cag gis ma 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstand tu gsol/ de nas yang sangs rgyas kyis 'di skad ces bka'
308a9(mdo): su yang to// dang po'i sems ni rtog pa zhes bya 'a/ sems gnyis thub ba ni bsam pa zhes bya/ sems gsum 'byung ba ni 'jug pa zhes bya/ sems bzhi 'thung ba ni spong ba zhes bya'o// gzhan/
308b1(mdo): yang 'di lta ste/ bas ma gtan dang pos rtog pa zhes byab// bsam gtan gnyis pa la bsam pa zhes bya / bsam gtan gsum pa sa 'dug pa zhes bya/ bsum gtan bzhi pa la spong ba shes bya'o//
308b2(mdo): gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/
308b3(mdo): bzhin du mngon par shes pa bzhi dang / chos thams cad 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul ki rkang pa bzhi dang / bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzind bzhi dang / mtshan ma myed pa bzhi dang / byang
308b4(mdo): chub bzhi yin na/ dge slong khyed bsam gtan dang po yang bsal bar ma rtogs na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / chos zas cad lta ci smos/ dge slong dag thabs sna tshogs bsam gtan
308b5(mdo): gi ting nge 'dzind la 'jug par bya'o// gal te myi rtsang bal rtog na lus kyi chen po bzhi pags pa dang / rus pa dang / tshigs pa dang / brnag khrag zag pa dang / sdong bu ka dgu
308b6(mdo): yod pa'i nang du chu zugs na/ zag pa bzhin du myi rtsang ba'i dngos po ka shang gyi che chung dang rtsog pa shin tu sbyor rung ba zag pa mthong ngo // ting nge 'dzind de las kyang dngos po rnam pa
308b7(mdo): sna tshogs mthong ba 'di ni 'di ltar g.yo ba dang / gnas pa dang rnam par bsngos pa dang / rnam par ser ba dang / rnam par dkar ba dang / rnam par brnag pa tha dad pa sna tshogs mthong bas sems ma 'khrul bar
308b8(mdo): gyur da na dngos po de dag mthong ba'i tshe/ phyir zlog par bya'o// rus pa dkar po dang dbugs kyi nang du rgyu/ bgrang ba'i rtog pa yang de dang 'dra'o// gang te chus gli'i khyis pa nyes pa / dge bong sa cab brgyad nyams pa dang / dgel
308b9(mdo): bsnyen mas khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi nyams pa dang / dge tshul gyi khrims nyams pa dang / dge slong mas lci ba drug nyams pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gi spyi dkor brkus pa dang / mkhan po/
309a1(mdo): so/ dang slob dpon dang / bla ma dang pha ma dang / dge 'dun kyi dkor brkus pa dang / phyogs bcu brgyas pa'i mdo sde la bskur ba'i gang bag de lta bu ni/ bsam gtan ki ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i tshe/
309a2(mdo): bdag gi lus dang rag dang / rlung nag po lta bu dang khrag ni me rab tu 'bar ba dang / rus pa na ri dang brag lta bu dang / rtsa ni shing lta bu dang / nang grol lA ni sbrul lam rtsar spre lta bur mthong ba dang / laka na me tog chen
309a3(mdo): po thogs te rlung chen po la rgyug pa dang / mgo la rin po che khyer nas langs kyang rdab 'chos pa dang / seng ge 'byung ba dang / myig nas 'bar ba mo 'byung ba dang / sna las sbrul chen po 'byung ba dang / rna ba'
309a4(mdo): nas 'phar spyang 'byung ba dang / gshar lci ta chung lta bur 'bab cing rgya mtsho'i chu lta bur mthong ba dang / gal te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad cho 'phrul rnam pa mang po stond pa'
309a5(mdo): mthong na mtshan de lta bu mthong ba'i tshe ga bsam gtan las langs te/ tshal lam ri dgon par mthong ste/ phyogs bcu/ rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dond cing 'gyod tshangs bya'o// de
309a6(mdo): ltar sngon gi kha na mtho ba'i sdig 'gyod tshangs bya ba ya yang na zhag bdun nam/ bdud gnyis sam/ bdun gsum ba mam/ bdun bzhi 'am/ bdun lnga 'am bdun drug gam
309a7(mdo): bdun bdun gi bar du 'thol tshangs bya'o// de ltar sdig sbyangs nas bsam gtan bsgom par bya ste/ de la sdig chung ba ni bags kyis bdag gi lus bye du r+ya'i ri reb lta bur mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang
309a8(mdo): rtsa ba bzhi ma nyams pa nas/ rang bzhin ki khrims lci ba lnga'i bar du ma nyams pa ni ting nge 'dzind du 'jug pa'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dus gcig tu chos stond pa dang / de na yang bden pa bzhi 'am
309a9(mdo): rdzu 'phrul ki rkang pa bzhi 'am/ sdug bsngal dang / bzod pa dang / kyi bo dang / 'jig rten mchog gi chos stond pa dang / yang dgra byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / skyes bu s+ya brgyad
309b1(mdo): kyi chos dang / stong pa nyid bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin gsum dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad stond par mthong ba dang / ting nge 'dzind las sun nag mthong ba dang / sdang ba mthong na ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ shinang tu
309b2(mdo): dga' ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o zhes bka' stsald pa dang / dge slong dag phyir gnas pa'i tshul du dong ste/ bsam gtan ki ting nge 'dzin nyin zhag bdun bsgoms pas/ thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa thob par gyur
309b3(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags te/ sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sangs rgyas kyis bstand pa bzhin 'khor ba las tha rad te/ bla na myed pa'i 'bras
309b4(mdo): bur thob bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su lad pa de ltar thob na cho 'phrul bstand pa'i dus la bab bo zhes bka' stsal da pa dang / dge slong lnga brgya rnams steng ki bar snang la 'phakra
309b5(mdo): te nyam pa dang / 'dug pa dang / 'gro ba dang / sdod pa dang / lus la me dang / chu las stsogs pa'i 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul rnam pa bcol brgyad mngon par bstand te/ de'i tshe mang du thos
309b6(mdo): pa'i dge slong rnams bsam gtan bsgoms pas/ me'u 'gal gi bu chen po dang 'dra bar rdzu 'phrul tha myi dad par 'gyur ro// de nas dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to//
309b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos 'di de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas/ ji srid du gnas shing dus ngan pa'i tshe/ sems can ji snyed cig chos 'di bsgoms pas dge slong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur/
309b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' sa sad pa/ par byin chad dpyid skra 'bring po la ma mchog gi grong khyer du mya ngan las 'das so// mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya bcu'i bar du chos la spyod pa'i sems can
309b9(mdo): mang du 'byung ste/ dur khrod dang shing drung na gnas shing / 'di yid la byed de rtog pa dang gsal ba dang / 'jug pa dang / spong ba'i chos spyod pa stong phrag bcu la/ stong phrag dkus dge sbyong ki 'bras bu bzhi thob par/
310a1(mdo): 'gyur ro// mo sum brgya'i bar du ni sems can stong phrag brgyal/ stong phrag bcus dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur ro// lo sum brgya phan chad lo lnga brgya tshun chad ni/ nga'i nye gnas/
310a2(mdo): rnams bkas kyis myi dge ba'i chos spyod do// 'phra dog gi sems kyis log pa'i 'tsho ba'i 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// stong phrag brgya la stong phrag bcus dge sbyong gi 'bras bu 'thob bo// lo lnga brgya phan tshad brgyad brgya tshun chad
310a3(mdo): kyi nga'i nye gnas rnaMs lci ba'i kos gyon nas/ ba lang dang / luka dang / byi la dang / bong bu dang / rta gsol zhing 'bru mang po sog ste/ rang gis lag dar zhing rang za ba dang / bran po dang / bran mo yang gsol bar 'gyur te/
310a4(mdo): de'i tshe stong phrag stong la/ stong phrag gcig gis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur ro// so brgyad brgya phan chad nas/ lo stong tshun chad ni nga'i nye gnas rnams sdig pa'i chos
310a5(mdo): slob ste// rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po dang / khyim bdag la grogs por bstend cing / phan tshun tha na phrinagis 'drul zhing mo rko byed de/ 'bru bzan mang po dang / gser
310a6(mdo): dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna bdun sog cing sha za zhing chang 'thung ste/ chen po bzhi gsol zhing rtas par byed pa dang / smad 'tshong ma ltar mdog sdug gu dang / kos gyon cing 'drid pa dang // slu ba'i
310a7(mdo): las byed de// de la 'bum phrag khri la/ brgya tsam zhig kis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob bo// le stong phan chad sum brgya tshun chad ni/ tshe zang du 'khrugs te/ nga'i nye gnas rnams lus chos gos gyon yang shing
310a8(mdo): kha la 'phan snying btags pa dang 'dra ste/ gzi' byin yang myed/ khyim pas mthong na yang bkur bsti yang myi byed pas shan pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de'i dus na yul khams kyang 'khrugs te/ gcig
310a9(mdo): pa gcig dgra byed cing gsod pas/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pha ma dang / bu dang / nu bo dang / gcig la gcig dgra byed de/ byams pa dang / snying rje ba'i sems kyang myed pas bza' ba dang / btung
310b1(mdo): bse nyon mongs te khyim tab myed pa dang / chung ma myed pa dang / bu bo myed pa dang / bu mo myed pa dang / long ba dang / 'on pa dang / rgug pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / bran mo dang / bran mo las bros pa
310b2(mdo): yul khams phung bar byed pa/ 'tsho bas rang myi sos pa dag nga'i chos la zhugs na/ khyim pa rnams kyis kyang rngon pa dang 'dra bar lta ste/ dper na lha'i gling ngam// rta rgod dam/ ba lang myos pa ltar gdul dka'
310b3(mdo): ba dang / rang dkar yang 'gro ba/ slob dpon dang / slob ma yang myi rgod ma rungs pa dang 'dra ste/ 'dod chags la bka myed par kar gnas kyang / chang 'chang ba dang / shan pa dang / rngan pa dang / smad 'tshang ma
310b4(mdo): spyod cing / bla ma dang kong ma'i rim pa yang myed pa dang / bzang ngan gi rim pa yang myed de/ dud 'gro phyugs dang 'dra ba/ kha na mtho ba'i sdig pa mang po byed cing / ngan song gsum kis myi
310b5(mdo): 'jigs par gar song gar gnas kyang / chang 'tshong ba dang shan pa dang / rngon pa dang / smad 'tshong ma dang sten cing 'grogs/ pa kha nas kyang ngag sdig pa smra zhing / sems la yang sdig
310b6(mdo): pa sems pa dang / yang na blon po dang sten cing dge ba'i myi dag la thabs sna tshogs kyis bsdigs shing / nor 'phrogs te bu smadagaso' yang na/ rngon pa'i yo byad nya brgya las stsogs pa 'chang
310b7(mdo): zhing / nya las stsogs pa bcus nas rang gi lag dar te gsod pa dang / bsreg pa dang / zla ba nya ba dang / shi ba'i tshe gsol spyod myi byed de/ rang nyams su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims kyi las byed pa rnams phan tshun
310b8(mdo): rtsod cing bla ma 'am/ 'og ma 'am grogs po la zhe sdang ba dang / gdug pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / slob dpon dang / slob ma yang gcig la gcig skyon 'dru zhing 'phya ba dang / sgrogs pa'i gtam smra ste/ dper/
310b9(mdo): na rtsangs spra mang po kun gcig tu 'dus pa dang 'dra ba dang / phan tshun dpung dang sde gcig la gcig tshig ngan kyis sma 'bebs pa dang / bla 'og gi rim pa yang myed pa dang / myi rgod ma rungs pa ltar dge ba byed pa
311a1(mdo): las phrog rlom byed pa dang / khye dang grags pa la chags ste chog kyi zhes par gyur da pa de'i tshe/ mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang nub par gyur da te/ klog pa dang / 'don pa yang myed pa dang / de'i srog
311a2(mdo): ma rnams kyang dgra chos dang / gtsug lag khang dang / yi ge dang rtse ba dang / bzhon pa dang / bon chos dang / myig mangs dang / glu gar dang / ru ba dang / spyugs pa dang / 'phong rtsal dang / rta rgyug pa las stsogs pa'i
311a3(mdo): chos ma yin pa'i slob cing spyod de/ de ltar ma lags pa'i chos spyod pas/ tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song gsum du ltung ste/ bskal pa grangs myed par ngan song gi sdug bsngal myong nas/ de las tha rad nas yang byol
311a4(mdo): song du skye ste/ ltogs pa dang skom pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis nyend pa dang / khal lci ba 'gyel zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ci zhig na sbyangs pa'i yon tan slob pa yang / chos ma yin
311a5(mdo): ba mang du byed de/ ri dang tshal dang / dur khrod dang / shing drung na myi gnas shing rtag tu grong rgyu ste/ sems la rtog pa mang zhing khye dang grags pa tshol te/ nor rdzas dang / long spyod
311a6(mdo): la chags shing cho ga myi shes pa dang / chos stond pa'i bshad mkhan zhig yin na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos stond pa yang khri tsam la gcig tsam yang thog tu myi phebs te/ 'khor mang po dang
311a7(mdo): 'grogs nas/ grong rgyu zhing khyim du zhugs nas/ khyim pa la chos stond pa yang khye dang klags pa'i phyir te/ longs spyod mang du sogs shing shen pa dang 'dra'o// sha dang chang la myi spyod pa dag gis dge
311a8(mdo): slong dag khyed ni btsun pa/ khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu 'byung ba yin na/ snying rje ba'i sems kyang myed de/ 'di ltar chos ma yin pa mang du spyod pas/ khyed ni shen pa dang 'dra'o zhes spro zhing brgyad par
311a9(mdo): 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de skad gshel zhing thos nas kun log ste/ de la brdeg pa dang / gshe' ba dang / gcig la gcig 'di skad smras so// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i tshe na ni/ de dag
311b1(mdo): rang chang 'thung bar ma gnang ste/ de ded de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas/ da ni thabs ci yang kanang zas nye dag dang chang 'thung ba yin no// khyim pa dang bral ba'i 'og tu de dag gcig la gcig/
311b2(mdo): bdag cag gis shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas gsungs pa dang 'dra'o zhes smra zhing / la la na tshig khyal ba dang don myed pa'i tshig dang / 'gran dor gi tshig dang 'khruld pa'i tshig tu gtam smra zhing / dper na
311b3(mdo): dmus long zhig 'dzum mo gnyis nyi ma la btsugs te/ nyi ma ya kyi ni chung ngo yangs so dog go zhes smra zhing / myi 'on pa cig bdag cag gi gnas kyi steng na/ chos 'chad pa'i sgra thos so zhes zer ba dang
311b4(mdo): 'dra bar dmus long mang po tshogs te/ 'jig rten na 'jam dpal dang / 'od srung chen po las stsogs pa sprul te/ de'i nang na bzhugs kyang kyis brdeg cing gshel ste/ de nas smod
311b5(mdo): cing 'dug tu myi ster ro// gzhan yang dper na seng ge nI spos kyi ri la gnas te/ ri dgas dang gcan zan dang yang nyer/ myi bzod do// seng ge ni ri de las byung ste/ song ba'i
311b6(mdo): 'og tu ni ka can zan ka duka pa khro bo las stsogs pa gcig gis kacig thos te/ spos kyi mi las lhags nas/ 'bras bu zhim po za zhing chu dmyig la 'thung ngo // de ltar za zhing 'thung ba las
311b7(mdo): thams cad skams shing myed par gyur da te/ spos kyi ri la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang skyob par myi 'gyur bas/ rtsa gdug pa skyes te/ zos ma zag tu de'i tshe dus byas par 'gyur ro// mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu
311b8(mdo): dge slong thams cad kyis ngas bstand pa'i mdo'i sde bcu gnyis 'dond cing / klog pa yang gong ma'i ni bar du bcug/ bar pa ni 'og tu bcug/ 'og ma ni kong du bcug/ bar pa ni 'og dang tha mar bcug ste/ don ma
311b9(mdo): yin pa la ni don zhes zer/ don la ni don ma yin zhes zer te/ ji ltar mu stegs can dag so so nas nga'i gzhung ni bden pa yin no zhes zer ba dang 'dra'o// de'i dus na mdo'i sde bcu gnyis 'jig rten na spyod kyang
312a1(mdo): gzil brjid kyang mthu myed de/ la la zhig 'don da tam klog kyang / myi gcig 'ga' yang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob pa myed do// de ltar nga'i slob ma rnams kyang rgyal po srid ston pa 'am
312a2(mdo): bya 'dab ma myed pa dang 'dra ste/ gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten yang stongs shing zhig ral gso' ba yang myed do// de ltar sku gzugs dang ba dan dang / rin po che'i gdugs yod pa yang dgra ca zhig pa 'dra ste/ phug ron
312a3(mdo): dang bye'u dang / phag dang khyi dang / su ka las stsogs pa'i tshad dang gnas su 'gyur ro// dge slong so so na 'dug pa'i gnas ni gyi dor bzang du byed de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ 'di yang khyed la
312a4(mdo): mdo' tsam zhig bshad pa yin no// dka' bos sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas mchi ma blags te/ rus so// de ltar dka' bo yid gdung zhing mchi ma btang ba las/ bcom
312a5(mdo): ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod de ltar/ ma ngu bar mdo'i sde 'di gzungs su zung la/ 'jig rten du' rgyas par spel cig/ de nas dka' bos gdong mchi ma phyis
312a6(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis gzungs su gzung / zhes gsol to// brgya byin dang / lga dang / myi rnams kyis kyang dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa bdag
312a7(mdo): cag gis kyang yongs su bzung ste/ gang zhig mdol sde 'di ri 'am/ tshal lam shing drung ngam/ bas mtha' 'am/ dur khrod na gnas te/ 'dond tam klog na bdag cag gis lha dang myi'i 'khor dang
312a8(mdo): myi ma yin pa dang bcas te ka nas der 'gro zhing chung ngu na/ tshigs su bcad pa kacig kam/ tshig cig tsam yang myi brjed myi nyams par btang ngo zhes gsold to// mdo'i sde 'di gsungs pa'i tshe/ dgel/
312a9(mdo): slong stong snyed kyis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu thob par gyur da to// dge slong ma stong lnga brgyas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur da to// dge bsnyen lnga brgyas yongs su dag par gyurd to// lga dang myi
312b1(mdo): kyi dang / lha ma yin las stsogs pas phyag byas nas phyir dong ngo // 'phags pa ting nge 'dzind kyi mchog dam pa// rdzogs so//
312b2(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ a r+ya pra shan ta pi ni sa tsa yA pra ti ha r+ya na ma sa ma dI/ ma ha ya na su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa mo 'phrul ki ting nge 'dzin du ces
312b3(mdo): bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i mis
312b4(mdo): dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdus 'phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' dang thabs gcig tu
312b5(mdo): bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / sman ki rgyal po dang / sman yang dag byung dang
312b6(mdo): sman mngon bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang / laka na pad ma dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / rdul myed rnam par gnon dang / ngan song spong dang / ye shes bla ma'i ye shes ldan dang / rin chen bla ma'i ye shes
312b7(mdo): ldan dang / sems can kyi skad ye shes ldan dang / me tog bla ma'i ye shes ldan dang / zla ba'i bla ma'i ye shes ldan dang / dri ma myed pa'i bla ma'i ye shes ldan dang / rdo rje bla ma'i ye shes ldan dang / rdul
312b8(mdo): myed bla ma'i ye shes ldan dang / rnam par snang byed bla ma'i ye shes ldan dang / skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / ri bo'i rgyal mtshan dang / lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / chags myed rgyal mtshan dang / me tog rgyal
312b9(mdo): mtshan dang / dri ma myed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdul phra rab rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par snang byed rgyal mtshan dang / sa'i gzi'i brjid dang / rin chen
313a1(mdo): gzil brjid dang / the gros chen po'i gzi'i brjid dang / ye shes rdo rje'i gzi'i brjid dang / dri ma myed pa'i gzi'i brjid dang / nyi ma'i gzil 'dzid dang / bsod nams ri bo'i gzil brjid dang / ye shes
313a2(mdo): snang ba'i gzil brjid dang / mtshungs myed dpal gi gzi'i brjid dang / sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / pad ma'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam par dag pa'i snying
313a3(mdo): po dang / chos kyi phyag rgya'i snying po dang / rnam par snang byed snying po dang / lte ba'i snying po dang / pad ma'i dpal ki snying po dang / nyi ma'i myig dang / rnam par dag pa dri ma myed pa'i mchog dang / rnam par sangs rgyas
313a4(mdo): pa'i myig dang / chags pa myed pa'i myig dang / kun tu lta ba'i myig dang / shind tu rno ba'i myig dang / rdo rje'i myig dang / rin po che'i myig dang / nam mkha'i myig dang / kun nas myig dang /
313a5(mdo): lha'i cod pan dang chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i nor bu'i cod pan dang byang chub kyi snying po'i cod pan dang / rnam par snang byed cod pan / dang / sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i snying po'i cod pan dang
313a6(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang / dus thams cad mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang / dus thams cad du mngon par 'phags pa'i cad pan
313a7(mdo): dang / kun tu snang bar snang byed cod pan dang / zil kyis myi non pa'i cod pan dang / chos thams cad kyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri 'dzind pa'i cod pan dang / kun nas chos kyi dbyings nam
313a8(mdo): mkha' sdang ba'i cod pan dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / klu'i dbang po 'i gtsug phud dang / sangs rgyas 'phrul pa thams cad snang ba'i gtsug pud dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i gtsug pud dang /
313a9(mdo): smon lam rgya mtsho la thams cad kyi dbyangs nor bu rin po che rgyal po'i gtsug pud dang / dus gsum thams cad kun nas dbyangs kyi gtsug bud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa snang
313b1(mdo): ba'i rgyal mtshan nor bu'i rgyal po nor bu rin po che'i dra ba bres pa'i gtsug bud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs kyi gtsug pud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi
313b2(mdo): dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba nor bu rin po che mngon par bsgrags pa'i gtsug pud dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad dbyer myed pa rnam par shes pa nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa'i gtsug pud dang / 'od chen
313b3(mdo): dang / dri ma myed pa'i 'od dang / rin po che'i 'od dang / rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / snang ba'i 'od dang / chos kyi 'od dang / zhi ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / rnam par 'phrul ba'i 'od dang / lha'i 'od dang
313b4(mdo): bsod nams 'od dang / bsod nams kyi tog dang / ye shes kyi to// dung chos kyi tog dang mngon par shes pa'i tog dang / 'od kyi tog dang / me tog gi tog dang / nor bu'i tog dang / sangs rgyas kyi tog
313b5(mdo): dang / tshangs pa'i tog dang / kun nas snang ba'i tog dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / sa'i sgra dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i dpya ngas dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang / ri dbang po'i
313b6(mdo): rgyal po'i rdob pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyangs dang / thams cad rgyas par 'gyengs pa'i dbyangs dang / chos rgya mtsho thams cad bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i 'khor thams cad rab tu
313b7(mdo): klogs pa'i dbyangs dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul kyi 'brug bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / 'gro ba sdug bsngal thams cad dbugs 'byidad pa'i dbyangs dang / chos 'phags dang / khyad par 'phags dang / ye shes
313b8(mdo): 'phags dang / bsod nams ri rab 'phags dang / yon tan bsod nams phags dang / grags 'phags dang / kun nas snang ba 'phags dang / byams pa chen po 'phags dang / ye shes 'byung ba 'phag
313b9(mdo): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rus rigs 'phags dang / sdang ba'i dpal dang / mchog gi dpal dang / yang dag 'phags pa'i dpal dang / rnam par snang byed dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / tshogs kyi
314a1(mdo): kyi dpal dang / nam mkha'i dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / tog gi dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'gro ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i
314a2(mdo): dbang po'i rgyal po dang / ri bo'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / myi g.yol ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / khyu mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / blo mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / rab tu zhi ba'i nga ro dang / chags
314a3(mdo): myed nga ro dang / sa dbyangs nga ro dang / rgya mtsho 'brug bsgrags nga ro dang / sngon gi smon lam pa'i nga ro dang / rgya mtsho la dkyil 'khor sgra'i ra ro dang / ye shes lhun po'i blo dang / nam mkha'i blo dang / dri ma myed
314a4(mdo): pa'i blo dang / chags pa myed pa'i blo dang / rnam par sangs pa'i blo dang // rus gsum snang ba'i blo dang / rlabs po che'i blo dang rin po che'i blo dang / yangs pa'i blo dang / kun tu lta ba'i blo
314a5(mdo): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi tshul snang ba'i blo dang / de dag las stsogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnyed kyi/ byang chub
314a6(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang phyir myi ldog pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad myed pa'i chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa myed mnyam par gnas pa dang ldan pa
314a7(mdo): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pas/ las kun tu byung ba'i rnam par sbyind pa ji lta bu bzhin du mos pa/ rgyu las kun tu byung ba'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin du mos pa/ rgyu'i
314a8(mdo): 'bur 'byung ba lta bu'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang ldan pa/ myig yor dang gzugs brnyan ltar snang ba'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa/ sgra skad rnam par rig pa brag cha dang mtshungs pa'i chos
314a9(mdo): thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang rnam par thard pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzind thob pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog mtha' yas pa/
314b1(mdo): yongs su grub pa'i gzungs la rab tu gnas pa/ sgra tsam gyi khyon cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu sto dra pa la mkhas pa/ sgra tsam ki khyod gcig la 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang tshe dang mngon par 'byung ba dang /
314b2(mdo): dka' ba spyod pa stond pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu stond pa/ phyogs
314b3(mdo): bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams skyil mo krung gcig gis rgyas par 'gyengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ zhing thams cad kyi rgyan zhing gcig tu kun tu stond pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ zhing gcig kyi rgyan bkod pa zhing thams
314b4(mdo): cad kurba ston pa dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ki khaMm thams cad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor de lagashegs pa gcig gi 'khor du ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs
314b5(mdo): pa gcig gi 'khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khro du stond pa/ chos thams cad mtha' dang dbus myed stond pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad mtha' yas pa'i mthar gyur pa/
314b6(mdo): mtha' dpung myed pa sgyu ma'i dra ba lta bur rab tu stond pa bskal pa mtha' yas mu myed par sems can thams cad tha dad pa myed par kun tu ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus rang gi lus su
314b7(mdo): byin kyis rlob pa'i mos pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi thams cad kyi sku gcig tu mos pa 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas gcig gi sku sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad kyi skur 'jug pa'i/ seMs
314b8(mdo): cad gzhan la kun tu ston da pa ya phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du rang gi lus kun tu sto nga pa la mkhas pa// dus gsum thams cad chos kyi sku gcig gis khyad par sems can la kun tu lho rang ba
314b9(mdo): lus gcig gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/ lus mtha' yas pa las ldang bar sems can la kun tu ston pa/ lus gcig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub la// sems can thams cad snyed
315a1(mdo): kyi lus kun tu stond pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus sems cad gcig gi lus su kun tu ston pa/ sems can gcig gi lus sems can thams cad kyi lus su kun tu ston da pa/ sems/
315a2(mdo): can gyi lus chos kyi skur kun tu stond pa/ chos kyi sku sems can kyi lus su ston dpa/ byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyi smodan lam/ rang gi smon lam du byin gyis rlob pa 'i la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
315a3(mdo): rnams las sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par kun tu ston pa/ yongs su sbyind pa'i sems can la 'dul ba ji lta bar
315a4(mdo): bzhin du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ston pa/ skal pa grangs myed pa thams cad du smon lam gyi rgyun myil gcod pa/ rnam par shes pa'i lus las bskyod nas// ye shes
315a5(mdo): kyi sku la 'jog par dbang byed par sems can gyi tshogs thamasacad la kun tu ston pa/ rang gi lus kyi rgyun bcad nas seMsacan kyi tshogs gzhan ki smon lam yongs su rdzogs par
315a6(mdo): byed par kun tu stond pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su sbyind par byed pa'i smon lam la 'jug pa/ 'jig rten gi khams gcig na bskal pa'i grangs thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun myi
315a7(mdo): gcod pa// mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par smon lam btab pa'i stobs kyis sgra tsam gi khyon cig ya/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gyengs pa'i 'jig rten gi khams brjod du byed pa kun tu ston pa
315a8(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams gcig tu lus du ma kun tu stond pa/ chos kyi tshig gcig brjod pas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa rgyas par 'gyengs pa'i/ chos kyi sprin chen po las byung ba'i bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i char 'bebs la/
315a9(mdo): rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i klog phyung zhingayang dag pa de kho na'i 'brug bsgrags pas sems can gyi khams thams can tshim par byed cing / smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed par kun tu stond pa
315b1(mdo): bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / ye shes la 'jug pa'i spyod yul pa/ sems bskyed pa gcig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams rab 'byam thams cad
315b2(mdo): 'gro ba'i skye ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi lus kun tu ston pa/ rang gi sems shes pa dang / gzhan gi sems shes pa chags pa myed pas sems can gcig dang / sems can thams cad
315b3(mdo): kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / g.yo ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcul skad cig gcig gis 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa// dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi grangs la chags
315b4(mdo): pa myed pa'i ye shes 'jug pa/ sems can gzhan gi rgyud la yang dag par thob par byed pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ sems kyi skad gcig sems kyi skad cig la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
315b5(mdo): rten gi khams rab 'byam thams cad du/ sems can thams cad la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa/ sems can gcig gi 'du shes kyis sems
315b6(mdo): can ma lus pa thams can kyi las kyi bya ba la mngon sum du 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ sems can gcig gi sgra skad gis sems can thams cad kyi skad la 'jug par ston pa'i
315b7(mdo): ye shes la mkhas pa/ sus gcig sa dmyigs la/ sems can thams cad kyi lus la dmyigs par kun tu ston dpa la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyis 'khor du 'jug pa la/
315b8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa ma kyi 'ag dkyis 'khor na chos ston pa kun tu 'dzin pa la mkhas bag phyag go// thams cad kyang gzungs thams cad thob pa/ shind tu rnam par nges pa'i spobs pas ston dacing
315b9(mdo): sems can kyi khams thams cad kyi dbang po 'dzind par 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ sems can gcig gi sems la dmyigs pas brjod du myed pa'i rgyud du byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing nga / sems can thos
316a1(mdo): cad kyi sems la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ skad gcig gis 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du go bar byed cing / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rim pa shes la/ sems can gzhan
316a2(mdo): gi rgyud la yang dag par thob par byed pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ sngon gi mtha'i mu'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems bsam gyis myi khyab pa rjes su dran pa la 'jug pas/ las dang bya ba dang /
316a3(mdo): 'bras bu rnam par sbyind pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon gsum du sems can la stond cing / sems can la shes par byed pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad brgya nad pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten gi
316a4(mdo): khams thams cad du kun nas 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / bdag gi spyod pa dang / smon lam yang dag par
316a5(mdo): bskyed cing / chos kyi snang ba rab tu gtong ba la mkhas pardul phra rab kyi rdul gcig la bskal pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams brjod du myed pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ rdul
316a6(mdo): phra rab kyi rdul gcig la'ajig rten gi khams thams cad kyi tshad tsam gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing kacig tu kun tu stond pa la mkhas pa/ mtsho chen po'i rgya mtsho'i chu'i phung po thams cad
316a7(mdo): spu'i khung bu gcig tu bcug ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshad tsam gi 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du 'gro yang / sems can rnams la gnod pa myed pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten gi khams brjod du byed pa
316a8(mdo): rang gi sus su/ 'jug cing / sems can gyi bya ba thams cad kun tu stond pa la mkhas pa/ khor yug dang khor yug chen po dang / rin po che gzhan grangs myed cing bsam kis myi khyab la/ mtshungs pa myed
316a9(mdo): cing gzhal du myed de/ tshad myed pa la brjod du myed nga med tsasartsa gcig tu bcug ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshad tsam gi 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du 'gro yang sems can rnams skrag par myil
316b1(mdo): 'gyur ba la mkhas pa/ bskal pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa/ bskal pa gcig tu byin kyis rlob cing / bskal pa gcig 'jig pa dang / chags pa'i bskal pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed par/
316b2(mdo): kun tu stond pa la mkhas pa/ 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la 'jig rten gi khams thams cad chus 'jig pa dang / mes 'jig pa dang / rlung gis 'jigs par kun tu stond pa la mkhas pa
316b3(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rkang pa'i mthe bos man nad kyang / sems can la gnod pa myed par mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad chos kyi sprin kyis thob pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
316b4(mdo): rten gi khams thams cad rnams la 'dus pa ji lta ba bzhin de du 'tshe ba dang bcas pa dang / gnod pa dang bcas pa dang / mu ke 'i mya ngan chen po byin gis rlob pa kun tu stond pa la mkhas pa/
316b5(mdo): sems can gzhan la rnam par 'tshe ba myed pa/ mngon parashes pa/ sangs rgyas myi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gi khams su sangs rgyas 'byung bar kun tu stond pa sha staka ste/ bzang
316b6(mdo): skyong las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya thams cad kyang phyir myi ldog pa sha stag go// yang de'i tshe yangs pa can ki grong khyer chen po nas/ li tsa byi gzhon nu dkon mchog
316b7(mdo): 'byung nas zhes bya ba ga yi tsa gyi gzhon nu nyi khri cig stong gis yongs su bskor da te mdun du bdar nas/ lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der song ste phyind pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
316b8(mdo): yang bge bos phyag 'tshal te ga ka yas phyogs logs su 'dug nas / thams cad kyang myig myi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod par gyur to// gA yi'i grong khyer chen po nas khyim 'das
316b9(mdo): sngon sangs can zhes bya ba/ dge bsnyen lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/ mdun du bdar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
317a1(mdo): rtses kyi 'dul par bcom ldan 'das la m+b+ha zhing phyogs kucig tu 'jug to// khyis bdag babang stobs khyim bdag la stong gis yongs su bkor ste/ btsun tu zadam nas/ bcom ldan
317a2(mdo): 'das ga la ba der song ste phyi nad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ thams cad kyang myig kyi 'dum par bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod par gyur
317a3(mdo): to// khyim bdag legs sbyin yang khyim bdag lnga stong gis yongs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song phyi nad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
317a4(mdo): ka cig tu 'dug nas/ myig myi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'dug ko// khyim bdag ded dpon bzang po yang g.yog mang po dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
317a5(mdo): song ste phyi nad nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom/ ldan 'das la myig myi 'dzums par lta zhing 'dug go//
317a6(mdo): tsam pa'i grong khyer chen po nas kyang tshong dpon gi bu la ka bzangs tshong dpon ki bu brgyad khri bzhi stong gis yongs su bskor da te mdun du bdar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der song ste phyin
317a7(mdo): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la myig myi 'dzums par lta zhing 'dug go// bram ze'i khye'u byis byin yang / bram ze'i
317a8(mdo): khye'u lnga brgyas yongs su bskor da te/ mdun du bdar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der song ste phyi nad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ thos
317a9(mdo): cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la myi 'dzums par lta zhing 'khod par gyur to// bram ze'i khye'u dga' ba'i zla ba yang g.yog bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der song ste phyind pa dang
317b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la myig myi 'jus par lta zhing 'dug go// lus 'phags mo'i bu yul ma ka ta'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang /
317b2(mdo): srog chags lnga stong gis yongs su bskor te/ mdun du bdar nas/ glang po'i dbang po nor skyong la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der song nas/ de bzhin du rung ba'i sa ci tsam pa de tsam du nor skyong sa zhon te/
317b3(mdo): khang bu rtseg mas song nas bzhon pa las babs te/ rkang kyis bya rgod phung po'i mil 'dzegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der phyind pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ srog chag+sa
317b4(mdo): snga stong dang / lhan cig tu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la myig myi 'dzums par lta zhing 'dug go// grong khyer chen po ba ra na se nas tshong dpon gi bu yul 'khor mang po
317b5(mdo): bzang po zhes bya ba yang tshong dpon gi bu lnga brgyas yongs su bskor da te/ mdun du bdar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der/ song ste phyind pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
317b6(mdo): phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la myig myi 'dzums par lta zhing 'dug go// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / myi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
317b7(mdo): skyong ba bzhi dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu zla ba dang / lha'i bu shi nad tu rnam par gnod sems dang / lha'i bu mtshams bzangs dang / sA'i bu gzhan yang bsam gyis kyi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa byed
317b8(mdo): gzhal du byed/ dpag tu myed/ tshad myed pa dag lga'i bu re re yang / g.yog lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig stong dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ lha'i bu re res kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshul
317b9(mdo): dang mthun pa'i mchod pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la myig myi 'dzums par lta zhing 'khod par gyurd to// yang de'i tshe na bcom
318a1(mdo): A ldan 'das kyi spu'i khung bu re re dang / dpe' byang bzang po re re dang / mtshan re re nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdus tha rab kyi rdul gyi 'od zer byung ngo // 'od zer dore res kyang phyogs bcu'i
318a2(mdo): phyogs re rer sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi/ 'jig rten gi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// 'jig rten gi khams re res nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
318a3(mdo): brgya stong grangs byed pa 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' re re yang rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po nang rgya dpag tshad bye ba brgya stong yod pa/ rin po che'i kha khyer kyis bskor ba'i nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po
318a4(mdo): che'i lnga ldis mdzes par byas pa rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba'i nang na kanas shing / lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab pas yongs su bskor nas
318a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ka kha ba der song ste byi nad nas/ lha'i me tog gi sprin dang / rin po che'i sprin dang / na bza'i sprin dang / tsan dan sbrul gi snying po dang / a ka ru dang / spos kyi sprin dang
318a6(mdo): lha'i rol mo dang pheg rdob pa dang / klu'i sprin 'jig rten ki khams kyi tshad tsam gtor nas/ phyogs kacig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la myika myi 'dzums par lta zhing 'khod par gyu rang to//
318a7(mdo): mang de'i tshe na stong gsum ki stong chen po 'jig rten gi khams 'di za na skra'i rtse mo'i chags kyi phyogs tsam yang / lga dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang /
318a8(mdo): lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / myi dang / myi ma yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya che ba rgya che ba dag kyis ma khyabs par gyur pa myed do// yang de'i tshe
318a9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bla kos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
318b1(mdo): ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
318b2(mdo): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' su yad to//
318b3(mdo): bzang skyong khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig/ ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstand pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsa lad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub seMs dang bzang skyong
318b4(mdo): kis 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das gnas / dang / spyod pa ji lta bu dang / tshul ji lta bu dang / khyad par ji lta bu dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu dang / brtson 'grus ji lta bu
318b5(mdo): dang / rab tu zhi ba ji lta bu dang / ye shes la mkhas pa ji lta budang / dran pa ji lta bu dang / rtogs pa ji lta bu dang / glo gros rdzi// lta bu dang / khrel mchis pa ji lta bu dang / mos pa ji lta bu dang
318b6(mdo): go cha 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyi nyams
318b7(mdo): pa lags/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa sa byung ba lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la brtson 'grus sbyangs pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab che ba lags/ ji ltar na ye shes
318b8(mdo): chen po la mkhas pa lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims rnam par dag pa lags/ ji ltar na thos pa'i chos rnaMs myi bsdud pas dran pa dang ldan pa lags/ ji ltar na dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bzhin du skye bas
318b9(mdo): sa dran pa lags/ ji ltar sems can gzhan la stsal bas sngon ki gnas la mkhas pa lags/ ji ltar na dbang po'i khyad par mkhas pas zo dang ldan pa lags/ ji ltar na mtshan dang ldan pa lags
319a1(mdo): ji ltar na sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang myi bral ba lags/ ji ltar na 'jig rten gi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
319a2(mdo): rnams mthong zhing 'jig rten gi khams mtha' yas mu ma mchis par/ de dag gi chos kyang thos la thams cad kyang kun tu 'dzin da/ kun chub par bgyid/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu stond pa lags/
319a3(mdo): ji ltar na myi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sred pas me lce lta bu lags/ ji ltar na chos dkar po thams cad khong du chud pas zla ba lta bu lags/ ji ltar na ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel pas nyi ma lta bu dang / ji
