319a4(mdo): ltar na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis 'phags pas ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po lta bu lags/ ji ltar na zab mo la bzod pa myi phyed pas rdo rje lta bu lags/ ji ltar na lhun po rtsegs pa dang
319a5(mdo): mtshungs shing 'dra bas myi 'jigs pa thob pa lags/ ji ltar/ na spobs pa thogs pa ma mchis pas dbyangs shi nad tu yongs su/ dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tshigs thams cad rab tu phye ba la
319a6(mdo): rnam par nges pa la mkhas pas mthong ba mang ba lags/ ji ltar na khro gnyer ma mchis pa la bzhin 'dzum zhing shi nad tu gsal ba lags ji ltar na 'jig rten gi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa lags
319a7(mdo): ji ltar na 'jig rten gi khams mtha' yas pa dbyangs kyis go bar bgyid/ ji ltar na 'jig rten gi khams mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa spu'i zhung bu gcig du bsal kyang / sems can rnams kyis bdag cag kar
319a8(mdo): du mchis pa yang ma 'tshal la bgyid pa de yang ma 'tshal/ ji ltar na sems can yongs su sbyind par bgyid pas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gi dkyil 'khor rnams na yang kun tu
319a9(mdo): gda' la gnas nas kyang mya g.yo'o// ji ltar na ska tsam gi khyon cig la dga' ldan gi gnas na gnas pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / mngal du 'jug pa dang / btsas pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dga'
319b1(mdo): ba spyod pa la sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por mchi ba dang / 'dud las rgyal ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu stond cing / bstan pa gnas par kun
319b2(mdo): tu bstand pa yang ston dang / ji ltar na sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rab tu 'tshal ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong
319b3(mdo): skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// bzang skyong legs so legs so// bzang skyong khyod 'di ltar skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir bzhugs shing 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang
319b4(mdo): myi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir 'di ltar khyod snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing / bzang skyong khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni bzang skyong khyod
319b5(mdo): legs so// bzang skyong de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol to//
319b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyand pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' su sad to// bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sangs rgyas kyis rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul
319b7(mdo): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yon tan gi khyad par 'di dag dang / gzhan rnams kyang 'thob bo// bzang skyong rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i chol
319b8(mdo): 'phrul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khyod du chud pa dang / mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang / phyi nad rtsi log gi mtshan nyid yang dag par 'joms pa dang/
319b9(mdo): bdag gi bags kyis yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / gzhan myi dmyigs pa dang / srog la rlom sems myed pa dang / 'khor ba la myi 'jug pa dang / dngos po yongs su shes pa dang / zhi gnas bsgom pa dang / lhag
320a1(mdo): mthong mngon gsum du byed pa dang / sems gnas pa dang / dran pa myi g.yeng ba dang / rtog pa dang / dpyod pa nye bar zhi ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs la yang dag par bstend pa dang / myi dge ba'i phyogs lel/
320a2(mdo): pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rab tu zhi ba dang / ma rig pa seld pa dang / rig pa la yang dag par ste nad pa dang / rgyu yongs su shes pa dang / lta ba yang dag par 'joms pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral
320a3(mdo): ba dang / ye ges 'byung ba dang / sred pa zad pa dang / gta mug rab tu zha ba dang / dka' ba'i 'dod chags spong ba dang / sangs rgyas la gcig tu nges pa dang / chos la nem nur myed pa dang / dge 'dun la rnam par myi rtog pa dang /
320a4(mdo): myi 'byed pa'i tshig dang / mthun par sdums byed pa dang / dben ba la gzhol ba dang / bka' blo bdel ba dang / mu cor myi smra ba dang / zang zing myed pa dang / kha na ma tho ba spong ba dang / sdig pa thams
320a5(mdo): cad myi byed pa dang bral ba mdun du byed pa dang / 'du ba myed pa dang / 'jig rten gi ya mtshan la mngon par dga' ba myed pa dang / 'khor/ ba la nges dmyigs su lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la phan
320a6(mdo): yod du lta ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam khas yongs su mya ngan lasa'adas pa'i dbyings 'dod pa dang / g.yo'i myed pa dang / kya su myed pa dang rgyu myed pa dang / tshul 'chos pa myed pa dang / kha gsag myed pa
320a7(mdo): dang / gzhog spongs myed pa dang / thob kyis 'jal ba myed pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur ba sti yongs su spong ba dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / shi nad tu bzod pa dang / le lo myed pa dang / sgrib pa spong ba dang / dge
320a8(mdo): za bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po skyon myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po las myi g.yo ba dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa dang pha rol tu phyin/
320a9(mdo): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas myi ngoms pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pas rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam
320b1(mdo): par bachen pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes la dbang sgyur ba dang / blo tha dad pa myed pa dang / bems po sam pa ma yin pa dang / gyi 'on/ gyi lkug pa dang / gzhan gi drings kyi 'jog pa dang / kun nas man/
320b2(mdo): sems kyi dngos po rnam par spong ba dang / skyes bu dam pa'i gnas pa thob pa dang / skyes bu ngan pa la myi lta ba dang / byis pa rnams rnam par spong ba dang / mkhas pa dang / 'grogs pa dang / dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang /
320b3(mdo): yeshes kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba rnams dang / gyi 'dre ba dang / dben pa la gnas pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa dang / chos thams
320b4(mdo): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni bzang skyong rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ste/ ting nge 'dzind 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems
320b5(mdo): dpa' ni chos thams cad la sgrib pa myed pa shes par 'thob bo// bzang skyong gzhan yang rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul/ ki ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad
320b6(mdo): mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / tshig thams cad la mtshams sbyar ba shes pa dang / khyim ki dngos po yongs su gtong ba dang / khams gsum la mngon par myi dga' ba dang / sems ma zhum
320b7(mdo): ba dang / chos thams cad la mngon par ma zhen pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind pa dang / chos byed pa dang / las kyi rnam par sbyind pa la yid ches pa dang / 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa nye bar zhi
320b8(mdo): ba dang / 'thab pa myed pa dang / 'gyed pa myed pa dang / bzod pa yang dag par 'dzind pa dang / rtogs pa yang dag par 'dzind pa dang / rtogs pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos nyid rab tu phye ba la mkhas pa
320b9(mdo): dngag chos gtan la dbab pa la mkhas pa dang / chos kyi tshig la mkhas pa dang / chos kyi tshig rab tu dbye' ba shes pa dang / sngon gi mtha' shes pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba shes pa dang
321a1(mdo): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 'khor gsum yongs su dag par shes pa dang / lus kyi gnas shes pa dang / sems kyi gnas shes pa dang / spyod lam srung ba shes pa dang / las rnam
321a2(mdo): par dag pa dang / sgrig pa las shi nad tu 'da' ba dang / phung po yongs su shes pa dang / khams mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / skye mched seld pa dang / sred pa spong ba dang / myi skye ba la bzod pa'i bya ba la 'jug
321a3(mdo): pa dang / rgyu stond pa dang / las dang 'bras bu chud myi gson pa dang / chos mthong ba dang / lam sgom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang phrad pa dang / shes rab rno ba dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang
321a4(mdo): sgra yongs su shes pa dang / mchog tu dka' ba thob pa dang / chos kyi dga' ba rjes su myong ba dang / drang ba dang / mnyen pa dang dang bde ba dang / 'khro gnyer myed pa dang / nges pa dang / 'grogs
321a5(mdo): na bde ba dang / tshig 'jam pa dang / ka song por smra ba dang / tshur goka legs par 'ongs so zhes smra ba dang / snyom las myedapa dang / bra ma la gus pa dang / bla ma la sri zhu che ba dang
321a6(mdo): skye ba la myi dka' ba dang / chos dkar pos myi ngoms pa dang / 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa dang / dgon pa'i gnas kyi gtong ba dang / sa rnam para'ajog pa dang / dran pa chud myi gzon pa dang / phung po la mkhas
321a7(mdo): pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon gsum du bya ba la 'jug pa dang / nyon mongs pa seld pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms
321a8(mdo): pa dang / khyad par du 'gro ba dang / bsgom pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang / ltung ba las 'byind pa la mkhas pa dang / kun nas bkres pa rnam par gnod pa dang / bka la nyal spong ba dang / srid pa las gi nad tu 'da' ba dang /
321a9(mdo): tshe rabs dran pa dang / las kyi rnam par sbyind pa la the tsom myed pa dang / yas la sems myed pa dang / skye ba yid myi rton pa dang / las mngon par su myi byed pa dang / nang gi skye mched yid la myi byed pa dang /
321b1(mdo): phyi'i skye mched rnams la kun tu gyi rgyu ba dang / bdag la myi bstod pa dang / gzhan la myi smod pa dang / myi dka' ba la ma zhen pa dang / so so'i skye bo la myi rton pa dang / tshul khrims kyi mthun pa dang / bsnyen par
321b2(mdo): dka' ba dang / gzi' brjid che ba dang / bdag shes pa dang / nyams pa myed pa dang / spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la gnas pa dang / gnod sems myed pa dang / tshig myi blang ba dang / gzhan la myi gnod pa dang /
321b3(mdo): mdza' bo rjes su bsrung ba dang / rnam par gyi 'tshe ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa dang / sems can la gnod pa myi byed pa dang / tshig 'jam pa dang / khams gsum pa la myi gnas pa dang / gsang ba'i tshig rnams
321b4(mdo): bsrung ba dang / chos thams cad la stong pa nyid dang / mthun par bzod pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes la gind tu 'dun pa dang / ye shes gsal ba dang / tshul khrims brtan pa dang / snyos
321b5(mdo): par 'jug pa la 'jug pa dang / gcig pur dga' ba dang / cung zad shes pas chog par myi 'dzind pa dang / sems zhumade/ ba myed pa dang / lta bar gyur pa rnam par spong ba dang / gzungs
321b6(mdo): thob pa dang / ye shes thob pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yinab la nan tan byed pa dang / gtan tshigs dang / rigs pa dang tshul gi skor gyur pa dang / 'dems pa dang / rjes su stond
321b7(mdo): pa dang / spyod pa dang mthun par bzod pa dang / bzod pa'i sa dang ldan pa dang / myi bzod pa myed pa dang ldan pa dang / gyi zhes pa spong ba dang / ye shes la gnas pa dang / rnam 'byor de spyod pa'i sa dang / byang chub ses
321b8(mdo): raba'i spyod yul dang ga chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid khong du chud cing rab tu rtogs par shes pa dang / sems nges par sems pa dang / skye bar nying mtshams kyi sbyor ba dang / nying mtshams myi sbyor bar shes pa dang /
321b9(mdo): khur bor ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / 'dod chags spong ba dang / zhe sdang bral ba dang / gti mug spong ba dang / rnal 'byor de la brtson pa dang / myi rigs pa dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i chos
322a1(mdo): la 'dun pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la nan tan byed pa dang / mtshan gyi nyal ba dang / spong ba kyi gtong ba dang / chos dkar po rnams kun tu srung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon tu 'gro ba dang / thabs/
322a2(mdo): la mkhas pa shes pa dang / mtshan ma spong ba dang / 'du shes las ldog pa dang / mdo sde mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang / bden pa la rnam par nges pa dang / rnam par grol ba la mngon gsum du bya/
322a3(mdo): pa la 'jug pa dang / ka cig tu nges pa dang / gtsigs par smra ba dang / ye shes ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba dang / thos pa yongs su tshol ba dang / ye shes kyis myi ngoms pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / lus yongs su
322a4(mdo): dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / dogs pa myed pa'i da tshig dang / stong pa nyid la kun tu bste nad pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa la bstend pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis
322a5(mdo): myi dmyigs par shes pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob pa dang / sdug bsngal rnams la myi brnyas pa dang / de dag la nor sbyin ba dang / dbul po rnams la khyad du myi gsod pa dang // tshul
322a6(mdo): khrims 'chal ba rnams la snying rtse zhing snying rje ba'i blo dang ldan pa dang / phan pa'i dngos po dang ldan pa dang / chos kyis phan 'dogs pa dang zang zing yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la
322a7(mdo): g.yo' byed par bstend pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam khas 'gron du gnyer ba dang / ji skad smras pa bzhin du byed pa dang / phyir zhing brtson pa dang / bsti bstang byas
322a8(mdo): pas dka' ba myong ba dang / dpe' shes pa dang sngon 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / mying dang brdar btags pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / btags pa kun tu 'jom pa dang / bkur bsti byed pa la mngon par dka' ba myed
322a9(mdo): ba dang / bkur bsti myi byed pa la btang snyoms su byed pa dang / rnyed pa don tu myi gnyer ba dang / ma rnyed pas gro shi bar myi 'gyur ba dang / grags pa la mngon par 'dod pa myed pa dang / ma grags pa la khong khro ba myed
322b1(mdo): bsngags pa la rjes su chags pa myed pa dang / smad pas pa gong bar gyi 'gyur ba dang / bde ba la mngon par gyi chags pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis kyi kyo ba dang / 'du byed kun tu gyi 'dzind pa dang / yang dag gi/
322b2(mdo): bsngags pa la myi chags pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i brjod pa dang du lend pa dang / spyod yul ma yin pa rnam par spong ba dang / spyod yul la 'jug pa dang / cho ga yun sum tshogs pa dang / kyi tshul ba rnam par
322b3(mdo): spong ba dang / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la myi spod pa dang / bstan pa kun tu bsrung ba dang / smra ba nyung ba dang / gnyen pa dang / skabs kyi tshig la mkhas pa dang / phyir rgol ba tshar gcod pa dang / dus su la
322b4(mdo): 'gro ba dang / spyod lam brtags pa ma yin pa dang / spyod lam mdzes pa dang / don dang don ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / 'jig rten shes pa dang / bstan chos shes pa dang / gsal bar
322b5(mdo): sba ba dang / lag rkyong ba dang / sems shin tu 'dzind pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / myi dge ba'i sems la smod pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi gtong ba dang / spyod
322b6(mdo): pa yang dag par 'dzind pa dang / mdzes par kun tu rgyu ba dang / bla ma la ldang ba dang / bstan bting ba dang / nga rgyal tshar gcod pa dang / sems yang dag par 'dzind pa dang / don rab tu rtogs
322b7(mdo): par shes pa dang / ye shes skyed pa dang / myi shes pa dang / bral ba dang / sems la 'jug pa shes pa dang / sems kyi ngo bo nyid khong du chud cing shes pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / myi bsgrub pa bsgrub pa la mkhas pa'i ye shes
322b8(mdo): dang ldan pa' dang / sems can thams cad kyi skad shes pa dang / nges pa'i tshig rnam par bzhag pa zhes pa dang / don rnam par nges pa shes pa dang / don ma yin pa rnam par spong ba dang / bsam gtan rnams bsgrub pa dang / de
322b9(mdo): dag gi ro myang bar gyi byed pa dang / sems cadan thams cad kyi sems la rna par lta zhing po sor rtog pa dang / sems can gi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa zhes pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa sa rnam par!
323a1(mdo): pra dang / las thams cad rnam par 'byed pa dang / las dang rnam par smin pa myed pa 'jug pa zhes pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs la 'jug pa dang / brjed ngas pa myed pa dang / khams sna tshogs dang /
323a2(mdo): khams du ma mngon sum du gyur pa dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu mthong ba dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la rnam par rtsen pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad gcig pa dang / mying /
323a3(mdo): myed pa dang / sngon gi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes pas blta ba dang / zag pa zad pa dang / spong ba dus gcig thob pa shes pa dang / lha'i khyig thogs pa myed pas blta ba dang / gzugs
323a4(mdo): thams cad kun tu stond pas rnam par rtsen pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa zhes pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag kyi tshul kyi gzungs la 'jug pa shes pa dang
323a5(mdo): skad thams cad brag cha'i skad dang / mtshungs pa nyid du shes pa dang / ci rigs par chos stond pa dang / sems can thams cad ya legs par bshad pas tshim par byed pa dang / dbang po rje ba
323a6(mdo): shes pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin par rnam par lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang / 'bras bu yod pa'i chos stond pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad yongs
323a7(mdo): su rdzogs pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su 'dzind pa dang / tshar bcad pa mkhas par shes pa dang / brtags pa ma yin pa'i spyod lam dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa myed par yang dag par 'du
323a8(mdo): pa la 'jug bges pa dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa dang / skad gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du lus stond pa dang /
323a9(mdo): 'jig rten ki khams thams cad du myig yor lta bu'i lus rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos bstand pa kun tu 'dzind cing brjed pa myed pa dang / theg pa chen po las myi nyams pa dang /
323b1(mdo): theg pa thams cad kyis nges par 'byung ba bstand pa la mkhas pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gi rigs yang dag par 'dzind pa dang / skye bo'i gnas thams cad du bya ba ci rigs par kun tu bstand pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i
323b2(mdo): bskald pa bye bar go cha gyon kyang yongs su myi skyo ba dang / sems can yongs su sbyind par byed pa mkhas par shes pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa she ba dang bskal pa gcig bskal pa grangs
323b3(mdo): myed pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos thams cad las mngon par 'byung ba'i gnas shes pa dang / zhing thams cad yang dag par 'du ba la 'dug pa shes pa dang / bskal pa grangs myed pa bskal pa gcig la 'jug pa zhes
323b4(mdo): ba dang / zhing gcig zhing thams cad du ston da pa shes pa dang / sems can gcig gi sus la sems can thams cad kyi lus yang dag par 'du ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang / skra tsam gi khyod cig
323b5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'jug pa shes pa dngarang gi lus kyi spu'i khung bu'i phyogs gcig tu 'jig rten gi khaMs tshad myed bsam kyis myi khyab/ gzhal du myed pa 'jug pa shes
323b6(mdo): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid du khong du chud cing shes pa dang / rang gi lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad rgyas pa dkang ba shes pa dang / chos
323b7(mdo): thams cad mtshan nyid myed pa rtog sa gre pa la mkhas par shes pa dang / lus thams cad la lus 'jug pa shes pa dang / skad gcig brjod pas skad thams cad nges par sgrogs pa shes pa dang / thabs mkhas pa thams
323b8(mdo): cad kyi tshul rtogs par shes pa dang / tshig gcig las rtsams te/ bskal pa bye ba grangs myed bsam gyis myi khyab gzhal du myed par stond pa shes pa dang / spobs pa rgyun myi 'chad pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / myi bsgrub
323b9(mdo): ba shes pa la rnam par dpyod pa dang / phrugs dang cha dang sbrel gzhi'i 'byed pa bstand pa shes pa dang / thabs dang shes rab chen po'i 'od zer rab tu gtong ba shes pa dang / bdud kyi lam thams cad las shind tu 'da'
324a1(mdo): bshes pa dang / lus dang dag dang / yid kyi las kyi sngon du ye shes 'gro ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis sems can gi khams thams cad tshim par byed cing / bsod nas
324a2(mdo): mngon par 'du byed pas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu stond pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi brjod pa khong du chud pa dang / phyogs
324a3(mdo): bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i chos bsgrub pa la the tsom myed pa dang / yo byad la dbang ba thob pa dang / skye ba thams cad la
324a4(mdo): dbang ba thob pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa mtshungs par sbyin pa'i gnasasu sems pa shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
324a5(mdo): chos dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / phyogasaban+du'i 'jig rten ki khams thams cad spu'i khung bu kacig ki 'od zer gi dra bas khebs par byed pa dang / byang chub sems
324a6(mdo): dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba thob pa dang / 'tsho chen po rgya mtsho 'i gting tshad yas pa shes pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du 'od chen po'i dra ba rab tu gtor ba shes pa
324a7(mdo): dang / sems pa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / mnyam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / tshig dang nges pa'i tshig bsta nad pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bsko rad pa dang / ma bstan/
324a8(mdo): bar rang gis bzod pa thob pa zhes pa dang / spu'i khung bu gcig nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du rgya mtsho'i chu'i phung po rab tu 'thor ba shes shing / sems can la chus gnod pa yang myed pa dang /
324a9(mdo): sems rin po che lta bu dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad sel pa shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams tshad myed pa bsdogs pa dus gsum du yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i cho ga shes par/
324b1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas dbugs 'byind pa thob pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa sprul pa'i byin kyis brlabs shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul
324b2(mdo): thams cad la 'jug pa shes pa dang / rang gi smon lam rgyun myi gcod cing / sems can nye bar 'dzind pa'i spyod pa byin kyis brlab pa kun tu stond pa shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rnam par lta ba mngon
324b3(mdo): sum du shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la 'jug pa zhes pa dang / sems zhi zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la dka' ba dang / rtse ba dang / longs
324b4(mdo): spyod thams cad kun tu bstand pa shes pa dang / thos pa tshad myedapa 'dzind pa yang dag par rdzogs pa dang / thos pa thams cad kyis myi ngoms shing myi chog la rgyun myi chod pa dang / chos thams
324b5(mdo): cad myi dmyigs pa dang / 'jig rten ki bya ba dang / tshul sna tshogs la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gi chos thams cad kyis myi gos pa dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can yongs su smyin par
324b6(mdo): byed pa dang / lkug pa rna myi gsang ba grum po// blun pa 'on pa/ yong ba thams cad la spyod lam kun tu stond pa dang / bskal pa grangs myed pa se gol gtogs pa srid du byin kyis rlob cing chos stond pa
324b7(mdo): shes pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba zil kyis gnan pa'i phyir/ laka na rdo rjes brgya stong grangs myed bsam gyis myi khyab/ gzhal du myed dpag tu byed tshad byed pa phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang /
324b8(mdo): sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ dbul po dang / sdug 'phongs pa byin kyis rlob pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub rang 'byung gi ye shes la blta ba mngon gsum du shes pa dang / nyan thos dang /
324b9(mdo): rab sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod lam kun tu stond pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi thams thams cad du phyir myi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byin kyis rlob pa shes pa dang / sems can thams cad
325a1(mdo): yongs su sbyin pas b+hA ba'i byis/ 'jig rten gi khams grangs med ci 'bras kyis kyi mas/ batshungs pa myed cing gnas chu byed de chud myed pa'i dus sku rab kyi mus byed kyi/ bzlas pakye
325a2(mdo): khrag khrig brgya stong dag/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la bstand pa thogs pa myed pa shes pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang / spyod lam bskal bar kun tu stond pa dang
325a3(mdo): sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rgyun gyi gcod pa dang / bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan byed pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyind par bya
325a4(mdo): ba'i phyir/ 'khor lha'i bu mo kru lend cing rol mo'i dbyangs s+tha dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / be ka rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs lend pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag dang / 'jig
325a5(mdo): rten gi khams rab 'byam thams cad du/ de bzhin gshegs/ pa thams cad kyi 'khor ki dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba shes pa dang / gnas kang nas kyang g.yo myed pa la/ de bzhin gshegs
325a6(mdo): pa thams cad la blta zhing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / mchod pa 'i las rgyun myi gcad pa yang shes pa dang / sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir mthong ba dang / thos pa
325a7(mdo): don yod pa 'dod cing gnas pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyin pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gdul ba'i phyir/ sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dka' ldan ka gnas na gnas pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang
325a8(mdo): skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa kun tu stond pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba kun tu stond pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor
325a9(mdo): lo rab tu bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chen po kun tu ston pa nas/ ji tsam du dam pa'i chos gnas pa dang / nub pa'i bar phyogs bcu thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnyed dag kun
325b1(mdo): tu ston pa yang shes la/ gind tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgyab ste/ bzang myong 'di ni rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i mo 'phrul gi ting nge 'dzind ces bya'o//
325b2(mdo): bam po / bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di yongs su sbyang ba byas pa kang zhe na/ bzang spyod chos gang yang
325b3(mdo): kun tu myi 'dzind pa/ myi 'dor ba/ myi 'jog pa/ 'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi ba/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa/ chos thams cad la
325b4(mdo): myi rtog pa rnam par myi rtog pa dang / rnam par myi bsgrub pa kun nas myi slong ba myi skyed pa// rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang kun tu rtog pa yang dag par gcod pa/ rung ba dang / khas dang /
325b5(mdo): skye mched kyi rang bzhin shes pa dang / dran pa dang / bla gras/ dang / ma su pa dang / rtags pa dang / pa gas pa dang / sems kyi dmyigs pa yid la myi byed pa/ rnam par shes pa
325b6(mdo): yang dag par gcod pa 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yang dag par gcod pa/ mutha' dang mtha' myed pa yid la myi byed yid la byed pa yang dag par gcod pa// phung po dang / khas
325b7(mdo): dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin zhes pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / mos pa dang / rdzogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / spyod pa dang / cho ga dang / spyod yul la nan tan byed cing gnas pa/ nyon mongs pa myed/
325b8(mdo): ba'i sa dang ldan zag zhi ba'i sa dang ldan pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam thams cad dang / yon tan
325b9(mdo): thams can yongs su 'grul pa 'di ni/ bzang skyong ti nge 'dzin pa 'di'i grongs suM spa sa bya ba mo// bzang myong byang chub sems dpa' ni chos la sems shing chos spyon pa yin te/ des ni de bzhin gnas
326a1(mdo): pa chos kyi skur yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong na/ chos kyi sku las gzhan dmyigs pa lta ci smos/ bzang skyong 'di la byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar so sor brtag par bya ste/ de
326a2(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyi tshig 'di ji lta bu ji gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa yin nam/ 'on te gzugs las gzhan zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yin snyam du/ de ltar dpyod pa la
326a3(mdo): mkhas par bya'o// de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ gzugs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin la/ gzugs las gzhan pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni bems po'o// g.yol ba
326a4(mdo): myed pa/ spyod pa myed pa/ rtswa dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / bong pa dang / myig yor lta bur ngan pa/ dbu ba rdos pa lta bu yin zhing / 'byung ba chen po bzhi phan tshun nas bsdus pa ni
326a5(mdo): gzugs zhes bya'o// gzugs ni rtend cing 'brel par 'gyu/ nga ba'o// gang rtend cing 'breld par 'byung ba de ni myi rtag pa'o// kang myi rtag pa de ni sdug bsngal ba'o// gang sdug bsngal
326a6(mdo): ba de bdag myed pa'o// gang bdag myed pa de rang bzhin myed pa'o// gang rang bzhin myed pa de snang ba myed pa'o// gang snang ba myed pa de yang dag pa ma yin pa'o// gang yang dag pa ma yin pa
326a7(mdo): de brtun ba slu ba'i chos so// gang brdzun pa slu ba'i chos de myi bden pa'o// kar myi bden pa de bzhin nyid ma yin pa'o// gang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin pa'o// de bzhin
326a8(mdo): gshegs pa ni bden pa yang dag pa de bzhin nyid/ ma nor pa de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid// ma log pa/ bden pa smra ba/ yang dag par smra ba/ shes pa smra ba/ ye shes kyi mtshon
326a9(mdo): cha can/ ye shes mthal yas pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ stobs bcu dang ldan pa/ gyi 'jigs pa bzhi dam pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa thob pa// myi rtog pa
326b1(mdo): rnam par gyi rtog pa/ gyi gos pa nam mkhal dang mtshungs pa/ grangs kyi chos rnams kyis myi 'grangs pa// ma byas pa ma skyes la/ ma 'gags pa/ 'jug pa myed pa mthal yas pa/ gnas myed pa// rnam par/
326b2(mdo): myi rig pa/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ kun tu rgyu ba myed pa// shind tu dag pa/ nyon mongs pa myed pa// ma byung ba/ spyod pa myed pa// gnas myed pa'o snyam mo// de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ gzugs
326b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin nam// gzugs las gzhan pa yang ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te gzugs las gzhan pa zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yin na ni// nam mkha' yang de bzhin gshegs
326b4(mdo): par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' ni gzugs myed/ pa// bstan tu byed pa/ thogs pa myed pa// rnam par myi rig pa/ gan pa myed pa/ gzung du myed pa// gnas myed pa/ mtshan
326b5(mdo): nyid myed pa'o snyam mo// de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ ka late gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/ gzug las gzhan/ ba yang ma yin na/ ci tshor ba de bzhin gshegs par
326b6(mdo): 'gyur ram/ 'on te tshor la las gzhan pa zhig snyam mo// de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ tshor ba de bzhin gshegs pa ma yon/ tshor ba las gzhan pa yang ma yin pa'o// de
326b7(mdo): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni kar ci tshor yang rung / de thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o// kang sdug bsngal ba de rtog pa'i mtshan nyid do// rtog pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de/ de bzhin
326b8(mdo): gshegs pa ma yin te/ tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o ngan pa'o// rten cing 'brel da par 'byung ba'o// reg pa 'dus pa las byung ba'o// reg pa las skyes pa ni tshor ba'o zhes gsungs na// de bzhin gshes
326b9(mdo): pa ni chu bur lta bu ma yin/ ngan pa ma yin/ rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni reg pa las skyes pa ma yin/ reg pa 'dus pa las byung ba ma yin// tshor ba ji lta ba
327a1(mdo): bzhin du reg pa sas skyes pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhed/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshor tha mams cad 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la skyoms par zhugs pa nye/ tshor ba dang rnas pa/ tshor ba mas/
327a2(mdo): cad kyi mchog brnyes pa dang / gdung ba thams cad shi nad tu sbyangs pa/ nyon mongs pa dang / gtse ba dang / gnod pa thams cad spangs pa/ ma bcings pa ma grol ba/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa/ mya ngan las
327a3(mdo): 'das pa'i dbyings rnyog pa myed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma skyes pa// rnam par myi rtog pa myi mthong ba/ myi thos pa bsdam du byed pa/ myang du myed pa/ reg par byar myed pa// mtshan ma myed pa/ rnam par
327a4(mdo): myi rig pa ga rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o snyam mo// des de ltar so sor brtags na de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin// tshor ba las gzhan pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe nag gal
327a5(mdo): te tshor ba las gzhan zhig de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur na ni rtswa dang / shing kyil ba dang / sman dang khri shi dang / nags/ tshal thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de
327a6(mdo): ci'i phyir zhe na/ nA dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / khri shi 'dzings pa dang / nags tshal thams cad ni tshor ba myed pa'o snyam mo de 'di ltar mo sor rtog ste/ kas te tshor ba de bzhin gshegs
327a7(mdo): pa ma yin te/ tshor ba las gzhan pa yang ma yin na/ ci 'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ 'on te 'du shes las gzhan pa zhig kam snyam mo// de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ 'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa/
327a8(mdo): ma yin/ 'du shes las gzhan pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes ni smyig rgyu lta bu/ myig dang gzugs dang / snang ba dang / yid la byed pa 'dus pa las nges par 'byung ba'o// de bzhin gshes/
327a9(mdo): pa ni 'du shes ma yin te gyin tu ldan men gyis dang gzugs dang / snang ba dang / yid la byed pa las nges par 'byung ba ma yin/ 'du shes ci lta ba bzhin du myig dang / gzugs dang / snang ba dang / yid la byed pa 'dus pa
327b1(mdo): pas byung ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsas gis kyi khyab pa/ bsam pas bya ba ma yin pa/ sems pa myed pa/ sems dang bral ba/ sems mtshungs pa byed pa/ 'gro ba 'dun
327b2(mdo): bamyed pa/ 'ong bar 'dug pa myed pa/ 'gro ba myed pa/ 'gro ba yang dag par gcod pa/ pags pa ma yin pa/ bcan du myed la/ zug myed la/ rdzas ma yin pa/ mdad pa ma yin pa// dbyer byed pag yang dag pa
327b3(mdo): rlom pa myed pa/ bzhugs pa myed pa/ reg par byar myed pa'o snyam mo// de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ 'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/ 'du shes las gzhan pa ma yin no// gal te 'du shes las gzhan pa
327b4(mdo): zhika de bzhin gshegs par gyur na ni/ shing dang bong ba thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shing dang bong pa thams cad ni 'du shes myed pa'o snyam mo// de 'di ltar/
327b5(mdo): so sor rtog ste / gal te 'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin 'du shes las gzhan pa yang ma yin na// ci 'du byed rnams de / bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ 'on te 'du byed rnams las gzhan
327b6(mdo): ba zhig gam snyam mo// de 'di ltar so sor rtog steg/ 'du byed rnams de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/ 'du byed rnams las gzhan pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed rnams ni
327b7(mdo): dngos po myed pa brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can/ ma rig pa 'dus pa las byung ba'o// 'du byed rnams ni ma rig pa 'dus pa las skyes pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa ni dngos po myed pa ma yin/
327b8(mdo): brdzun pa ma yin/ slu ba'i chos ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ji lta ba bzhin du ma rig pa 'dus pa las skyes pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma rig pa 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin /
327b9(mdo): la snyoms par zhugs pa ste/ gzugs na spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang / gyi g.yo' ba'i ting nge 'dzin las shi nad tu 'das nas/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i nye bar bsgrubs
328a1(mdo): te gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhi ba'o// myi snang ba'o// bltar myi mthong ba'o// mtha' yas pa'o// sprin dang mtshungs pa'o// rab tu zhi ba'o// rab tu zhi ba'am yin pa'o// zhi ba dang bral ba'o//
328a2(mdo): zhi ba myed pa'o// dka' ba myed pa'o// nyon mongs pa myed pa'o// lend pa myed pa'o// byams pa myed pa'o// 'khor byed myed pa'o// 'khor byed dang bral ba'o// myi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o// mdud pa myed pa'o/
328a3(mdo): 'chi 'pho myed pa'o// 'chi 'pho bar myi 'gyur ba'o// chos ma yin pa'o// chos ma yin pa yang ma yin pa'o// zhing ma yin pa'o// zhing ma yin pa yang ma yin pa'o// myi zad pa'o// myi zad pa yang ma yin pa'o//
328a4(mdo): zad pa dang bral ba'o// skad cig pa'o// myi 'khrugs pa'o snyam mo de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ 'du byed rnams de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/ 'du byed rnams las gzhan pa yang ma yin no//
328a5(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te 'du byed rnams las gzhan pa zhig de bzhin gshegs par gyur da na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dngos// po myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na// dngos po myed
328a6(mdo): pa ni 'du byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ gal te 'du byed rnams de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/ 'du byed rnaMs las gzhan pa yang ma yin na/ ci rnam par shes pa de bzhin
328a7(mdo): gshegs par 'gyur rab 'on te rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa zhig kam snyam mo// de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ rnam par shes pa de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa yang ma yin no//
328a8(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na pa rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ga gsob ka sog yang dag pa ma yin pa/ 'du byed 'dus pa las skyes pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin la byed pa 'dus pa las byung ba ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs
328a9(mdo): pa ni gso ba ma yini/ gsog ma yin/ yang dag pa ma yin pa ma yin// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa// 'dus pa las nges par skyes pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshul bzhin yin
328b1(mdo): ba yid la byed pa 'dus pa las byung ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ yi ge myed pa// sgra myed pa/ yul myed pa/ dngos po
328b2(mdo): myed pa// sems myed pa// ldan pa ma yin pa/ myi ldan pa ma yin pa/ blo gros myed pa/ blo gros myed pa yang ma yin pa/ rtogs pa myed pa/ rtogs pa myed pa yang ma yin pa/ 'gro ba myed pa/ 'gro ba myed/
328b3(mdo): pa yang ma yin pa/ gnyis su myed pa/ gnyis lta bur bya ba ma yin pa/ myi 'da' ba/ mtshan nyid myed pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba/ mtshan nyid ma yin pa/ ma spros pa/ sgo ma yin pa/ chags pa myed pa/
328b4(mdo): chags pa dang bral ba// mthun par byed pa/ de bzhin nyid kyis rab tu phye ba/ de kho na nyid ma yin pa/ de kho na nyid ma yin payang ma yin pa'o snyam mo// de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/
328b5(mdo): rnam par shes pa de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin// rnam par shes// pa las gzhan pa yang ma yin no// gal te rnam par shes// pa las gzhan pa zhig de bzhin gshegs par myur dA na ni
328b6(mdo): myig yor yang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig yor ni rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das
328b7(mdo): ba las kyi dbyigs ma 'ongs pa las ma yin/ da ltar byung ba las myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pas myi rtog ko/ rnam par myi rtog go/ gyi tog na so sor gyi gnas so// po sor myi gnas na
328b8(mdo): 'phro bar myi byed do// myi 'phro na zhum par myi 'gyur ro// zhum pa myed na yongs su gdung ba byed do// yongs su gdung ba myed na kun tu gdung ba myed do/ kun tu gdung ba myed na rjes su gdung ba myed do//
328b9(mdo): kang rjes su gdung ba myed pa de myi gdung ba'o// kang myi gdung ba de kun tu gyi rgyug go// rnam par gyi chug pa de rnam par myi rgyug ko/ gang rnam par myi rgyug pa de myi nyams so// kang myi nyams pa de rnam par
329a1(mdo): myi 'khyam mo// kang rnam par myi 'khyam pa de 'khyam pa myed pa'o// kang 'khyam pa myed pa de 'khyam pa ma yin no// ka 'khyam pa ma yin pa de rlom sems myed pa'o// kang rlom sems/
329a2(mdo): myed pa de bag yod pa'o// gang bag yod pa de 'phags pa'o// gang 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'o// dgra bcom pa gang yin pa de la bdag gi rdul myed do// sems can gi rdul myed do// srog ki rdul myed do// kar
329a3(mdo): zag gi rdul myed do// phung po'i rdul myed do// khams kyi rdul myed do// skye mched kyi rdul myed do// dngos po'i rdul myed pa'o// rgyu'i rdul myed do// rkyen kyi rdul myed do// dmyigs pa'i rdul byed do// kun tu 'byung/
329a4(mdo): ba'i rdul myed do// nga rgyal kyis lhag par byed pa'i rdul myed do// tshor ba'i rdul myed do// 'dod chags kyi rdul myed do// zhe sdang ki rdul myed do// gti mug gi rdul byed do// khro bo'i rdul myed do/
329a5(mdo): 'khon du 'dzind pa'i rdul myed do// nga rgyas kyi rdul myed do// pa/ rgyal kyi chab pa dang / yongs su gdung ba'i rdul myed do// nga rgyal/ dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal gi rdul myed do// sems cad dmyal
329a6(mdo): ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas kyi rdul myed do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi rdul myed do// 'dod pa'i khams kyi rdul myed do// gzugs kyi khams kyi rdul myed do// gzugs myed bI Shas kyi rdul byed /
329a7(mdo): 'khor ba'i rdul byed do// rnam pa de lta bur rdul gyi dmyigs te/ gang 'dod chags dang bral zhing rdul byed pa de dag 'phags pa zhes bya/ dgra bcom pa zhes bya/ grol ba zhes bya/ rnam par grol ba zhes bya/
329a8(mdo): lha'i dam pa zhes bya / rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/ de chos gang la yang rlom sems byed/ rlom sems myed na kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur ro// kun nas nyon
329a9(mdo): mongs pa myed na kun tu gdung ba myed do// kun tu gdung ba myed na rang bzhin thob par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin thob na chos gang yang myi spyod do// myi spyod na ji ltar ci gzugs byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
329b1(mdo): rgya'am/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ su zhig byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ ci phung po lnga chos ston tam
329b2(mdo): phung po lnga ni yang dag pa ma yin pa/ sgyu ma lta bu/ gsog gsob/ dngos po myed pa// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa/ 'dus pa las byung ba'o// chos kyi dbyings gsob ma yin/ gsog ma yin//
329b3(mdo): yang dag pa ma yin pa ma yin/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa las byung ba ma yin/ sgyu ma lta bu ma yin// smyig rgyu lta bu ma yin/ chu zla lta bu ma yin/ brag ma lta bu ma yin na su zhig chos 'di ston/ de ci'i phyir/
329b4(mdo): zhe na/ bzang skyong chos kyi dbyings ni dag pa/ bden pa/ yang dag pa/ gzhan ma yin pa/ de bzhin nyid/ ma nor pa de bzhin nyi/ yin na de ston pa su yin/ phung po lnga rnams ni myi rtag pa
329b5(mdo): sdug bsngal ba/ stong pa/ bdag myed pa/ rtend cing 'bre lad par 'byung ba/ ngan pa/ 'jig pa'i chos can no// byang chub ni ji lta ba bzhin te/ spros pa myed pa/ gzung du
329b6(mdo): myed pa/ sgra myed pa/ myi snang ba/ bltar myed pa/ mtshan ma myed pa mtha' yas pa// nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ mnyam ba myed pa/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ sems dang yid dang
329b7(mdo): rnam par shes pa dang bral ba sgra skad thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yul na myi gnas pa/ phyogs na myi gnas pa/ brtag tu myed pa bstan tu myed pa/ zhi ba zhi ba dang bral ba/ bsil bar gyur pa/ kun gzhi myed
329b8(mdo): pa gnas myed pa/ 'dus ma byas pa// myi skye ba myi 'gog pa/ myi gnyis pa la gnas pa/ de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid myi 'gyur ba/ de bzhin nyid ma 'ongs pa de bzhin nyid/ 'gro ba myed pa de
329b9(mdo): bzhin nyid/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa'o// bzang skyong de bzhin nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ rnam par dag pa ma yin no// de bzhin nyid ni 'khor ba
330a1(mdo): na/ shin nyid ni sa nan na na// de bzhin nyid ni mams ldan 'bye sa yin mchog pa yin no// de bzhin nyid ces
330a2(mdo): chos kyi dbyings teg chos kyi dbyings ni bdag dang chos kyi ngo bo nyid ni gnas pa yin/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyi gnas pa yin chos thams cad kyi gnas ma yin te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi gnas doran dam pa stong pa nyid kyi
330a3(mdo): gnas ka chen po stong pa nyid kyi gnas/ mchog gi stong pa nyid kyi gnas shin tu gnas pa'i gnas so// chos kyi dbyings ni myi g.yo ba myi gnas pa gnas myed pa/ rang bzhin myed pa rgyu ba myed pa blang ba myed pa ror pa
330a4(mdo): myed gzhas lend pa myed pa 'dzind pa myed pa'o// gang chos 'di shes shing shes pa la yang rlom sems myed pa de ni chos kyi/ dbyings shes bya'o// chos kyi dbyings ni sangs rgyas te sangs rgyas

330a6(mdo): lhar so sor rtog ste kaspros pa dang bcas pa'i phung po lnga ji ltar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya snyam nas/ de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ ci gzugs byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on te

330b1(mdo): chos can ma rig pa 'dus pa las byung ba nye/ de dag kyang byang chub mdon par rdzogs par 'ad kyin no// rnam par shes bya ni lham bu gso na gsog/ sang dag pa sa yin pa/ 'du byed 'dus pa las sa pas skyes

331a1(mdo): myi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba bsdus nas byang chub kyi snying po la myi 'dug la/ sangs rgyas nyid bzung nas kyang myi ldang ste/ de rgyu gzhan dang gzhan la'

331a3(mdo): pa zhig gam sa 'on te tshor ba dang ga 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pas sam/ gzugs ni bems po/ g.yo ba myed pa/ sems pa myed pa ste/ des kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bstsags pa/ tshor ba ni chu bur lta bu
331a4(mdo): ngan pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba reg pa 'dus pa las 'byungab ste/ des kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma 'asags pa/ 'du shes ni spyin/ rgyu lta bu rtsig dang / gzugs dang / snang ba dang / yid la byed

331a7(mdo): kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags so snyam nas/ des de ltar brtags pa dang / gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa de myi dmyigs so// des de ltar brtags na myi dmyigs te/ myi dmyigs so snyam pa'i rlom sems
331a8(mdo): kyang myed do// kang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de yang myi dmyigs te/ myi dmyigs so snyam pa'i rlom sems kyang myed do// des byang chub kyang myi dmyigs te/ myi dmyigs so snyam pa'i rlom sems kyang /
331a9(mdo): myed do// 'di la su zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de yang myi dmyigs te/ myi dmyigs so snyam pa'i rlom sems kyang myed do// des de ltar so sor brtags nas byang chub kyi rlom sems kyang myed/
331b1(mdo): sems can gyi rlom sems kyang myed/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rlom sems kyang myed pa de/ bzang skyor bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ de chos ka pa la yang rlom sems myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
331b2(mdo): de chos gang yang skye ba yang myi mthong 'gag pa yang myi mthong ste/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba'i gnas khong du chud pas de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// de ni rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang // kun tu rtog
331b3(mdo): pa thams cad la myi 'jug ste de ni zhi ba'o// bsil bar 'gyur ba'i sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ste// bzang skyob 'di ni rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul
331b4(mdo): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bzang skyong ting nge 'dzind 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyis mngon par 'byung ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das
331b5(mdo): la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma skyesam 'gags kyang / skye zhing 'gag par kun tu gda' ba dang
331b6(mdo): yi ge gcig kyang myi brjod lag 'khor bye ba grangs ma mchis pa la chos stond par yang kun tu 'da' ba'i/ sangs rgyas rnaMmakyi thabs mkhas pa ni ngo mtsha rad to// de nas bcom ldan/
331b7(mdo): 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// 'jam dpal ga pa yang yon tad ni snying po bcu gnyis kyis mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
331b8(mdo): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ bskal du pa snyigs ma la yang kun tu stond pa dang / rus snyigs ma dang / sems can snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa snyigs ma dang / tshe snyigs ma dang / theg pa
331b9(mdo): dang pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar stond pa dang / chos stond pa sna tshogs dang / sems can yongs su sbyind par byed pa sna tshogs dang / gzhan mu stegs can gyis dkrug pa'i/
332a1(mdo): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi nye ma mtshan mongs pa dang / bdud kyi las dang / ma 'o sa kyi dmag tshogs kyis gtse ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / lus 'jug pa dang/ zhug
332a2(mdo): dang / chom po'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kla klos dkrug pa dang / rkun pos dkrug pa dang / mu ges dkrug pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul grum dang / lus srul pol 'khrug
332a3(mdo): pa yang kun tu stond cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyes pa de dag kyang myed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs kyi byid kyi rlabs kyis 'dul
332a4(mdo): ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ sems can yongs su sbyi nang par byed pas sems can rnams kyis bya ba de dag shes kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du btang snyoms pa ste/ rnam par myi rtog pa
332a5(mdo): 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas par blta'o// de skad ces bka' stsa lad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
332a6(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yon tan gyi snying po gang dag dpa ldan pa dang / yon tan gang dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing derasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par rdzogs par
332a7(mdo): rgyu ba'i yon tan gi snying po bcu gnyis po de bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsold/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa yad pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni bskal pa'i snying po dang ldan pa yin// nus kyi
332a8(mdo): snying po dang ldan pa yin/ sems can gyi snying po dang ldan pa yin/ zhing gi snying po dang ldan pa yin/ theg pa'i snying po dang ldan pa yin/ sa'i snying po dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bstand
332a9(mdo): pa'i snying po dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gtsar bu pa rnams myi rgyu ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam ba
332b1(mdo): rang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni rang bzhin gis dgam po'i chos dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams gnas pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi snyi de 'phaklas pa'i rtse mo'i snying po dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyag
332b2(mdo): kyi zhing der sngod gi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gshegs shing rjes su gshegs pa yin te/ 'jas dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni son tan gi snying po bcu gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa yin no// de sangs rgyas
332b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 'jam dpal khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang ra'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ nyan thos dang /
332b4(mdo): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa tha dad pa rnam par bzhag pa myed par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gal te
332b5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa sems can kha gcig la ni theg pa chen po ston/ kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / sapa/ can kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa stond tam pade ltar
332b6(mdo): gyur da na de bzhin gshegs pa sems yongs su ma dag par 'gyur/ sems myi snyoms par 'gyur/ mngon par chags par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi rtse ba'i snying rje dang ldan par
332b7(mdo): 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs kyi 'du shes kyi skyon du 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa slob dpon chos kyi dpel khrud byed par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa chos kar ci ston kyang rung / chos
332b8(mdo): de thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la gzhol pa theg pa chen po sa 'bab pa/ theg pa chen po la bab pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes sgrub pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes thob par byed
332b9(mdo): pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa ste/ 'jam dpal de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na theg pa dad pa rnam par ka zhag pa myed do// 'jam dpal kyis gsol/
333a1(mdo): pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te theg pa tha dad pa rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis na/ 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa chen po'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// 'di ni theg pa chen po'o zhes
333a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams la/ theg pa gsum bstand pa de ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsa la pa/ 'jam dpal theg pa la dad pa zhes bya ba de ni/ sa rnam par gzhag pa'i tshig
333a3(mdo): bla dgas so// 'jam dpal rab 'bring tha ma'i chos bstand pa zhes bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag par bstand to// de ni de bzhin gshegs pas gang zag
333a4(mdo): rnam par gzhag go// tshogs chung ngus bsags pa'i sem sa can rnams dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad byed pa las bstsags pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smind par bya
333a5(mdo): ba'i phyiratheg pa tha dad par bzhag ki/ theg pa ni tha dad dbyer myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyingasadabyer myed pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal theg pa la
333a6(mdo): bstand pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pas sgribapa myed par gsungs so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phor gi slob dpon mkhas pa/ 'phor shes pa'i
333a7(mdo): mchog gi pha rol tu phyind pa/ thabs dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs dang / 'bad pa dang / spyod lam sna tshogs stond cing / thob ma 'bod slob kyang / 'phor shes pa de gcig yin pa de bzhin du
333a8(mdo): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'phong gi/ slob dpon mkhas pa yang chos kyi tshul/ sna tshogs la 'jug pas mkhas pa dang / bsam pa dang / mos pa tha dad par sems can rnams la/ bla na
333a9(mdo): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gcig las theg pa gsum du stond to// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ me stag chung ngu yar ba yang / rtsa'i rgyu dang ldan zhing mched na/ bsreg pa'i
333b1(mdo): bstan dpa'i me lta bur tshig par nus par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin chu phyir myi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba'i me stag gcig yo de yang / nyon mongs pa thams cad bsreg pa'i phyir/ mthar
333b2(mdo): kyis mched cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po snang ba'i bar du byed nus par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ ri dgas phra mo thams cad/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa'i
333b3(mdo): can gi mdun na 'dug par nus pa myed do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / kacer bu pa dang / 'tsho ba thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i
333b4(mdo): mdun na 'dug pa 'am tshig sba bar nus pa myed de stobs bcu'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhis/ myi 'jigs pa myed pa'i skyes bu chen po seng ge'i mdun na
333b5(mdo): sgra smog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas myed de semasacan yongs su smind par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs/ pas byin kyis rlabs pa ni ma gtogs so// 'jam
333b6(mdo): dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar pa 'od zer ki dra ba brgya stong grangs myed pa rab tu 'gyed pas/ srin bu me khyer thams cad 'od myed cing lam me ma yin/ lgang
333b7(mdo): de ma yin te/ mdzes pa ma yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ bla na myed pa'i ye shes chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar nas/ ye shes chen po'i 'od zer brgya stong
333b8(mdo): grangs myed pa rab tu bkye bsagazhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa las stsogs pa thams cad 'od myed par 'gyur te/ lam me ma yin/ lgang de ma yin zhing /
333b9(mdo): mdzes pa ma yin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs su shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i yul de ni bsam gyis kyi khyab ste/ des na sangs rgyas kyi
334a1(mdo): zhing der gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa rnams kun tu snang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhan mu stegs can gi sgo de dag thams cad ni rnam par
334a2(mdo): tha rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzind bsam gyis myi khyab pa la gnas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las nges par 'byung ba/ thabs mkhas pa chen pos rnam par rtsen pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos
334a3(mdo): dang / dge 'dun yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba/ sems can yongs su smyind par byed pa'i/ mchog gi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs
334a4(mdo): ba byin kyi rlabs kyis byin kyis rlabs pa dag go// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum ki stong chen po'i 'jig rten ki khams kyi/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul
334a5(mdo): phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can re re nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis gang theg pa
334a6(mdo): chen po la dad pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de'i sha las nyi ma re re zhing yang / srang lnga lnga sen mos bcad par bya ste/ de tshul de lta bus
334a7(mdo): srog dang bral lo zhes smra ba la/ 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' de skad smras pas/ myi skrag/ myi dadang / dang bar myi 'gyur te/ tha na skrag pa'i sems can cig kyang myi skyed/ zhum pa
334a8(mdo): myed/ kong ba myed/ the tsom myed la/ phyir zhing chos yongs su bzung ba la brtson te/ klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / brtson par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ 'jam dpal sems
334a9(mdo): dpa' ba/ sbyin pa la dpa' ba/ tshul khrims la dpa' ba/ bzod pa la dpa' ba/ brtson 'grus la dpa' ba/ bsam gtan la dpa' ba/ shes rab la dpa' ba/ ting nge 'dzind la dpa' ba zhes bya'o//
334b1(mdo): 'jam dpas gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' de gsod pa'i myi de dag la/ myi khro ba dang / za ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems myi skyed na/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de ni tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa/ dbang po
334b2(mdo): dang mtshungs pa dang / srun po dang mtshungs pa/ myi g.yo' ba snying rje dang ldan pa/ byams pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa gsob la gnas/ phyir myi ldog pa'i spyod yul ba// seMs
334b3(mdo): sa dang mtshungs pa/ sems me dang mtshungs pa/ sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ste/ sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / zab sel ba'i phyir
334b4(mdo): zhugs pa'o// 'jam dpal gang gis gar 'aka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par sangs rgyas rnams la sangs rgyas re re la yang / gang 'aka'i klung ki bye ma 'a
334b5(mdo): snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos rab tu bkang ste/ dbul ba phul ba/ re ltar 'bul bas/ kang 'aka'i klung gi bye ma snyed
334b6(mdo): kyi bskal par/ dbul ba phul ba bsa'ajam dpal byang chub sems dpal/ gzhan gang gis rnam pa la 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas/ phyogs gcig tu la
334b7(mdo): bo ste/ 'di ltar sems kyis mngod par rtog cing 'di lta bu'i chos la bslab par bya'o zhes/ thob par 'dod na/ des ma bslabs su zin kyang / bsod nams ches yang du myed de/
334b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po/ sbyin pa'i bsod nams ni de lta bu ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i sems bskyed ma thag pa des/ chos bzhi yongs
334b9(mdo): su 'dzind pa'i phyir te/ bzhi kang zhe na/ byams pa yongs su bzung ba yin/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
335a1(mdo): bka' dang myi 'gal bar byas pa yin te/ nan tan snying por byed pa yin/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyal
335a2(mdo): yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag yongs su 'dzind to// / gzhan yang chos bzhi yongs su 'dzind te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i dang
335a3(mdo): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sgrib pa myed pa'i blo'i rnam par thard pa yongs su 'dzind pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ko// 'jam dpal chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
335a4(mdo): sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ste/ bzhi kang zhe na/ dus su sbyin pa dang / g.yo myed cing / sgyu myed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed
335a5(mdo): ba dang myi 'bral ba dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yang shind tu yang gus pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
335a6(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la/ rgyal po 'am/ glon po chen po gang zhig 'di skad ces gal te sems
335a7(mdo): can gcig gi don du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ka cig yang dag par bsgrub ste/ than du 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la/ zan cang gcig tsam sbyin zhing sgrub na yang / de'i phyir ngas khyod kyi sha sen
335a8(mdo): mos gtogs te/ myed par bya'o zhes zer la/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' de skad zer ba la/ myi klag/ myi dngang / dngang bar myi 'gyur zhing 'jigs pa myed kyi 'di ltar
335a9(mdo): sems bskyed de/ gang 'aka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lus kyi/ sen mos bcad de bor yang / bdag spo bar bya'i/ bdag sems can gcig gi phyir/ ji tsam du chung yang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig yang
335b1(mdo): dag par gyi sgrub du myi gtong ngo snyam na/ sems bskyed pa gcig po des/ byang chub sems dpa' des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi/ rdul phra rab kyi gtan pa myed pa'i mchod sbyin
335b2(mdo): zil kyis gno dad to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang
335b3(mdo): zil kyis gnon te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// kang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po myong bar 'gyur ro//
335b4(mdo): de bzhin du gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa thob cing myong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'
335b5(mdo): gang gis sems can rnams la snying rje bskyed na// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des kyang / chos bzhi yongs su 'dzind te/ bzhi po kar zhe na
335b6(mdo): brtan pa'i sems yongs su 'dzind pa dang / khong khro pa myed pa'i sems dang / snying rje chen po yongs su 'dzin pa dang / phyi rad rtsi log gi shes pa spangs nas/ phyi nang
335b7(mdo): ci ma log pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa'o// gzhan yang chos bzhi yongs su 'dzind te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims yun sum tshogs pa mchog yongs su 'dzind te/ tshul khrims yun sum
335b8(mdo): tshogs pa mchog de dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lha gzhan la rton par myi 'gyur ba dang / dran pa phun sum tshogs pa mchog de dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' skye ba skye bar na
335b9(mdo): rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa mchog yongs su 'dzind te/ las sa rgyas 'byung ba dang 'bral bar gyi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang
336a1(mdo): dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa mchog de dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'bral bar myi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang myi 'bral ba'i
336a2(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing tu skye bar 'gyur/ gal te sangs rgyas ni ma byung la/ 'dzam bu'i gling du skyes na yang skyes bu dam par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i glir ni sbyin pa'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur/ rang sangs
336a3(mdo): rgyas dang / gzhan mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba de dag mgu bar byed par 'gyur/ de dag mgu bar byas nas/ bsod nams dbul bar 'gyur ba dang /
336a4(mdo): lha rnams kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ namabag myed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe yang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bskul bar 'gyur
336a5(mdo): bskul nas kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur/ de'i dran pa chud myi za bar 'gyur/ byang chub yang dag
336a6(mdo): par 'grub pa'i rgyur brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de/ sems bskyed pa des rnam par dag par byed pa'i chos lnga yongs su
336a7(mdo): 'dzind te/ lnga gang zhe na/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yongs su 'dzind pa dang / lus rnam par dag pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa rnam par dag pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa
336a8(mdo): ba sbyangs pa rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas la rten chos la rten dge 'dun la rten byang chub sems dpa' la rten byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ thams cad la rten pa'i
336a9(mdo): yongs su 'dzind pa yin te/ 'jam dpal rnam par dag par byed pa'i chos de dag/ yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'dzam
336b1(mdo): nA gling pa'i sems can kyi srog bcad de/ de dag gi 'dog pa thams cad 'brog pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan zhig kri/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba kacig
336b2(mdo): gi sems bskyed pa/ za na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la/ na cang gcig byin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i ba chad byas na/ de de bas ches sdig pa grangs myed par bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na
336b3(mdo): sangs rgyas 'byung ba bskyed pa'i/ dge ba'i mkha'i bar chad byed par gnas pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la mdo'i sde dkon mchog sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
336b4(mdo): bskyed pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di la/ mos pa'i byang chub sems dpal sa sprod ci bsngags pa ma yin 'arjod/ 'dum bar myi brjod/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'bral bar byed/
336b5(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba la mos pa dang / 'bral bar byed cing bar byed na/ de myi dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro//
336b6(mdo): de der skyes na yang lus dpag tshad lnga brgya pa 'grub bo// lus de la yang mgo lnga brgyar 'gyur ro// mgo re re la yang sre lnga brgya lnga brgyar 'gyur ro// s+ye la
336b7(mdo): rim la yang kyang kol lnga brgyas mo bar 'gyur te/ bskul pa 'i nyid gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' de/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de nyid kyi bskal par sems cad
336b8(mdo): dmyal ba chen po rnams su skyes nas/ sdug bsngal chen po chen mo myong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i bar chad bya bar zhugs pa'i phyir ro// kang sangs rgyas
336b9(mdo): 'byung ba'i bar chad bya ba'i phyim zhugs pa re/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o// chob kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o// dge 'dun gi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs
337a1(mdo): pa'o// de lta'i rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o// de tshangs pa thams cad kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o// de myi'i 'jig rten gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o// de sems
337a2(mdo): can thams cad kyi bde bar sbyar ba thams cad gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o// 'jam dpal ka pa la la/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i phyir 'jug pa de la/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sdug
337a3(mdo): bsngal chen po skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
337a4(mdo): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / sems can rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// chos thos nas kyang / rgyu nad tu zhugs par 'gyur/
337a5(mdo): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang // dgra bcom par 'gyur/ rang rgyal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po bzhir 'gyur/ sum bcu rtsa gsum
337a6(mdo): dang / 'thab bral dang / dka' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar 'gyur/ zla ba dang / nyi mar 'gyur/ skar ma dang / rgyu skar
337a7(mdo): dang / tshogs dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen por 'gyur/ drag po dang / drag po chen po dang / drag po sngon por 'gyur/ sangs rgyas las brtend te
337a8(mdo): tshangs par 'gyur/ tshangs pa chen por 'gyur/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don du 'gyur/ 'od chung dang / tshad byed 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad myed dge rang
337a9(mdo): dge rgyas dang / sprin myed 'od dang / bsod rnam sa skyes dang / 'bras bu me dpa/ khyi ma ba dang / kyi gdung ba dang / gya nos 'ang ba dang / gning tu 'ayod dang/ non gyi 'i gnas su 'gyu
337b1(mdo): sangs rgyas las brten te/ gal te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ stobs kyis 'khor los bskur bar 'gyur/ rgyal phran du 'gyur/ drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga cad 'jig rten du 'bral
337b2(mdo): bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas las brtend te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyis ma 'jig rten na snang bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas la brtend te/ kyi'i 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas lal
337b3(mdo): brtend te/ skyid pa dang / nor che ba dang / mdzod mnga' dang / lus gi nang tu 'jam par 'gyur/ glang po ches 'gro bar 'gyur/ rtas 'gro ba dang / dpung bu chung kas 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
337b4(mdo): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la/ gzhan ki khyim rnams su byang chub sems dpal la tha dog dang ser sna byed na/ des de'i tshe gzhi de las 'jigs
337b5(mdo): pa chen po gsum zhes par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i 'jigs pa dang / dmus long ki 'jigs pa dang / yul mtha' khob du skyel
337b6(mdo): ba'i 'jigs pa ste/ 'jigs pa gsum mo// 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa'as/ bzod snyoms blangs te rid pa dang / 'phongs pa dang
337b7(mdo): rna po dang/ zang pa rnams la bkros te byin na/ de dge ba'i ma ba la che rjes nas/ 'dzar los sgyu ba'i rgyal po su 'phrul chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// la ma dpal kAs
337b8(mdo): chum sems das kyis pas na den ladon du 'dod/ ldan par 'dodasems can de dag la 'des pa dang / mul par 'dod kyi rtsod pa dang / nga ba'i don tu myig
337b9(mdo): dge ba'i ma ba des shes ralan par 'gyur/ mamam pa'i byur ba'i rgyal po 'brus men po dang 'ad par 'gyur/ lamagyi du dus na yo dzan pa
338a1(mdo): // 'gyur/ myi'i dam pa sangs rgyas su 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' sdug
338a2(mdo): bsngal ba'i sems can mthong na snying rje bskyed cing / bde' ba'i sems can mthong na/ mchog tu dka' ba skyed na
338a3(mdo): de che rjes nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des lus gser gi mdog can du 'gyur ro//
338a4(mdo): ma rgya chad tha na
338a5:
